japanese: 下がれ！
チームBはデッキにいる。 戦闘中。
奴の足を狙え。

english: Green may've created these things. But I'll finish them.
japanese: グリーンがこいつらを創りだしたんだろう。 だが、俺が始末をつける。
同じ男か？
うわああああ！
やれ！ やれ！

english: What?  They’re using my DNA to track me down? That must be why they took Dana… But I know were she is.  Time to get her back!
japanese: なに？ 奴らは俺のDNAを使って追跡している？ それがディナが連れ去れれた理由に違いない……。 だが俺は彼女がどこにいるか知っている。 彼女を取り戻すぞ！
制御できない！

english: All Teams, we're going to have to gang up on it, over.
japanese: 全隊、一斉に行動する、どうぞ。

english: Should we do it? What do we do?
japanese: そうすべきなのか？ 何をすべきなんだ？

english: We have a confirmed kill on primary target.
japanese: 第一目標の殺害を確認した。

english: There you are! Come to poppa.

japanese: 正当防衛だ。
さっさと出て行け、くそ野郎。

english: They've got the virus, get back!
japanese: そいつらは感染してる、戻れ！

english: Jesus, um, Dispatch -- I need help. MVA! MVA!
japanese: ちくしょう ―― 派遣要請、支援求む！ MVA！ MVA！

english: All units, I am ordered to remind you to check in your viral monitoring badges at the end of this assignment.
japanese: 全ユニットに命じる。 この任務の後で各自のウイルスモニターの印をチェックするのを忘れるな。

english: Facing heavy resistance. Cannot respond, over.
japanese: 激しい抵抗にあっている。 応答できない、どうぞ。
なんのためだったんだ！

english: Roger that, Ghost assigned to perimeter commencing tox deployment. Watch for ground based hostiles and maintain orbit.
*grunts* I can't see for shit -- is anybody out there?
This area is clear! We can take it from here.
japanese: このエリアはクリアだ！ 落ち着け。
乗り物でやってくるぞ！

english: If I go inside before I take a look around they could ambush me again. I can't afford to take that risk.
japanese: 辺りを確認せずに中に入れば、やつらはまた待ち伏せするかもしれない。 そんなリスクを冒している余裕はない。

english: Aerial indicates west, your west perimeter has hostiles. Out.

japanese: 全ユニット、ただちに出撃！

english: Somebody, please help me? For the love of God....
japanese: 誰か、助けてくれないか？ 神の愛のために……。
彼らは俺達のために来たんだ！
奴を撃ち落せ、くそったれ！
お手伝いしましょうか？
打ち続けろ！ 俺は軍曹だぞ！
奴を足止めしろ！

english: Please, it's my boy's birthday tomorrow!
japanese: お願い、明日は息子の誕生日なの！

english: All units, Command requesting flood and cover in the Zone, over.
God-mode, God-mode, cowboy up, he's right here, right now.
Zone appears clear. No sign of hostile.
japanese: ここはクリアだ。 敵の影はない。

english: Got him! Ground, confirm that kill, over.
japanese: 奴を捕らた！ 地面だ、殺傷を確認しろ、どうぞ。

english: Guys, the son of a bitch is back.
japanese: おまえら、くそったれが帰ってきたぞ。

english: No, i-i-it's cool. I-I-I'm not it!

japanese: 賛成だ、ターゲットは破壊された、どうぞ。
このっ！ このやろう！

english: We're in deep here. Mat it!
I think I see him! There!
japanese: 奴を発見したと思われる！ そこだ！

english: Please! Don't kill me, man! Please!
japanese: おねがい！ 殺さないでください！ おねがい！

english: Everyone, sustain fire on my target!
japanese: 全員、あのターゲットを撃ち続けろ！

english: Just let me live, and you'll never see me again.
japanese: 見逃して、もう二度と姿を見せないで。

english: Red sighting, permission to engage, over.
Firing Pod One, torch is lit, over
Ah hell! Which one's the target?
Make another move and you're dead!
Search came up empty, Red Crown.
There's a fucking carpet of bodies down there.
It's him, it's that fucking thing!
Not so fast, you son of a bitch.
Something's helping them - is it Zeus...?
All units mobile, ETA on Target Zone T-minus-thirty seconds.
That's one less pain in the fuckin' ass.
No sign of target, Red Crown.
That's far enough! Now get down on the ground!
Can anyone help! I need help!
In your Zone, Dogs! Fuck em up!
You'll love this, we got burners on our optical, over.
Save some of the city, gunner, aim at moving targets only.
Help me! Help! Call the cops! Somebody, call the cops!
There it is! Going in. Get ready, guys.
Standby, onsite. Red Crown, please accept priority target location, aerial Support Team requested, priority auth Delta Two Four.
He's making a run for it!
Pull us out, Red Crown, just about lost the Bird, over.
What the hell. What’s...wrong with 'em. FUCK!
We've come up dry, Red Crown. Chalk Three awaiting new orders.
Voodoo Seven is out. Negative on target reacquisition.
Please! Oh, I-I want to live!
US Marine Corps! What happened here?
Keep shooting till it's dead and gone.
Enemy has been annihilated, HQ. We wiped 'em up.
Help! Help! I have someone trapped here!
Get a picture of me with this fucking thing.
Strike Leader reporting target down, over.
We make it back and pizza's on me, chief.
Back me up. Gimme the 'WATCH, not those fuckin' Dogs.
Well we tried, we sure the hell tried.
All Birds, confirm tactical. Initiate Yankee X-Ray Three, over.
It's on board, evade, pull hard!
Something on our screens. Gonna check it out.
That's what you get for fuckin' with the Marines! Oooya!
We are in the shit and LOVING IT!
Get up, get up! Keep fighting.
Taggart's aircraft are somewhere near here.
ZEUS has been sighted! Clear the landing areas!
japanese: ゼウスを発見！ 着陸地点をあけろ！

english: There! There! Right there! He's your man!
Oh, whoa, whoa. Fuck, guys, hold it.
And that's how that story ends, bro.
Clear the area, clear that entire area. Check it out.
You're not permitted in this Zone.
It's a done deal, let's go home.
Hit but still rolling. Fire control clear.
I see more! Move it! Move it!
Engaging search and destroy. Sweep for hostile contacts, over.
Tornado flight to Red Crown. What's next?
We got it on the mat!
Don't let him get me! Kill him!
HQ, this is Ghost Three Six Seven Five, we are clear of the Red Zone!
Can't hear you, Dispatch -- SEND BACK UP!
Get the fuck out of here.
My nose is twitching, something's wrong down there.
No time for props, boys. Get on down to the final Red Zone and clean it up.
Negative on site, Dispatch. Two Whiskey Seven has got nothing.
AT and Bulldog Units ready. Hotrod holding outside Red Zone
Everybody hold, uploading target image to Strike Boss, over.
Confirmed kill, that's a good one.
Prepare for new orders. ZEUS is clear.
Launcher hot, forces cover us and we will hit targets.
Strike Boss confirming, mission complete, over.
Chalk Three, Tornado One. We're buggin' out!
We're taking position right now. Give us green light to engage, over.
All Air Units, you are cleared to begin your strike pass. Be careful, our boys are danger close.
They shoulda warned us about this shit.
No line of sight reported from any teams, ZEUS gone dark.
ZEUS is on the move, please advise.
Red Crown, burners, burners in the numbers, over.
Look, it's my beat, and I don't like sharing it with these spooks.
That's a pretty massive fuck-around right there.
OK, we got it now. Sensors hot.
We're not seeing anything here, Red Crown. Request new coordinates.
Put the 20-7s to the test. Let's hit it.
I can't feel it at all.
10-16! Military call sign Red Crown, officers need assistance! We have an attack alert. Do you copy?
Reporting strike target, do you copy?
Don't be fucking stupid! It's not me!
They keep coming - I'll keep killing.
japanese: やつらが死に果てるまで ―― 殺し続けてやる。

english: Get back on the road -- we're compromised, get mobile!
Sergeant...I think we got something here.
ZEUS is down, repeat, ZEUS is down!
Requesting immediate air support, Red Crown!
Repeat, repeat. We lost your last comm.
Move up, move up! Cover and fire!
Voodoo entering Target Zone. Cleared for target requests, over.

japanese: 蚊に刺されたか？

english: Friendlies stay alert, death from above. Gun, go gun.
Come off. It's disappeared. We're negative.
You're in the clear. Stand by to redeploy.
Everyone! Leave the area in an orderly fashion -- now!
You broke up there, can you repeat, over?
Did anyone see what happened? Anyone?
Lock acquired. Launch pending. Death imminent.
Got him. Good. Sweep the area.
Empty on target, redeploying and rearming. Red Crown, do you copy?
I don't wanna die here. I don't wanna die.
This is Racecar Three Six. Requesting support
Tornado Foxtrot to Ground. What's going on down there? Over.
Our guys are spread all over the street. It's a fucking mess out here....
So many minds at work. All talking. All dying.
japanese: 記憶が多すぎる。 一斉に語りかけて消えていきやがる。

english: Get us out, let's regroup, over.
What's this? Holy shit, is it that guy?
Squad Forty-Five, can we get a strike to this location, over.
That's a kill. That's a kill. Send me a new target, over.
Cover the entire area. Find it, kill it!
No! Nooo! No, OK? No, no!
Red Crown to all units. Confirmation of widespread outbreak. Masks and Biohazard level four protocols in effect in all control zones. Out.
It's on board, shake if off, shake it off!
Watch your backs, its out of control!
You should pick your friends more carefully, Mercer...
japanese: 友達はもっとよく考えて選ばないとな、マーサー……。

english: Anyone seeing that? Make sure its nothing or it's dead!
Get him before he does it again!
Search objective has been scrubbed, you will have new orders momentarily.
My scope is clear, I'm going to need co-ords.
Closing the sweep down, Red Crown, no signs.
Can you see anything? What do you see?
Teams go dark. Clear for now.
Hey -- weren't you with the Field Team?
That fucker's back in the open!
Fuck you, dude, that one was mine!
Acknowledge, is that a negative contact on all points? Sound off if otherwise.
We're at half fuel and the target's still active, flight time is good.
This is Red 4 - we are on the verge of defeat, they're too strong for us.
Hit 'em harder! We're taking significant damage here.
Yeah, the whole Strike Package is in play.
Going thermal, but it's a shit-fest, RC.
Orders belayed. Strike Team disengage and dismantle, over.
I need witnesses to come forward! Are there any witnesses?
Better give emergency services some space.
Cancel that request for fire support, Red Crown. Looks like things are done here.
Aborting sweep, no sighting of target, over.
I'm uploading visuals on what's left.
Fuck this! It's going down right here!
I do not read you, Dispatch.
Marines from Tornado Seven Niner. We're here and looking to engage. I say again, looking to engage.
Keep alert -- suspect is here somewhere.
Hostile down! ZEUS is finished, over.
We've got a red building, repeat, RED.
Red Crown confirming grid is now cold. Target contact negative, do you copy?
Big fender bender. Could complicate matters.
Call in a duster. We'll coat the entire neighborhood with tox.

japanese: 伏せろ！

english: We're going to need that area to be cleared out before the Hammer can get in there. Requesting air strike.
japanese: ハマーを乗りつける前にエリアを掃討する必要がありそうだ。 航空支援を要請する。

english: Set up for a sweep. Push everything back! Do it now!
japanese: 排除準備！ 押し込め！ 今だ！

english: It's over, Dispatch. Time for a 10-61.
Set up for a sweep. Push everything back! Do it now!
He looks like he knows something...let's find out what.

japanese: 来たぞ！

english: I've had it with you, fucker. STEP DOWN!
Hold up, I want to go check on something.
Woo, that was close, too close, reconfirm!
Blackjack Two, heading into Hot Zone.
There's a fuckin' carpet of bodies down there.
Ground Team reports fixed and rotary wing are ready to deploy. Clear the elevators and provide covering fire!

japanese: ここから出て行け！

english: Dispatch, this is Charlie Nineteen. That's negative.
Uploading Strike Team our coordinates, sustain visual.
Collateral is out of control. Too fucking bad.
We're operating blind here, Red Crown.
Man, we should get out of here!
Red sighting, permission to engage, over.
Thunder to ground, do you have target in sight? Over.
I got a line on the target!
I've seen this before, stay away!
Asphalt and horseshit is all I see. Your sector is clear.
Ready Citadel for my return, I'm coming home a victor.
Keep on the alert -- he's gotta be right under us.
D-Code Seven reporting operational success, over.
Now I know where she is. Time to do something about it.
This is Three Adam Nineteen. Got a positive on the suspect, requesting military support.
Belay that command -- that's an enemy combatant! Open fire!
Come back with the contact, over.
I got burners in the Red Zone. Prepare to eliminate, over.

japanese: いくぞ。

english: If this ain't a disaster, it's close enough.
Masks on, hold tight, air deployed tox is inbound. Anything virally based within a quarter klick is going to regret it.
Pistol mag! Need a pistol mag!
All units watch for crossfire on this, it's a fast developing situation.
You don't want to do this, please!
Sites reads clear. Standby Echo Team -- I'll be on-site in five.
Kill him before he gets that off!
Fuck. I've gotta take them out before they find Dana.
What's going on? Garces, can you see anything!?
This is Red Crown, calling off the search protocol, over.
Target is absent, repeat, absent, over.
Check your Six, Ground, ZEUS is there somewhere.
Request permission to widen search pattern, over.
I don't know what you are, but I'm going to kill you.
What'd you want!? You want me to fuckin' beg? Here, I'll beg, man, please!
I see him, looks like a male, he doesn't seem injured. That right?
We're going in to eyeball this, standby.
Target Zone flat and dusty, Red Crown, awaiting update.
What's the situation in the field?
Move in pairs. Spread out, find it!
We need a Strike Package here, pronto!
Looks like you can close that one up.
Point that gun at someone else, pal.
Oh, God! Please! Don't kill me!
This one's too big to cover up.
I-I-I called the cops. They're, they're on their way.
This is Red Crown. Units are in assigned grids. Awaiting confirmation on engagement.
Perimeter breach! Rain fire, rain fire! Don’t let it get through.
Watch your flanks! Move and fire!
I don't know. I don't know!
Got something on our thermal, gonna check, over
We got 'em running, throw everything at 'em.
Check it -- that's the same guy!
I'm in a shit-storm, delay comm.
I get the feeling when one of these starts pinging, it'll be too late.
Maintain security. Looks like they're thinning out now. 25% tox remaining. Standby.
Field Commander, Red Crown requesting status, over.
Bag it and get it back to HQ.
We need close support at my Twenty. Ghost Twelve, do you receive me, over?
I have ground confirmation of contacts to your south.
You don't want to do this! Please!
Confirmed, target down in the Kill Zone.
Destination, Times Square. Single column, let's move out!
It changed! Did you see that?
No, there's nowhere to hide in there.
Echo Twelve, reporting hostiles at my Twenty.
Request permission to widen search pattern, over.
Hey there. You got any real Intel?
Call fire support on my mark, I have to back off, over.
This stuff...I wonder if it’s the answer
If these fuckers are guarding our backs I'm walking sideways.
Who do you think you're messin' with?
We have an armed suspect fleeing. Any units able to pursue?
Tactical goals are in sight. Looking good.
No! It's not me! It's not me!
Fire on my target, coordinates Zulu One Three Niner. Immediate. Fire for effect!
Sigma One reports failure to deploy in hot zone. Red Crown Command be advised ZEUS sighted. Out.
Zeus seems to be helping us out! the hell?
I don't know why, but things are looking up today.
You're going to have to repeat that, I show a solid target, over.
Dispatch, I have an affected structure.
Bulldog now leaving Kill Zone, over.

japanese: 下がれ！

english: Target broke contact. We- we have another Fire Mission request, over.
Ready to engage. Let's get some!
Marines, Marines, eyes open! Hostile not on scanners. Can you see it?
I can't stay in that shit for long. Hit and run....
Dispatch, I got a possible 10-34. Charlie Nineteen going in for a look.
One more step and I shoot.
It's him! Shoot the son of a bitch.
Dispatch! Dispatch! Major MVA on my Twenty! Do you copy?
Come on out and fight, you piece of crap.
Ghost report. Uh, target may have left the sector, over.
Requesting FO at Inspection Zone, we need target confirmation.
Abort, we've lost target. Repeat, abort.
Chalk Three from Tornado Lima Kilo, engaging target. Maneuvering in from the northwest.
Take more than that t'kick my ass!
ZEUS has broken off. Alert all units.
Deploy the Strike Team -- now, Goddamnit! My Commander's in fuckin' slices here!
Field Command, you need to see this. Looks like a hard structure, hostile held.
Charlie Nineteen to all other units. Suspect has escaped. Keep your eyes open.
Move out, we got clean-up duty.

japanese: 攻撃を続けろ。

english: We're still pursuing our tactical goals.
FO moving in to confirm the kill now.
Jesus, city's a wreck. Fucking wreck.
All units, respond! Shots have been fired, military intervention requested at officer location, over.
Enemy hard contact. We have a hardened facility.
This is wrong, it's all fuckin' wrong.
What the hell is it doing!?
Enemy in the clear, taking shot.
Heads up, target is armed, over.
Base is folding. Heavy casualties and physical damage. Not sure how much longer we can hold it, Red Crown
Zone is Blue, threat down, repeat, threat down.
Oh, God, no, it's the wrong guy!
Leaving the party, gonna try to make Citadel, over.
Hey, it's, it's the guy! From the news!
Red Crown, we got skins here, over. Go gun.
You got that? On the left?
We have a clean battle-space, over.
Watch what you step in around here.
We're clear. AO is clear, over.
I might serve you better as a hostage.
Thunder Four Five, target ready to unleash.
I have to pick up the pace.  They must be zeroing in.
Arm all missiles. Check optical for targets.
HQ, we are clearing temp base H Thirty-Two.
Red Crown, Roller unable to accommodate request, over.
Don't hurt me, OK? I haven't done anything to you.
Red Crown, Tornado Echo Two, we're locked on target. Get some extra support on this.
HQ, request support. Target in the Zone, we cannot go it alone, over.
This is Colonel Taggart. All air transports have been compromised. Any personnel trapped in the hot zone must seek alternate means of evac! Out
We're in deep, RC, hold the line.
No, you got this all wrong!
Tornado and Ghost elements, clear the deck, clear the deck immediately. Takeoff and enter engagement orbit.
Charlie Team X-Ray? Can anyone hear me?
Goddamnit, it's leaving the Kill Box, Red Crown, over.
Red Crown, operation is a success. Repeat, success!
Get some of this for Intel, over.

japanese: ロックンロールだぜ！

english: Field Leader, do you have confirmation on target locale? We're cold here.
False kill. It's still on, troops.
You don't have to do this this way, put him down and we can settle this.
Hit it in the back! Fuckin' hit it!
Triggers hot! Prepare for secondary strike, over.
Confirm perp's identity? Is this our man?
You're switching to containment duty, double-ASAP, get on it. Zero tolerance.
*sobbing* I think this man is trapped. Can somebody help!? Please! Somebody help, please!
Action Twelve, Action Twelve, this is our lucky day.
This is Adam Three Victor Nine, I've got a structure that appears to be corrupted.
ZEUS is hot, be aware, over.
Engines on fire, it's gonna blow!
You're going to need at least one more to take it out, Alex!
I need suppressing fire -- right now! Mow 'em down!
I see it! I know it's him!
Christ, I think that's the gunny.
That's a wrap, Red Crown. Charlie Unit has downed ZEUS. Standby.
I'm confirming this one, give him a taste.
Williamson, Ali, get on it! Now!
Hard to tell. It's right off our left. Left low.
Requesting Strike Package, repeat, requesting Package, over.

japanese: 聞こえてる。 やめとくよ。

english: All sensor and optical views show negative.
What we can see doesn't look good, RC.
I have a crime scene for forensic.
All units, suspect pursuit is closed. Repeat, closed.
Hostile structure at the Twenty, Textbook reads Hotel Indigo Victor Echo.
Stay close! We can’t lose him again.
Augh! I'm hurt! I think I'm hurt! Oh, God....
Ready another Field Team, dispatch them on my mark, over.
Strike Package, Strike Package, will pass data to Beamrider, over.
I do not read you, Dispatch.
Aw, fuck! They're coming out of the ground -- all points, check around your positions!
This position is compromised, folding up!
Where is there a lot of fucking people? WHERE?!
Red Crown, ready to initiate, attack run Bravo.
T-Four, do you have this, over? I'm not seeing where that fire is coming from.
Red Crown, we're ghost town here. Target has gone.
What the fuck is he doing?!
Stand down, stand down, all clear on containment.
Check targets. Shoot anyone that looks suspicious, we can't afford a vector.
Target still active and we are Winchester.

japanese: これについての助けが要る。

english: Let go of me! LET GO!!
japanese: 放せ！ 放せったら！

english: He's past the threshold. You're cleared to fire.
I cannot confirm, we have personnel all over the place.
Red Crown, we are in range and have visual, awaiting orders.
Moving in for a closer look, Dispatch. Stand by.
Clear the target, maintain a perimeter for our shot.
There's no way that just happened.
Not like this. Please, God, no.
I can't see, I can't fucking see!
Are you lookin' for a night in jail?
This is harassment! God damn harassment!
I have nothing further to share at this time, over.
Copy, we're mid-run, hold comm, hold comm.
Hit and run. It's all I can do.
Highball status check. God damn status check!
We are nearly there - keep at them.

japanese: 来たぞ！

english: Blackjack online, we have a confirmed sighting, over.
We're going in to eyeball this, standby.
Jesus. I can smell it through the mask. Rotten meat.
Deep breaths and wide open eyes.
Ghost Eye requesting clearance to begin target sweep, Red Crown.  Uh, over.
Dispatch, suspect has disappeared. I don't like this.
Too dumb to use a broom stick, germ?
This is Razorback, ready to roll, over.
Suppressing fire. Fall back, make it happen.
That's a strike, that's a strike, we're done here, Red Crown.
Nah, we lost him. Request an aerial sweep of this area.
We have a Leader on the move, uploading to the net now. Runner and Brawler sightings negative.
Red Crown, we sighted high-pri Tango, reroute Strike Team.
Field Command standing by and ready for deployment. Assuming tactical.
What the fuck! It's going to hit!
Get back! Get back from the God damn tank!
Return to field. Check for damage, I'm showing some thermal on scope.
Where the fuck is that armor!?
Burner down, Red Crown, confirmed kill.
Is he dead? I guess he's fuckin dead.
Is that - that's Greene. Elizabeth Greene.
japanese: あれは ―― あれはグリーン？ エリザベス・グリーンなのか？

english: Strike Team has lost target, bring us in, over.
What'd I ever do to you!?
Shots fired, shots fired on the scene, over.
All units, you may have to standby. EMS are not cleared to enter the vicinity. Watch for civilian traffic and personnel.
Landing craft in the lower bay. We got spots open, lifeboats and landing craft NOW.

japanese: 撃て！

english: All teams, sweep terminated. Visit nearest of Citadel or Palace for fuel and ammo, over.

japanese: バラバラにしてやる！

english: Well, well, look who's back for more.
Putting them in. No fear! Go, go, go!
Hostile down, mission complete, do you copy?
I don't want to go out like this.
That's a hit. Check for hull damage, over.
japanese: 攻撃された。 船体に損傷が無いか調べてくれ、オーバ
彼らは病気ですか？
急げ！

english: Something happen there? You see that?
Motherfucker's think their shit comes out wrapped in ribbons.
That is a kill, feed us a new target co-ord.
Please do not panic! The situation is under control!
Damn you, Taggart. Damn you for making me do this.
Strike Team request, bring it now!
Looking good, people. We're clean and smiling here, Control.
Base Delta has repelled hostile attack. We are hanging tough, out.
Ghost Four Five switching to recon, over.
Shut up down there, clear this channel.
Red Crown to all Command Units. Be advised Recoil is a  wash out. Sigma units compromised. Infected target still at large. Out.
Stalker Six Zero, repeat, acknowledge last transmission.
All teams: hold your positions. Clear on contact, over.
Eyes on the prize. Car wrecks are a distraction.
Wow. What is that shit? We can't put a dent in it!

japanese: 下がれ！

english: Status report, status report! Fire platoon?
Rendezvous at vector Four Zero Five, over.
Upload scanner data and give Red Crown a report, over.
You're not fuckin' classified for this region.

japanese: 下がれ！

english: In deep, Red Crown, delay transmission,
Call 911! Call 911! Somebody, call the cops!
Gunner, fire on lock! Fire on lock!
What the fuck are they? Shoot ''em SHOOT 'EM!
After all this buildup...no where near as bad as Kentucky. I'm almost disappointed.
Suspect can't be far. Find him.
Taggart! Come out of your hole
We got a bloody nose, but we ain't running away, over.
Red Crown, this is Fire Team Echo. We have no visual, over.
Hostile confirmed, send Strike Team to vector Three Six Niner. We will break on contact.
I can see what he saw, know what he knew.  His memories are like a flipbook.
Aw, I saw this on the news.
Be on defensive, TID. with hostile intent!
Be on alert. Suspect is armed and dangerous.
The grid is divided, repeat, divided.
Red Crown, we may need medical assistance. Standby.
Call the cops! Call the fuckin' cops!
Check your fire! It's holding a civilian!
Please don't shoot! I'm giving up!
Don't do it, take everything I got, please. Here's my wallet.

japanese: ブチかませ！ 俺もやってやる。

english: Buddy, you'd look real sweet in a hair shirt.
It's not anywhere, sensors see nothing moving, over
Boss, something just caught my eye....
We've got some action down there, over.
There it is. Scan-lock on target.
This is not happening, this is not fuckin' happening.
You've got a big load of shit trickling uphill on you, separate and cover.
Cordon off the scene, he's down.
These people that I'm seeing...they...they're infected....
Not like this. Not like this!
It's gone. There's nothing showing on our screens.
Razorback is still rolling, Red Crown.
Don't kill me! I'm innocent! Please!
The tank! It's firing on us!
His skin is burning.... It's Mercer!
Core teams, keep an eye on the pump. Check your fire and keep the God damn skins away from it.
I can do it. I can...wait....
I get the feeling when one of these starts pinging, it'll be too late.
Terminate operation. All search teams report.
He's bolting, call for a Bird.
Dispatch, this is Adam Seventy-One. I got those naked freaks at my Twenty.
Hostiles are dead or disengaged, Bravo Eight Three.
That was...interesting. I'll get this under a scope -- come back in a few hours, I'll have an analysis for you.
japanese: これは面白い。 顕微鏡で調べるから ―― 2、3時間後に来てくれ。 分析しておく。

english: Hey, I'm paid to shoot pricks like you.
Give me a damage report, then let's get this mess cleaned up.
*sobbing* It won't stop bleeding. Oh, my God.
Pop smoke and report positions to FO.
Officers report military priority targets at their location, grid reference Juliet Hotel Five Five Three, over.
I see it. I'm marking it now.
Why are you doing this? Tell me why!
Wow. That's a lot of hostiles.
We've got movement. Skins in the Zone, over.
Jesus H. Christ, Red Crown, get us the FUCK OUT OF HERE!!!!
Ohhh, boy. Is there a Corpsman handy?
Site is untenable. Backing out of this mess.
Voodoo to Red Crown, assuming attack formation. Mark and claim.
We seem to be benefitting from some extra units - let's make them count!
I'm going to buzz over, take a look.
All goals attained. Strike complete. Ranger, out.
Oh, shit, I lost him. Initiating scan, over.
Zeus spotted playing with the infected - rub them out.
Aggressor force has been repelled. Current position secure. Sentries up, over.
Hotrod Leader to Red Crown, requesting instructions, over.
Roger, I see it. And it's ugly.
When we're empty, reload and repeat.
I think I see that guy they're looking for!
Tornado Five ready to engage, weapons hot.
Nothing on sensors. Commencing visual search.
Aw, fuck, man, it's the BLACKWATCH small dicks.
Check the thermal -- we'll find him.
That thing on my back, it feels like it's eating my insides out.

japanese: Blackjack、被害を受けた、どうぞ。
フーア！

english: What the hell is that? Is that a man in there?
Fire Team. The target is nearby. Find him!
japanese: 攻撃部隊、ターゲットは近い。 見つけ出せ！

english: That should keep them busy for a while.
I’ll leave these samples with Karen, but I need to check back on Dana - see if she’s found anything.
japanese: 俺はカレンにこのサンプルを置いていこうと思う。 しかし俺は、ダナの元に戻らなくてはいけない ―― 彼女が何か見つけたかどうかを確認に。

english: Targets have gone quiet, checking injured and inventory, over.
Razorback One, crew and equipment still functioning...barely, over.
ZEUS positive. ZEUS positive. Target back on the net, over.
Car crash, but we're all OK. Total coverage, huh?
Ohh, the old man’s going to have my ass for this....
EFIS. is down, we're compromised! Compromised!
Don't kill me! I beg you!
Formation, suppress those hostiles! Clear a path!
Get me some fire on this, RC.
Don't trust 'em. Don't like 'em. And they give me the creeps.
Can't see a thing on the ground, Tower. It's a mess. We're returning to Citadel, over.
Confirm the perp is down? Do you read?
Now listen up! We WILL accomplish the mission.
Strike squad is authorized and deployed.
HQ, this is Echo One Alpha. Lost target. Repeat, do NOT have target.
ZEUS is down, establish a perimeter.
Wait, no. It's NOT me. You KNOW who I am.
If that thing crosses the line.... Prepare to pull out.
This is a restricted area, fuckhead. Trespassers WILL BE SHOT.
Hostile is within the perimeter. Stations! Stations! Stations!
You're confirmed hot, blow the shit out of it, just flatten it.
We're gonna make it, just hold on back there. Standby.
I'm authorized to shoot and burn your fucking corpse. GET OUT OF HERE!
Radar lock dropped, switching to eyeball.
Our Bird is on him, roger. Engaging at this time.
Hold your fire! Hold your fire!
Back up, don't let him grab you, too!
Fire mission engaged, fire for effect!
Red Crown, we need a Strike Package to this location, over.
Ghost Twelve, at minimum safety now, we're clear. Clear.
That chase call has been taken care of. Do you read me?
Viral sensors are at environmental levels. No signs, Red Crown.
Who do you think you are!?
If I'm going to get Ragland to those bodies, I'm going to need some armour.
Roger, Field Leader. We're getting thin but will send what we can afford to your position, out.
Check your fire! Check your fire!
That's a clean scorch, ping it again.
Oh, no, man, Oh, no. Not here, not now!
Red Crown, relay to air support, mission reboot in progress.
Marines from Tornado Four. We have target acquisition! Cleared.
Prioritize Infected over ZEUS. Engage only if he engages you.
ZEUS down in grid black. ZEUS down.
That's it, it's right fucking here!
All hands on deck, all hands on deck! Intruder alert, ZEUS is in barn! This is not a drill!
This is Red Crown confirming backup Sigma deployed.
I need to get to Dana... maybe she knows what this is all about....
japanese: 俺はダナのところへ行かなくてはいけない…… おそらく彼女はこのことについて全部知っているだろう。

english: This is Charlie Nineteen, *cough* Charlie Nineteen -- we've got casualties!
The tank! It's firing on us!
Launch two and watch it go down.
We are go for attack run, beginning sweep now, be aware.
Broadcast update to Red Crown. BW, stay back.
You see that? Is it moving?
I need a paramedic. Please, if you see anyone.
Red Crown Command to armored units. Captain Lim report! Any thunder units still online down there? Come back.
Red Crown, sustained hostile contact. Request strike pack support.
Do we fucking care if we're wrong?
All Field Units, switch to tight defensive operations immediately, do you copy?
Strike Boss, nice job, you can redeploy as required. Looking good.
I'll find you a weakness. Somehow....
Fire Team Delta to HQ. We are all clear on target. It's over.
This is going to take some effort.
I have a family. Do you hear me? I have a family. I want to see them again.
Take weapons off auto but don't get lazy.
Lady luck, I owe you one.
Who let it in range? Creating some space, over.
I seen a lot of shit, but I’ve never seen a virus do this.
This one's in the can. Ranger Two Seven RTB, over.
Alpha Juliet has left comm. Stay on high alert and engage target on sight.
I got him! Help me take him down!
In the Hot Zone, cannot respond, over.
Fall back, awaiting new tactical, over.
Oh, no, man, Oh, no. Not here, not now!
Rendezvous at vector Four Zero Five, over.
Hold your zones!  Jackpot cannot be compromised!
Fire in the Zone. Put down artillery on this target.
I do not read you, Dispatch.
I gotta be fuckin' honest. If I had morals, this would fuckin' bug me.
Razorback One, ready to deliver some punishment.
Looks like we're final. Tidy up and close the mission, over.
Strike Package Delta failed. Hostile gone to ground, over.
Reds at this position, update. Get ready.
Target sighted, send Strike Package to vector Zero One Niner.
Structure up and secure, Delta Command to Red Crown. Delta Dogs are at the ready, out.
Stop right there! This is a restricted area!
ZEUS is on the move, Red Crown.
I have no idea what the fuck that is, but it just gutted McMillan's team without breaking a sweat.
Deploy the Strike Package, it's him!
Whoa, dude keeps changing the rules.
Oh, fuck -- we got a new one.
What do you want? Take anything, OK? Take everything I have! Just take it, just go!
I see him, looks like a male, he doesn't seem injured. That right?
All units, standby for emergency situation.
Well, I guess I keep looking....
Strike Package authorized, all support auth X-Ray Juliet Delta.
You don't have to do this this way, put him down and we can settle this.
Hit had no effect, ready another shell.
Don't you DARE fuckin' shoot me!
Can't talk right now, Dispatch -- I'm a little busy!
ZEUS is terminated, all teams stand down. Whiskey and X-Ray Units RTB.
Holy shit -- guys, anybody see anything? Guys?
Taking us out! Hold on, we're moving.
No point, Red Crown.... Bring the Package home.
I ain't got time for this.
ZEUS has disengaged and is moving covertly.
japanese: ZEUSが逃亡、夜闇に隠れ移動している。

english: Uh, missiles are programmed, awaiting targets.
Teams Bravo and Oscar, coordinate search, do you copy?
Go status Red. Situation is still critical.
Shit! Oh, shit! He's one of ours!
I mark this as a body, Dispatch. Put it in the forensic pipeline.
Deploying additional support into place, be with you ASAP, over.
Target has successfully lost us, let's pack it in.
Tornado One's hit! We're going down! We're going down!
Do you HAVE to do that?
Belay free firing. We are clear of primary and terminating containment, over.
For fuck's sake, get control of yourselves! It's ridiculous!
Got contacts at twelve, nine, three o'clock -- they're fucking everywhere!
Tell me someone else saw that?
And that's how that story ends, bro.

japanese: 伏せろ！

english: Oh, come on, not like this!
We'll make another pass and see what's down there.
Circle around and flank it. Down in thirty! Down in thirty!
This is Containment One, we have a priority situation. Get me air support!
Field Teams deployed, on site and awaiting orders, over.
Arm up the bug spray, let's terminate!
Red Crown, target select data is in the net, keep hitting the big one and let the rest take care of themselves.
Zero power. Voodoo confirmed to punch Elvis.
Satellite update, do we have an exfil, Red Crown, advise, over.
Red Crown, we've confirmed activation of the Father Device. It's live and counting. We're looking at minutes.
Pulling out of area, Dispatch. Suspect has gone.
We nearly bought it, Red Crown, permission to pull back.
Grab your gear and get the fuck out -- she's gonna blow!
We got a positive on our main target. Request strike south of our coordinates, over.
They said he's armed. Keep back!
Voodoo Seven commencing search pattern Zulu. One Three Zero heading, over.
This is a suspect of highest threat. Use extreme caution.

japanese: 来たぞ！

english: Get away! It's those fucking things!
They track red, they find Mercer. We'll find that son of a bitch soon.
Red Crown, this is Sigma. Jackpot is on site, perimeter is secure and we are ready to deploy, over.
japanese: レッドクラウン,こちらSigma。 成功だ。 安全の確保を確認、これより展開する。 オーバー。

english: I think Highball Six just took the dead pool, shit-eaters.
Impact, impact. We're here, we're still here!
Oh, you really are something else.
Shit, this is gonna hurt like hell.
Unit Twelve Seven reporting priority engagement target at Seven Three Zero Kilo. You copy that?
Drop the team off and let them finish the job.
Tango heading South. Strike Team called to Delta Quadrant to intercept.
I see it, but it'll still die just fine. Hit it again.
You DIE now! All of you!
We'll run it. Hold for our report, over.
You are down for the count, motherfucker!
Thanks, Ghost Twelve. We're good here.
What the fuck are you doing!?
Blackjack coming in. We're all clear.
All Units search. Make it happen.
Suspect apprehended or killed, please confirm?
Dispatch, this is Two Juliet Eleven. I'm 10-84, stay tuned.
You want to kill me! Come on! Why me?
This ain't going to be nice.
Dear God, no! What did I do?
Hard to tell. It's right off our left. Left low.
Status update: Subject K. Parker has gone AWOL - Suspected theft of APC tied to disappearance. All units perform a B-Sweep of Sector 32, reel it in men.
Fuck me. That dude's still alive.
Fan out from last sighting, over.

japanese: 行くぞ！

english: Didn't I see you at Site Four?
This is all we have, Mercer. This...and then a hole in the ground. So figure out what you want this side of the hole.
japanese: これが俺たちに用意できる全てでな、マーサー。 これと……墓穴くらいか。 墓穴で欲しい物があったら今のうちに考えとけ

english: We got contact in the Zone, will move to scan.
Dispatch, check my Twenty. Suspect ID'd. Bring in Strike Team.
Confirmed, target down, awaiting new orders.
Echo Five Charlie sit-rep, investigating possible hostile. Will advise.
We got an image, I'm gonna fire, over.
Get us to safe range, driver, we're in too deep here.
RC, RC, this is Roller Dog Seven, we are engaging hostiles.
Calling Special Weapons and Tactics! Come back with confirmation, over.
I know exactly how to drive this thing.
Yeah, Red Crown, we've got movement.
What the fuck is he doing?
Ahhh! Get this fucker off me!
I've been looking forward to this.
Confirmed, Alpha and Delta Teams reporting failure to acquire target.
Probably nothing, but I'm going to look.
OK, now I need a ride.
Red Crown, confirm launch of strike to this location, over.
Hold up, hold up. The signal's getting weaker. New bearing.
Go for kill, step on it.
Who's the nearest to Bravo Zulu Three Four?
Hostiles, Red Crown. We got hostiles, varied composition, copy?
Red Crown, we have lost target. Permission to return to base, over.
Roger, RC, ZEUS' back in the Zone, over.
Check your fire! It's holding a Civilian!
Don't touch anything. They probably want forensics.
Strike Package at Lima Eight Niner Zero. Danger close.
Ohh, I wish I hadn't seen that.
One virus.  Three weeks.   Millions dead.  And I was there.    My name was Alex Mercer.  And my work is almost done.
japanese: 1つのウイルス、3週間、100万の死者。 そして俺はここにいた。 俺の名前はアレックス・マーサー。 そして俺の仕事はほとんど終わった。

english: Target down, Thunder reporting mission complete, over.
Use the visuals to select possibles, over.
Looks like luck was on our side today.
There! There, man! Do you see?
Can I get a patch to keyhole? ZEUS bolted.
Advise no targets remaining. Permission to return to the palace.
Red Crown, we've scoured the Zone. It's not here. Knives sheathed.
Red Crown, he's gone. Send us a new locale, over.
Officer rank and above only get inside. Barker tried to go in for a piss and now he's in the stockade.
What are you going to throw at me next, huh? WHAT DO YOU WANT FROM ME?!?!
japanese: 次は何を俺にぶん投げるつもりだ、ああ？ どうしてほしいってんだよ？！？！

english: Launcher extended, awaiting coordinates, do you copy?
This is Charlie Nineteen, suspect is on the run!
It's over, it's God damn over!
Target Zone remodeled, this is a signoff from Roller Seven.
I am not infected, OK! Test me! Goddamnit, test me!
I should lead them to that military base.
japanese: 奴らをその基地とやらに誘導してやるか。

english: There's no need to panic. Fucking idiots....
Elizabeth Greene has to be the key...
Hey, I think this has been all over the news.
Everyone, I have a priority target, FIRE FIRE!
Chalk Three to Bird-Dogs. Do you have an eye on this guy? We've lost him.
japanese: チョーク3からバードドッグス。 奴の姿が見えるか？ 奴を見失った。

english: Strike Team on point, get a Package in here, boss.
Holy shit! Can't believe I made it out of that one.
Just make sure of your targets, we don't want to get hit.
A number one priority is finding the living.
Restricted area! Down on the ground!
Alert status Yellow. Return to standby positions.
Have I shown you pictures of my boy? Little fucker's getting big.
We got some new guy helping us out today?
Can you see what's going on?
Nearside, nearside engagement. Don't you worry, we'll have a Seven One Three in no time.
Call this location into Red Crown!
Movement. To the left! Check it out!
japanese: 左に移動した。 見つけ出せ！

english: Kill him before he leaves your sight!
Search came up clean, target not in this Zone, over.
We're negative on contact with that...uhhh...large mass. Anyone got a target update?
Crowd numbering in at least the thirties at this time, ah, I will update, over.

japanese: カバーしろ！

english: Not good enough, people. You know what's at stake. All field officers on this channel, I expect a written report by 09:00!

japanese: 下がれ！

english: I hate this waiting and watching shit.
Red Crown, give us a starting point and we'll sweep, over.
Hotrod Unit, this is an exfiltrate general order. Move out, move out all points and rally as assigned. If you were not on your own before, you are now, out.
Chase call resolved, all units acknowledge?
The bodies from the first outbreak are the key.  Blackwatch Specters took them.  Find the Specters, find the bodies - maybe I find some answers.
Base Command is negative on target location.
Request situation update, do you have tactical on comm over?
Heard these guys let two blocks burn downtown. Killed everyone inside. Fuckin' assholes.
We need Hazmat and Medevacs at vector Five Five Two.
ZEUS objective primary, sir. Calling it in.
Strike Team to Zebra grid. Ground Teams set up smoke, over.
japanese: 攻撃チーム横断歩道へ。 地上チーム、スモークを焚け。

english: What's the germ do for a fuckin' encore?
Red Crown to bogey, you are entering secured airspace around the U.S.S. Reagan. Redirect now or we will fire on you.
Lay some fire on that thing!
Continue to pursue ZEUS and auxiliaries.
This isn’t good - there’s only one reason for Blackwatch to pull out of Manhattan - they're going to purge the entire island.
Dispatch, we got him on the run!
Tornado One to Ground. Shake 'em loose, boys.
Ranger Two Seven in the Zone and awaiting tactical, over.
Can anybody hear me out there?
It's picked something up, watch it!
Red Crown, Field Command is compromised. If you weren't on your own already, you are now -- you're completely fucked out there!
This is Package Leader, hostile down, that's a wrap.
Get a Corpsman out here pronto!
Will advise on Strike Package, over.
Welcome to the dead club, buddy.
Move back, get this metal tub outta here.
You got the wrong guy -- this is me!
They don't stop. They just don't stop!
Do not cease fire until my mark.
We'll make another pass and see what's down there.
You're west of the former Target Zone? Standby, I'll relay.
Regroup, team, regroup! Everyone to me!
That's it. Shack his ass out!
I do not read you, Dispatch.
HQ, you better dispatch medics NOW.
Forward fire observe. Pull back, this is gonna be a big one.
One more, we might throw a tread.
Good work, but now they know you're after them. Head down to the second Red Zone and finish it up quickly.
On approach. Prepare for deploy, hang tight, ropes ready.
Thunder Four Five, our eyes are wide, over.
Hostile is within defensive parameters. Base threat status Red, out.
We have contacts. This is what you're trained for, Marines!
Requesting heavy attack in the Kill Box. Target marked, over.
Save Mercer a spot in the science lab.
Red Crown, this is Ranger Two Seven. Target in sight!
You see those operators? Answer me this: why ain’t WE wearing NBC gear?
Hold the area, I'll radio this in.
Getting to range, one more shot!
Hold the line, Red Crown, Seven in the shit.
All the vehicle crews are inside, attending a briefing.
*exhales* I thought we'd seen the last of this.
When military close in, please treat wounded civilians as first responders. Marines are priority to engage threats.
Dispatch, suspect ID'd. Advise support of my position.
Somebody, help me! I think I'm dying!
Strike Package is en route. Hold tight.
What is it with those motherfuckers? What are they building?
I wish I hadn't seen that.
Red Crown, I have multiple targets. Repeat, multiple targets.
Watch the Hammer! We can't let it go down! Delta Squad, move up and take the flank! MOVE! MOVE!
japanese: ハマーに注意しろ！ 俺たちじゃ倒せないんだからな！ デルタ、横に回れ！ 行け！ 行け！

english: We have a positive. ZEUS is terminated. All teams standby.
It'll be a God damn bloodbath.
Shit, we gotta pull back, we're in too close!
We got a body here. Let's clean it up.
Sir? Please! Wait a minute. Sir! I'm not going to do ANYTHING. Just let me explain.
We're here to engage the enemy, so let's find 'em.
Abort the SD op. Return to rally points, over.
I know the streets. I can help you guys.
We need more firepower! Bring us a Strike!
Come on, man, Semper Fi! I'm with you!
Getting to range, one more shot!
You don't have to kill me. Serve and protect!
Just ghosts. That's a negative on contact, Control.
OK, people - we're clean across the board. McMullen inbound.
All scans show nothing. Field ops, you got anything?
You've pissed me off for the last time, motherfucker.
Green light on squad deployment. Get some teams into the field, over,
I don't see that, where is he, over.
Thunder Seven is hit! Offset. Offset. We are ditch digging! SAR, please! SAR, PLEEEEASE!
Hostile is buried, Red Crown, mission complete.
We can't save him, KILL ZEUS.
Helping? That thing has killed dozens if not hundreds of our men. Engage the enemy with lethal force. Terminate ZEUS.
Red Crown deploying a heavy to your locale. Stand clear, over.
Don't shoot! Hold on, wait a minute'!
Next time, call the army -- straight outta the box.
Who the fuck is that?  He's not one of us.
Send Strike Package. We will shadow target.
Expect your backup at any second.
All Fire Teams, sweep is off, standby.
Red Crown to all Command Units. We have a Cat Zero containment breach. Blacklight protocols are now in effect. Out.
It's going to need another shot!
Come on, I'm hurt, leave me be!
Those snake things are here. Opel, feed the gun-ships target coordinates.
Situation critical, we are go for containment and awaiting the signal, over.
Commencing recon on that report, over.
Send in Ground Forces for confirmation, but that looks like a splash.
Who needs help!? Who needs help!
Haw, we're Devil Dogs, we don't die so easy!
Don't let them get to CQ!
Hold comm, we're in the thick, Red Crown.
OK, do it! You bring it, motherfucker!
Field Team, confirm target is down!
We lost it. We're blind. Boss, you want us to kill this one? Over.
Damn it! What did he do to me...?
Approach the perp with extreme caution. He is a threat.
You better make SURE you kill me.
You're thinking out your ass! Hold it!
I can't see! I can't see a fucking thing!
Oh, man. Gunny, we gotta talk.
Charlie Nineteen to all other units. Suspect has escaped. Keep your eyes open.

japanese: 身を隠せ！

english: Aw...damn it. It's dead, it's dead....
Let's move, boys, we gotta pull out.
Get that thing off us! Get it off!
I wish I hadn't seen that.
Target down, Ghost reporting mission complete, over.
Red Crown, target is not down, over.
There's gonna be a lotta heat coming our way.... Let's just get this shit done and stay frosty.

japanese: カバーしろ！

english: Look out! The tank's out of control!
Intel indicates goal has shifted. Trail is cold.
How can we check that's him?
Dispatch, I've locked in on the motherfucker. I'm going in!
I beg you! Don't kill me! I'll do anything!
I-I-I'll give you whatever you want! I will!
That red stuff is spreading fast. Person to person.  Building to building.  Street to street. It has to be connected to Elizabeth Greene.
10-4 that. Target has been confirmed down. Ready the body for transport, over.
Site status is negative, Dispatch. Awaiting reassignment.
Sweep the deck. Clear the entire fucking area. Gunship Teams go parallel, fixed wing do longitudinal passes. Make it happen!
It's a cold situation here. We're coming in.
Hold fire, look for the target and confirm, over.
We gotta ditch it! Pop the hatch!
Now's my chance to go down!
Search and destroy op, eyeballs open, confirm.
Mercer?  Hold fire - he seems to be helping us out.
Shit. UAV overflight Sector Seven is down. Can you swing some engineers over there, check it out? Over.
Units have broken visual. Requesting priority Search Team at Alpha Two Seven, over.
Hard target search, on my mark, fall out.
Come around on that. Looks like somebody grabbed the taco, over.
It's going down, don't let up! Continuous!
That's it. Bring the strike home, over.
Oh, I don't believe this shit.
Driver, pull us out of range, now.
Stay focused! We've got a shitload of movement inside that thing!
Is that how you treat people?
Hive marked on the net. Looks fresh.
Tango's at the west, we have a hostile force moving up.
You got the wrong guy -- this is me!
This is Thunder, we are taking it to target, over.
Eagle Wing now on BARCAP, we'll orbit hot. Feed us targets and we will deploy.
That's a confirmed solid. Looks good, standby and check for survivors.
Other memories, not mine - but connected.
Bravo Team, grab the flank and clean out the Runners. Alpha, move to Foxtrot and unleash hell!
Artillery has been hit, we are relocating to Engineer Team.
Fret no longer, Dogs, Guardian Angel entering Target Zone.
Enemy location? Pfft, no fucking idea, sir.
Target located. Gonna bump-up, over. Confirmed at this time.
Fill me in on the situation.
Tornado Flagholder to Red Crown, unable to re-acquire target. Where do you want us next?
Thermal shows he's got something, over.
I'll blow your fucking head off! FREEZE!
I SAY AGAIN, DANGER CLOSE AT MY POSITION. SUSTAIN FIRE. TARGETS MARKED FOR INFRA RED AND LASER, OVER.
Get the fuck out of here!
What the hell are they doing?
I don't know how much more that thing can take. Shit.
Firing on count, payload HOT, over.
We got our war on here, clear this channel!
Roller Niner Three Alpha from Red Crown confirmed, we are backing off target area, nobody there.
No! Nooo! No, OK? No, no!
Step back from the perimeter or I will shoot.
Get some Birds in here to evac our wounded, over.
We've got a red-on-red situation here, let 'em take each other out!
I got all the back up I need right here.
He's not here. Work the grid.
Red Crown, request strike on target two hundred meters north of our Twenty. We'll mark our position with smoke, over.
Voodoo Seven here, I got juice for three more circles then I got to bug out.
What the fuck is wrong with that tank?
Enemy has been neutralized. All clear.
Hold the center! Drive them back!
Pickup is getting stronger. Stay alert.
Punch it, punch it! Get us in the air!
That's it. We got the target!

japanese: クソ！

english: It's all quiet now, Red Crown, returning to base, over.
Alert status Red to Yellow. We are clear of engagement.
ZEUS is neutralized, get spot teams on it.
God damn fuckin' assholes. How come we have to fuckin' walk everywhere?
Voodoo Team, form up on me. We're going in again.
Relay ground teams, find cover and clear Target Zone!
I'm not finished here. Not yet.
We’ve got a target on the deck. OPEN UP!
It's all for you, baby. All for you.
Copy that. We'll roll by and take a look, over.
Ending scan at Foxtrot One Niner, over.
Officers are reporting a tactical resolution, we're open for new business.
Nobody leaves. Nobody leaves alive, anyway.
Field Units, orders from HQ are clear: do NOT handle the body. Maintain a perimeter and await advisory.
The whole area, all of it. Boss only wants gas mains and water pipes.
Move in and check that out!
Negative, negative at this time, over
Tornado Command, weapons away, good fire. You got visual on a hit? Over.
Clear remaining targets. This isn't over yet.
Kill Package, Strike Package to this location, over.
Check that, was that civvies in the Fire Zone?
We can't save him, kill that fucker!
This is crazy -- which one is he?
It's goin' down, it's goin' down!
Those fuckin' spooks are rolling out some new detection network. I bet they give us fuckin' cancer.
That’s the halfway mark. You must be killing them in their beds, Alpha Four. Field Team, you need to keep that pump going. Out.
They seem to be rallying to that Hive.... Permission to call in a Strike Team to squash that group.

japanese: フーア！

english: Look up there, more of them!
Officer rank and above only get inside. Barker tried to go in for a piss, now he's in the stockade.

japanese: クソ！

english: I'll take all the God damned help we can get.
Tell me you guys are all right, over.
Ghost Stallion Four Four to ground, confirm status of target.
Dispatch, this is Charlie Nineteen. That's negative.
We are tracking red, uploading target data.
Munition system compromised, get behind the front line.
Pull out of there, it's just too hot.
Agh, my back.  It feels like it's feeding on me.
japanese: ぐああ、背中が……。 まるでコイツに食われてるみてえだ。

english: Zone Twelve, that's negative on site. He's gone.
Ready some HEAT. Hold for my command, over.
That's it. You sure that's him?
Let me go! I'm innocent! Please!
Hostile is down. Repeat, down, over.
Hostile on board, shake it off!
Pulling out. All Intel is down. Heavy casualties! If anyone can hear me, pull out of station now and regroup at PALACE!
The main Hive structure is the Hammer's primary objective.

japanese: 報告しろ！

english: Good God. Let the Chaplain know.
Updating the net. Wait for update, over.
Don't hold back boys - things could go either way from here.

japanese: ディナ！ くそっ！

english: We got visitors dead ahead. Look like hostiles.
Warning. You are leaving safe airspace. Turn your aircraft around immediately.
Negative on engage, I do not have a target.
We are negative on fire, boss. Close up!
I can shoot you and still sleep like a fuckin' baby tonight. Step BACK.
Man, Red Crown, we nearly ate it. Still in.
Whoa, whoa, whoa. Hold on, hold on, hold on, OK. I'm willing to cooperate.
Field Leader, report status of engagement, over.
Repeat last comm. Did not copy.
They're going to be waiting for me. They think they're in control -- but they have no idea what I'm capable of.
I need you to repeat, you have lost contact, is that correct?
Are the cops in on this?
Tornado Five reporting hostile down in the Blue Zone!
Recon sweep complete, nothing to report, over.
Breach, breach, all forces deploy to your Zones. We have a breach.
Carrying a full load, awaiting green light, over.
Some sort of congregation going on down there. Something big has come out under Times Square. Something big and pissed off, over.
Reacquire is possible. Give us tactical, over.
Red Crown, this is Echo One Alpha. Enemy has fucked off!
Red Crown, we got to regroup, over.
Don't let them touch you. If you see a skin, kill everyone.

japanese: 逃げるな、撃て！ 奴を撃て！

english: Confirmed, Red Crown. I'm on it.
Pull us out, driver, get to range.
Mission status Gold! We're done here, returning to base.
All units, 10-80 this one. The grid is clear.
They died, ran, or died running. D-Code, out.
Ah, fuck, would you look at that!
Strike Package en route to treasure chest. Clear the area, this is gonna be a big one.
Don't let me die! Please, you son of a bitch!
Field Units are positive on ZEUS, over.
Cannot comply! We are engaged with hostile, over!
Contact lost, stay on high alert, over.
japanese: 見失った、警戒態勢を維持しろ、どうぞ。
目標と接触。

english: Code November Charlie, Zone is neutralized. Send in the Scrape Team, we're Green for exfiltration, moving out.
New York City just got its ass kicked.
Run, get outta here! Run, run!
Out now or I will fire!
This is a burner fucking palace!
That's enough, Lieutenant. Two new fire missions northeast of that target, redeploy.

japanese: 身を隠せ！

english: Target has left the building, but not confirmed.
What, whoa -- whoa! Hey -- hold it!
Flush him out! No stone unturned.
This unit's down, we're immobile, over.
Step back the alert level. Clear status.
Everyone, remain calm! We are here for your safety!
Keep an eye on him until the cops show up!
Requesting artillery support at exit point 3C! We have a containment breach!
Base surveillance coming up dark on ZEUS locale. Get some coverage on his last reported, fan out from there, out.
Ground, get your men out of the area!
Can't risk another Bird in the Zone, that's out, over.
Ah, air support, the feel-good factor of the modern battlefield. What in the fuck do they even need us for?
What the fuck -- is that a magic trick?
HQ, he just...ZEUS just...aw, fuck it.

japanese: グリーン。

english: Kill Zone nothing but flames, forward team. Crispy critters.
Give me the situation on the ground.

japanese: ワケわかんねえ。

english: Flag as cleared. Delta Command reporting base status clean, negative contact, out.
Doing a follow-up on last known location, over.
We've deployed your emergency units. Hang tight.
Draw a defensive formation around Highball Nine.
Here we go! Find cover and fire! Move!
That thing is shooting at us! Move it!
It's a shitstorm out here! I can't do anything but survive!
Fall back, we'll see if the military net picks them up from here.
You see those operators? Answer me this: why ain’t WE wearing NBC gear?
This is Red Crown. We're back to status White. White status, do you copy?
Watch him! Watch him! Keep away form him!

japanese: あれがヤツだな。

english: All systems are at go. Give me some room. I'm checking it out.
Time's running out, Mercer. Your little friends want to come out to play.
japanese: 時間はあまり無いぞ、マーサー。 お前のかわいいお友達は、外で遊びたがってるようだ。

english: You all heard that. We're moving on it!
Look into your heart. That's all I'm asking. Look into your heart.
Another day in the big apple.
Dispatch, this is Four Hotel Thirty requesting immediate assistance for a 10-53.
It's like a slaughterhouse baking in the sun.
Hit it with everything, fillet that hostile!
That's another one off the net. Get a field engineer out there within the hour, out.
Prepare to engage, wait for my command, over.
Ground Units, get out of range, over.
If you see the suspect, call for backup. Don't go it alone, people.
McMullen to Red Crown. Trail is cold. We're returning to base. Out.
No way is he far from here.
There's a lot of chatter, but some real spatter.
Check all hatches, we don't want any uninvited guests.
This is Blackjack, we're at the meet-up.
japanese: Blackjack隊、交戦地帯へ突入する。
奴らは俺の全てを奪った。

english: Hey, uh, what's all this about?
This is Ghost Tiger One Seven, we are taking it to target, over.
Get out of range, it's going to blow!
Thunder reporting burner down in Target Zone.
Open up on the target. Full ordnance,
Mercer down, send in sample squad.
Concentrate fire on the big one!
No, no, please! Spare me. Anything, please!
Hold RT chatter, I'm in the fight, over.
Damn it. He's lost the scent.
We need assistance over here! *panting* Oh, my God, all services. Send them all.
I think the skins are inside that thing. Looks like where they come from, Dispatch.
Razorback One hit! Still good to fight, over.
Something's out of place. Gonna take a look.
The target has evaded us. Trying to re-acquire, over.
Contact Nine and Three, Nine and Three!
Where is that armor support? Goddamnit!
Got to pull out! Get back!

japanese: くそっ！

english: This is Red Crown, situation is Blue. Primary objective has been met, over.
Sighted! Give me room to get a shot.
Get down with your hands behind your back!
Seven Charlie Seven here, Dispatch. You got my Twenty? We need medical. Some scrape here.
Red Crown, await our all clear, situation critical.
Well, shit. These pantywaists know what they're doing after all.... Move out.
Damn it, the thing was here, I know it was. Report negative to RC.
Kill Zone is clear, mission aborted, over.
Charlie Nineteen. My Twenty is clear. We're done here.
No, no, please! Please, spare me! Please!
It's no good. No good. I-I can't.
I won't die here! I won't!
Mark our position, mark our position. We're going down.
Back up, give him some room!
Gimme a break, man, I was just doing my job!
X-Ray Unit, belay search orders and RTB.
Germ positive, clear the bench and squirt the stench, over.
We lost it. Repeat, target has gone dark.
Booya, burner down. Voodoo Sierra Hotel, over.
Terminating attack run, all clear, over.
Target's down and out. Do you copy?
Get that thing's desig on the net, mark it as hostile!
That helicopter has the sensors I need.
Make it quick, motherfucker! Make it quick!
Firepower on this target, now, now!
Oh, no. Hold them off! I need more time!
Stop now or I will fire!
japanese: 今すぐ止まれ、さもなくば発砲するぞ！

english: I need to disguise myself as one of those suits.... The guy in the alley there looks prime.
System check is at negative, Voodoo out.
Tornado One took some flack but we'll be fine!
Go ahead and do what you can there.
Get on the net, we're under attack!
I'm not ZEUS! You have the wrong guy!
Command, we are losing containment. Permission to pull back to control points!
Signal cold, anyone have a visual? Over.
Looks like the whole God damn swarm is here.
Enemy on all sides, Red Crown, require reinforcements.
In pursuit. Going to free-fire status. Guns up, boys.
Tornado Five entering Target Zone, over. Going to engage at this time.
Strike Boss, Strike Boss, enter the Zone from the south, over.
Keep on it! Keep on it!
Chalk up that kill for the DAWGS!
They think I'm dead.  Good. They'll take me right to McMullen.
Watch where you're going, man! Jesus!
Yeah, we just about got it!
Who are you? Who sent you?
japanese: 誰だお前。 誰の差し金だ？

english: Red Crown, we don't got squat here. Where next? Over.
*coughing* Corpsman!? Over here! Man down! CORPSMAN!!
Roger, this Bird is RTB, killing search, over.
Shots fired. Go tactical. What's the status.
I don't have much money, but take what you want!
Voodoo Seven hit! I'm hit! Holding steady.
I think it's had it, good job.
Confirmed, ZEUS is down. Repeat, ZEUS is down!
This is Red 4. We have spotted Zeus among the infected. Take him out.
You did it, Hennessey. Get you a fucking medal, dude.
Sustained fire! Keep it up! Pour it on that fucker!
Well, it looks like my cover is blown.
Target is neutralized, repeat, target is neutralized.
Strike Boss, I got some shit for you to chew on.
Look at these shits. Fucking Gestapo.
I can't believe what's happening to this city. God damn shame....
ZEUS is at hitchhike, pull the fucking stick!
Sensors detecting possible targets ahead. Having a look.
ZEUS is off the board. DO NOT APPROACH THE CORPSE. REPEAT, DO NOT APPROACH THE CORPSE.
*coughing, sobbing* I think I've been blinded!
Let's do some major damage to it's operations.
We’ve lost ZEUS. Anyone got a positive on him?
All officers, the chase is shut down. CO has called it, over.
All on alert! ZEUS is in the Palace! I repeat, ZEUS is in the Palace!!
All units, Field Command is on alert. Unknown target detected.
OK, I'm going to need some armor if I'm going to get Karen out of here in one piece.
Target update, all points target update, we have hostiles on the Reagan upper deck. Targets will be marked, make that first approach count.
Perfect time to deploy. I am confirmed on visual and thermal.
Any longer and we woulda been toast. Drop this net, over.
Requesting fire on our position. Now, damn it.
Commencing search pattern Zulu, repeat, Zulu.
Hostile is down. Repeat. Hostile is down.
We got him, we got him! This one!
So this is where Bloodtox comes from.
Oh, God. This can't be happening.
Hey -- back the fuck away from him!
Dispatch, we're gettin' killed down here!
You are entering a posted "no" Zone.
Thermal image showing your target. Strike Team, you're clear.
Assault complete, target down. Bury those red shits.
Requesting barrage Grid Eight Eight Five Five Nine Nine. Authorization Alpha Echo Sierra Niner Four. Priority.
ZEUS protocols are no longer in effect.
Dispatch, this is Charlie Nineteen. That's negative.
We have investigation orders, saddle up.
Initiate complete fire control system -- everything.
Strike Package a success, coming home.
Unit, report. Give me some good news?
Red Crown, Tornado Alpha Two. We have target contact confirmed.
Ranger Two Seven Bravo moving into position, over.
Oh, God, it's going to kill 'em!
We're hit, We're hit, running diagnostics, over.
We can only take so much more of this, Red Crown!
This is Racecar leader to Hotrod Leader, Brawlers in the Zone, proceed with extreme caution. Hostiles confirmed.
Fire Team, my position, move it!
Chalk Three to Red Crown. Numerous hostiles at our coordinates, bearing on us now. Get some fire on them!
Needle just jumped off the scale Red Crown...shit, he's here!
All units, I have lost contact with suspect.
Good Christ, what the fuck is that?
Locking on target, we have a wildfire at the building, over.
Assuming attack formation, Red Crown, over.
Uh, Roller Team, relocate and smoke the entire target area.
Running a perimeter scan, Red Crown.
Please, carry me. Take me with you.
Red Crown, we got reports down here of ZEUS on-site. Can you confirm, over?
Are we sure of the target?
We are dealing with a real sick fuck, guys.
Report is we have a fire in the loading bay. Make sure you don't let that 120mm cook off!
All targets down, ground to confirm, over.
Fuckin' assholes. How come we have to fuckin' walk everywhere?
All right! We got the target!
Call in a Science Team. It's not moving.
Delta Unit, unless you're seeing anything in the west side, I suggest we close down the search, over.
Approaching target vector, Voodoo Seven is go for engagement.
Got you. That's everyone back to patrol, Dispatch out.
This is Tornado Five, weapons hot and target highlighted.
Alert status is now Gray. Stand down.
HQ, we found people. What WERE people, anyway.
Retreating. We gotta pull back, Red Crown.
Red Crown, operation complete. Ranger, out.
Stalker Six Zero, RTB immediately or you will be fired upon.
Support military ground forces in your operational area at your discretion.
Say again, repeat, say again, out.
I need witnesses to come forward! Are there any witnesses?
Imminent fire. Friendlies clear the Zone, over.
Clear the area! Get out of here!!
No one leaves! He's here somewhere.
Isn't that Mercer? What the fuck is going on here!?
We have a surfacing. Priority target, hit it!
Squad, squad. Anyone got an eye on what's happening below?
I don't wanna see that thing ever again.
Send us an R -- save who you can out here.
Look up there, more of them!
We're in-bound on your location, Field Team, assuming offensive posture, over.
Tally, tally. Confirmed on mission status, we're complete, over.
That's a negative on target visual, over.
Oh, whoa, man. I gotta take a picture.
Red Crown, positive ID, send in a Package.
Rifle platoons are in the field, armor on standby. We're running here Red Crown, out.
Strike Package on our Twenty, repeat, Strike here now!
Frontline One Five Four is not responding. Possible radio malfunction.
Red Crown, Ranger Two Seven has lost target.
Red 4 reporting - battle is turning in our favour.
Does anybody see this? Somebody, stop him! Kill him!
Help has arrived gentlemen - let's get moving.
Everything's shacked, Red Crown. Should we withdraw?
New picture: target is off the board. You'll be updated momentarily.
Well, look who's coming our way.
They're calling that ZEUS is hit, sir.
We'll save you, buddy, don't worry!
Sweep cold, repeat, sweep cold, over.
All units, confirm clear contact status.
Holy fuck. Cortez!! Where the fuck are you, man!?
Give it up, ladies. We're done here, out.
C'mon, go time. Move, move, move.
Red Crown, the target is still standing.
What's your delay there, Ghost Twelve? Orders are RTB, OUT.
I'm still alive. That's the best I can say.
It's him! I know it's him!
Alpha Zone is cleared. Strike Boss, bring your team in to Citadel for regroup.
Arty is on station and ready for orders, over.
Here come the fuckin' bad guys.
All units, prepare for ambush engagement.
Is there anyone willing to give a statement?
Everyone, if this thing is infected, you had better all leave.
Charlie Company Command to Red Crown. Defensives have held. Request evac of wounded to Palace, out.
Get forensics out here. We have a body.
Slipped from our sights again, Red Crown.
EMS is delayed by blocked traffic, we're going to add another to your Twenty.
Who do you think you're messing with!?!
I'll send some cruisers to check the perimeter, see if we pick him up again.
Holy shit. What the hell was that?
This is not the last field base.
Red Crown, primary target is down, repeat, down, over.
Confirmed, all teams switch to dark mode. We are clear at this time, over.

japanese: 下がれ！

english: I need to destroy as many of them as I can before they can ramp up their defenses.
Whatever happened to that building, it's out of control.
Is there anyone willing to give a statement?
Attention unidentified aircraft, you are deviating from assignment and must return to safe distance. Do not attempt to leave the Manhattan airspace.
We got back-up coming? Cuz we need a LOT of it.
It's probably nothing, but I want to check it out.
Ground Units, Code Seven, use caution.
We've got what looks like a 10-66.
Red Crown from Tornado One, mission accomplished.
Target on sights, Kill Box defined. Copy?
Charlie Nineteen pulling out, Dispatch. Nothing here.
*sob* Oh, God, I'm blind. Oh, God, I'm BLIND!
Fuck, we're on fire, we're on fire!
Sit-rep, Field Team. Where is he?

japanese: 入るか。

english: The cops want this guy bad!
Ugly turds sighted. You have no idea how useful napalm would be in this town.
Give us a new location, lost visual, over.
All units are reporting in. Standing by.
Contacts, eastern sector, eastern sector. Visual confirmation!
Gunship Three. Gunship Three Five Two Nine, priority air strike is go. You have clearance to open fire.
Aw, fucking hell. Don't do this, man!
It goes right through your Kevlar.
Are you lookin' for a night in jail?
Do not let them past the perimeter!
This is Red Crown Command, we've lost Times Square control points. Any available units respond. Do you copy? Over.
Mission complete. I don't know about you guys but I need a drink.
Don't go far. He's around here somewhere.
A few more fires to put out. Otherwise we're done, out.

japanese: ディナ！ ここにいるんだな。

english: Red Crown, I have priority one fire target. Your call, over.
Save me! I can't feel my legs!
Punch in on that, see if you can see what he just did.

japanese: リロード！ リロード！

english: Multiple COPPERHEADS sighted! Keep them away from Hammer Daddy!
Now, I can analyze this one and hopefully tell you how you can kill it.
Red Crown to Strike Boss, mission status dark, return to base, over.
More fucking reds. Punch it, Johnny.
Blackjack to Red Crown, Bravo Strike complete.
Sustain on the mark. Lock it in.
What do you want with me!? Why me?
Emergency services are en route. Standby.
Sweep Team Alpha Juliet, report. Patrol report. We've lost contact with Patrol Alpha Juliet, sir.
Oh, fuck, he's inside the vehicle!
So cold. I can't feel anything anymore.
Folks, could I get you to calm down, please!
Sector Foxtrot is empty. Lima the same, do you want to pull the plug, Command?
If ZEUS was here, I'd have found him.
Escalating the Kill Box, ready to fire.
Scanners drawing a blank, anyone have visual?
I say again, we have enemy in the wire, Palace is hot, elevate, elevate.

japanese: フーア！

english: All units are negative on assigned target.
Red Crown, mission complete, Package Bravo RTB.
We've been hit. Ranger Two Seven Bravo has been hit!
This is Three Victor Twenty-Two, I have suspect on visual, request assistance.
Going in for a look-see, over.
Target status? Tell me that worked, over.
Blackjack, requesting Strike Package in the Red Zone.
Voodoo Seven, punching his ticket. Making holes.
Unit, call report. Is it ongoing?
It's hooked on, shake it off!
I have possible situation change here, can anyone say what that is, over.

japanese: 身を隠せ！

english: Tactical indicates north side has inbound forces. Be aware.
No, it's not fucking me, I swear it!
You're in a "no entry" Zone. Turn around now!
Keep your trigger fingers hot. I'm moving in to take a closer look.
Augh, taken heavy damage! That's us hit.
We're contact free, ZEUS just vanished, over.
We've done it. One and two is complete.
This is Red Crown requesting sit-rep, over.
You can't be here. Get yourself gone.
Waiting for me, hm?  So Karen Parker sold me out.
Hostile down and out, do you copy?
ZEUS is gonna unleash, back off!
Is this going ER or morgue? Confirm.
I'm just a bystander! Please! Don't kill me!
Suspect can't be far. Find him.
Razorback One, moving to fire position!
Get inside and lock the doors. They're coming!
It's not your fault, dude. It is not your fault.
Yeah, I think I'm still good to fight!
One Adam Nineteen. Adam Nineteen. I got a positive on hostiles.
All units are negative on assigned target.
Next time ZEUS pops up, I'll look to you, OK?
Chalk Three to Red Crown. Subject temporarily eluded us. Trying to re-locate, over.
Enough, it's time to take a fall.
Field Team has sent GPS co-ords to me, ready to head up Strike.
Hey"," what's going on? Can you see?"
All units are reporting in place.
This is Voodoo Seven. No sign of target. Recall the Package, Red Crown.
Huh. I never liked that guy anyway.
Shit, the whole damn building's gone.
Get back! Get back! Get back!
Tell me someone got a picture of that.
Shovel that in a box and burn it.

japanese: 撃っていいんですか？ いいんですか？

english: What the fuck are you doing!?
Intel reports contact, contact, action stations!
Now there's something in the air. I can sense it.
Dispatch. Got some sort of hardened facility here. Seriously, this shit just ain't right.
Nothing left to fire at, we are returning.
RC, we have lost vehicle controls.
Authentication code accepted. Artillery inbound. Keep your heads down. This is going to be a big one.
Trail is cold, over. Negative contact.
Beginning orbit of target area, over.
Ground from air. Target disappeared. Light it up for us, if you can.
Shit, man, I'm one of you! What are you doing!?
Oh, shit. It's a fucking nightmare!
This is Charlie Nineteen -- I got movement on my Twenty. Stand by for update.
Everybody ready, it's here. Anyone got movement? Over.
We've lost visual. Anyone back there see anything?
On duty. What you got here?
Blackwatch will know where the bodies are.
Roller Three Seven requests FO target adjustment, over.
Red Crown, confirm pack-up of strike, over.
Eyes on Mercer, take him out if he tries anything.
All clear on the ground here.
The whole fucking building's infected. Get anti-armor on the structure.
Attention incoming aircraft, you are OFF the approved flight roster. Turn around and seek quarantine-friendly Landing Zone.
Fully armed and systems tracking, over.
Our goals and priorities have not changed.
Glad to help, Red Crown, at your service.
He's in on this. He's dead.
I'm going in. Give me space!
*sob* Oh, God, I'm blind. Oh, God, I'm BLIND!
Watch your Six, Ground, target is packing.
Don't force me to shoot you!
We're losing our stronghold here, Red Crown. Base is seriously damaged, Captain is dead. I'll keep things going as long as we can, out.
Red Crown, the target is down and out, over.
Hotrod Two Six come in, over.... Red Crown, lost another, over.
No, no! That HAS to be him!
Whiskey Team reporting mission complete. Area clear.
Voodoo Seven Bingo, I'm leaving the party, out.
Contact with burners at this Twenty, do you copy? Kill, kill, kill!
Strike, strike, we have a field call, relay to operational.
Think about this. You don't need to kill me.
Nice try. Now it's my turn.
Target has dropped off the grid, RC.
This doesn't look good, Red Crown.
OK, people, get your shit together and move out. Let's get this thing to Times Square, NOW!
japanese: よし、全員準備はいいな。 タイムズスクエアまでこいつを運ぶぞ、行け！

english: Field support authorization Godlike. Deploy fire on my Twelve. Fire until expended.
Hostile located. We need support at our position ASAP.
Too bad you're fuckin' stupid and I'm smart.
Red Crown, confirm launch of Strike to this location, over.
I'm taking as many of them with me as I can.
I think I'm cut! Fuck, am I cut?
Blackjack Two, taking hits, still functional, over.
japanese: Blackjack 2、やられたがまだ動作する、どうぞ。

english: This is a God damn crime.
Clear that flag, suspect is in custody or neutralized. File reports and return to assignments.
Contact on the ground. Large crowd of red, over
Thunder Four Five commencing sweep, over.
Base Command Yankee Sierra Two Eight reporting all systems online. We are now fully fortified, Red Crown.
Be alert, hostile's on the move, over.
Get the one in the open, get the one in the open, over.

japanese: うまくやったな。 騙されんぞ
さあ、行くぜ！

english: Watch for ricochet, keep your distance!
Ranger Two Seven with positive I-dent of target, over.
Losing the stick. Red Crown, mark our location, we are going in hard!
Confirmed, Red Crown, FIREBALL has been overrun. I repeat, FIREBALL has been overrun. Looks like no survivors.
Red Crown, we got reports down here of ZEUS on-site, can you confirm, over?
I don't know what this is, but I know it's not good. Some sort of fortification.
Get us back, it's gonna throw it!
Rocketbox down! We got to bail!
That's confirmed here, Command. You're gonna need something heavier to pierce this material.
japanese: 目標を確認。 だがこいつを粉砕するにはもっと強力な兵器が必要になりそうだ。

english: Target the vehicle. ZEUS has jacked in.
Dispatch, we're gettin' killed down here!
Watch the rear! Check your Six!
Hostile has escaped the perimeter. Mobile Team, snap to pursue and contain.
Move it. I will open fire!
Hostile is down. Bring those units back in. We're closing this shop for good, standby.
Situation touch-and-go, backing out! Cover our ass.

japanese: 現在、奴を追跡中です、どうぞ。

english: Hold it! Step back slowly, hands up!
Oh, don't kill me! Don't kill me!
Holy fuck, it's this guy! SHOOT!
We got a fuckin' germ fort.
Red Crown advises: maintain unit integrity during search profile.
Never seen this much debris, shit.
Negative on copy, RC, you're squawking.
We're running an integrated grid search.
Dispatch, you have this place marked for forensic, already?
I wish I hadn't fuckin' seen that.
Call it off, we got nothing, over.
Oh, no. Not these things again.
Clear the area! Get out of here!!
I read you, Sending additional forces to your location, out.
How many does SAT show on-site? Danger of an overrun here -- send in whatever you've got. If it can kill skins, load it and fire it at my target, sustain for effect.
Circle that, see if you can get some fire on it.
Enemy in building, we can't get 'em, turn around.
Tornado Five ready to unleash, movement confirmed.
Strike Package Bravo is away. Repeat, Bravo is away.
Let them pass. Something's caused this, we'll kill it.
You better get on the fuckin' ball son.
japanese: キサマは玉なしか。

english: Sterilization Team to HQ. We’ve reached the hive core but the doors are blocked by debris. We’re stuck until we can find a way around
Just a little more - they're nearly finished.
I'm getting nothing from the bogey. We've got to shoot it down.
Clear of contact here, Red Crown.
Red Crown, awaiting go-code. Confirm, over.
We're edging it boys. Keep it coming.
Dispatch, something's out here. Will update via radio contact.
Gonna roll in for a look, over.
Hey, wa -- watch where you're going!
You got status on that target, over?
We've got an unusual incident reported. Come back with update patrol, over.
Call 911. We need to help these people!
I said they're gonna kill us!
Just ignore it. I'll deal with it.
japanese: 無視しろ。 俺が片づける。

english: Blackjack positive, we have our target, over.
Goin' in for a look-see, over.
Tox perimeter is compromised. We now have multiple openings, be aware, updates on your BF interface.
In pursuit, going to free-fire status.
He can't keep all of us fooled.
Keep up the pressure and LOOK.
I'd report that, if I knew what to call it.
I lost them. Now to get to the Safe house.
He's pinned down, get something nasty!
Charlie Nineteen alerting all points, suspect is on the run.
Get him now, while he's distracted!
Weapons primed, give us a target, over.
Red Crown, we gotta relocate, over.
All BW teams. The ZEUS protocol has ended.
Confirmed strike. Strike Team Bravo, return, over.

japanese: 伏せろ！

english: Listen to me. Check the area again, find him. Do you copy?
Red Crown, your new TOC is fully functional and awaiting orders over.
Contact on the target. Ping it again.
