We are unleashing on target, Red Crown.
He's close. I fuckin' know it.
Charlie Nineteen reporting, Dispatch. 10-84 and going in.
Punch it, now. Get us outta here.

japanese: 下がれ！

english: Copy that ambulance request, Dispatch out.
McMullen's not going to show in an area with such high readings.
japanese: マクマレンは高い数値を示すエリアには現われない。

english: What are you going to do, buddy?
I fuckin' got him. I got him!
Hey, anything you can walk away from.
Suspect has fled northbound at this time. Will confirm.
ZEUS is contained -- permanently. Over and out.
Give him some space. Back up.
I have it on radar, everyone back off and leave it to me.
We're coming in. ZEUS has gotten away clean.
Red Crown, unconfirmed contact on assignment area perimeter. Hold form.
We've taken fire. Repeat, taken fire.
I need to pick up those Marines.
D-Codes are near. Hope we won't need 'em.
No units are in contact with ZEUS at this time.
Watch out for those fuel tanks! Clear the God damn area!
I want a unit briefing. Yesterday!
Bravo Base this is Squad Y-Y. We've got some sort of wild fucking animals loose on the streets here. We need air support.
I'll need an APC to get Karen out -- but I'll need get acquainted with someone who can drive one of these tanks first.
Enabling on-board scanners, eyes wide, over.
Those scanners won't find me but they’ll pick up my trace around Dana's safe-house. I have to stop them.
Red Crown, we are knee deep in dead fucks. Truck in some champagne.
Can you repeat that? Last transmission was not clear, over.
Sustain on that target. It's ready to drop.

japanese: ここから逃げなければ。

english: Hey, what are you doing? I'm a cop!
We have the package -- tell McMullen I'll put a bow on it.
AE. Two Heavy, payload delivered. We're out.
Roller Unit is back on line, good morning.
Yeeeee-ow! Motherfuckers been done in, Red Crown! That's a big 10-4!! Woo-hoo!
japanese: Yeah！ くそ野郎はやったぜ、レッドクラウン！ りょーかいだぜ！

english: Ghost group, fall back. That's an order.
Red Crown, we have defeated our enemy and are coming home.
This is where we should go. I'll mark it for you.
Yeah, yeah. You getting your exercise, there?

japanese: やれ！ やれ！

english: Break formation! Break formation and engage weapons free!
Command requesting update from the field. Give us a sit-rep, over.
Lock on target, prepare to fire.
Seeing some instrument flutter. You seeing that, Two Three?
Dispatch! He just took off! Charlie Nineteen in pursuit!
Hit! Red across the board. Going down!
We got our hands full, Red Crown.
HELP ME! HELP MEEE! No! *sobbing* No, please! HELLLP MEEE!
I don't know what happened to me...but I like it!
Oh, shit. We need fire and medical.
We're right on top of him -- I can sense it.
Imperative we return to base, over.
Come back! Did not copy your last, over.
Hey! Hey! Did you see that!?
Gotta get him out of there...
japanese: 引きずり出してやる……。

english: Make that thing bleed! MAKE IT DEAD!
Fucker got Mikey. I want his position.
Red Crown this is Chalk Three. We've acquired the target. Request Strike support to our Twenty ASAP!
Got my laser coordinates ready, just need it to poke it's head out.
Hey, outta my way, let me see!
Move in and finish this one. Fucking savage.
Red Crown, I'm in deep here, nearly took one, over.
Bulldog -- engaging with full weapon complement.
Help! HELP! I need some help here!
Take another fucking step and you die!
Are you kidding!? You're kidding, right!?
Please, no. SOMEBODY! Don't do it, man!

japanese: 根性出せ！

english: Thunder Four Five, reporting all clear.
Air support -- if ANYONE can hear me on this line, we need urgent fire support NOW. This is it!
Cancel Red status. We are all clear. Regroup, Field Units.
Intel update, large hostile force to the west. Inbound on your position.
I'd keep as far back as possible!
Do not approach, let BW Field Teams check it out.
Priority fire mission underway. Hunker down, folks.
It's like I know where I need to be, and I'm there. And my...my instincts take over.
Cannot find target, ISU shows empty screen, over
Target has armed, hit it now.
Thunder Four Five in Kill Zone, over.
Scanners have something! Yeah, we're on it! Going hot.
This is Tornado Delta, burners sighted!
Please. I'm not ready to die.
Red Crown, Popping the hatch for a visual. Stand by.

japanese: こん畜生！ なんだってんだ？

english: What do you want with me!?
Either we scared it off, or it's somewhere else waiting.
We have a repeat customer, FO.
I beg you! Oh, dear God. Why like this?
Everyone, get out of its way!
Red Crown, the target is still standing.
You bastard! You God damn bastard.
They got Zeus on their side - take him out!
Burners on the ground at Zero Three Five, over.
Dispatch, suspect has been located. Request Strike Team support.
Did anybody see what happened? Over.
Pop, pop, pop. That's nice. Keep it up.
Mark positions with smoke and sustain cover.
We have sensors active and are seeking engagement, over.
HELP! SOMEONE, HELP! HELP ME! HELP!
Ground chief says negative, got gun on sight.
Red Crown, target is on board, get me some help!
Engineers! I need engineers! Ow, shit!
It's not me! Oh, come on!
Bravo Team, we have heavy armament coming your way. Pull back to the Fireball perimeter and await reinforcement.
japanese: ブラボーチーム、重戦車がそちらに向かっている。 Fireball付近まで後退し増援を待て。

english: Write this block off, RED CROWN.
Good tone. Voodoo payload away. Deployed.
Update is to scratch the pursuit. Is there a CO on the line to confirm?
Hey, I know it’s top-secret, but why aren't we on the need-to-know list? We're out here.
We have a Package request, pass uphill and confirm.
Crown, we got skins in the Contact Zone.
Red Crown, operation complete. Ranger, out.
Here we go, ZEUS is back on sensors!
Wait! We don't know who's in there!
It's done for! Lean on it! LEAN ON IT!
Outstanding, team. Red Crown, problem solved. We're back at condition Yellow, over.
I got it, it's downrange of me. Put the zap on it, over.
Hold your fire until you're sure!
Air support on deck, over, Zero Eight Give Niner.
These BLACKWATCH dudes think their shit don't stink.
Scanners coming up blank, you seeing anything, Field Units?
We have a possible suspect: white male, late twenties, ID of Mercer, Alexander. Do any field agents have this individual in custody, over?
Aborting sweep, no sighting of target, over.
Code red! Wind these choppers up quickly!
Red Crown. Red Crown. Zebra Two Five is under attack. Heavy collateral, out.
Highball Unit at advance position, awaiting orders, over.
Take your shots and save a little for me, over.
OK, OK, lock up all weapons systems and GPS tracking.
Razorback One has taken fire. Hit it back and reverse!
It's back, it's back. Locking on.
Back out and meet at rally point Alpha, over.
Get some PD down here. Bystanders are panicking over a fuckin' car crash.

japanese: 下がれ！

english: In and out, Alex, in and out. Any hesitation and those air patrols will be all over me.
It's that same red growth from Gentek.  From Greene.  I need to get Karen away from this.
We have confirmed smoke from our rotor. ENGINE FIRE! OH GOD, CONTROL...CONTROL IS GONE...IS....
I got a wife -- and kids!
Air Command, we're clearing the dirt.
Quick -- find a place to hide!
My God, this is a shitstorm.
You are not cleared on that.
Target has escaped. Repeat, target has escaped.
I have eyeballs on the target. Lay down some!
Base Command confirming hostile sighted, over.
Bird is good, we're still in the air, hopeful and God-fearing.
Ground element, strobes on, heads down, air element now taking a pass. Check fire, people.
Put his heart, mind and spleen all over that street. Splash the hostiles, do it.
Search and pursue for defiladed target.
That tank is the only way into Greene’s hive. Its the only way I’m gonna get Dana back.
japanese: あの戦車でしかグリーンのハイヴに入れそうにないな。 つまりディナを取り戻すための唯一の方法か。

english: Fire Mission Alpha Three Dog is at "go".
Cancel search protocols and reassign, over.
Launch a Strike on this fucker, Red Crown.
Force moving in from the south!
Spread out. Find it and kill it.
Base Command to Charlie Zero Five. What's the status, do you have visual? Out.
I'm seeing a situation down there.
Confirming 10-54-H. Stick to the rear of the building.
Target negative, suggest sweep and clear with UAV coverage.
Check your weapons. You're still in a war zone!
Negative at the rear of the building. 10-80 the chase.
Air support, go secure for rally coordinates, over.
You need to get some wheels or wings on this fuck. He's slippery.
Deploying Package, repeat, deploying primary Strike Package, over.
It's a blanket of flies here.
Everyone, get out of its way!
Shots fired, shots fired on the scene, over.
Positive on target locale, give us clearance and blister it, over.
Incoming aircraft, you have no clearance at this time. Change course.
Maintain fire on the target, do not let it close.
Ready for kill, repeat, ready for kill. Fire in.
Our goals have not yet gotten much traction, troops.
Dispatch, this is Charlie Nineteen. I copy.
FLIR report to Red Crown. These coordinates are negative.
HQ, enemy has been ID'd. Request fast movers, target will be lazed.
Dana, Dana...oh, God, I've lost you....
We're final, we're final. That's a wrap. Coming home.
Be on the lookout for the suspect.
Chalk Three to Red Crown. Battle over. We own the Zone and look good doing it, over.
That's where the sick folks come from. So we burn these fucking things.
Why? Just tell me why you're doing this.
I think I'll take the family out of state for the holidays.
We got a break, boys, let's appreciate it.
Dispatch, route EMS to my Twenty. There's gonna be casualties. I'll stabilize, but respond over.
Strike Package go, are we clear to return? Over.
Hey, what are you doing? I'm a cop!
You're just putting my boot at ball level.
Sigma One to Red Crown, this is a wash -- no joy, no joy. We've lost ZEUS. Out.
This is close fire, danger close. Watch your fire, do not deviate. Fire mission!
Keep away from it! Safe distance, maintain a safe distance!
Entering range, Red Crown, spot our target.
Zone's empty.... Clerical error, Red Crown?
In the thick, RC, hold tight!
Primary threat overcome. We still have some cleanup to do, people.
Strike out, repeat, strike out. Return to base, over.
I got a line on him!
That's a large group moving in now. Engaging when in range!
We need a Strike Package here, pronto!
Alpha company here. Manhattan Whiskey Oh Five is green, out.
Looks like he's down, we'll drop nearby and have a spot-check, over.
Attack failed, shoot the fucker again!
Elizabeth Greene.   General Peter Randall. Hope, Idaho.  I have to get the people to know the secret of the place.  Randall, you just made the top of my list
japanese: エリザベス・グリーン、ピーター・ランドール大将、アイダホ州ホープ……。 あの場所の秘密を知ってる奴と話す必要がある。 そしてランドール、お前が今俺のリストのトップだ。

english: Zero eyeballs on One Five Four. All units report.
HQ, send in the Strike squad!
japanese: HQ、攻撃チームを送り込んでくれ！

english: What the hell is happening here? Get your shit together boys. We're losing this one.
Oh, fuck, man, this isn't gonna work.
OK boys, keep it together, we can still turn this one around.
This is Three Victor Twenty-Two, I have suspect on visual, request assistance.
Turn this thing around, no need to lose another tank.
Medical has been called. Hang in there L Eighty-Nine, they're almost there.
*groan*  Can't control my body.  Can't even see straight.
Sit tight and let the Strike Package deploy. Hold on.
Back way! Back away ! Back away from it!
Pursuit of the suspect has gone passive. Repeat, passive, over.
Friendlies in the area! Check your fire!
Red Crown, target is mobile, repeat, mobile, over.
No! Don't! This is blue-on-blue! Remember the briefing!
A-target is terminated. Field Units make way for evac, over.
No good, no good, we're pulling out, over.
Be aware, it's got a hostage!
Time is running out. Gotta move faster.
We've failed to hold the war zone. All units, this mission is scrubbed.
*coughing* Is anybody there? Call out if you require assistance.
Bloodtox burns... Hit and run is all I can do.
japanese: Bloodtoxは稼働中か……。 ヒットアンドランでいこう。

english: You can't come in here. Get back.
I can't breathe. Can someone help me?
Maintain search pressure while we try satellite.
Operation Red light is still under effect.
Only got an RCH of ammo left, I'm outta here.
Ten, nine, eight, seven, six, five, four, three, two, one.
What are you doing here? Shouldn't you be at your post?
Search is negative. We are RTB, over.
Mayday, mayday, mayday. We're not gonna make it!
What the fuck, man! Why me?

This is Red Crown to all crew. We'll remain on station to co-ordinate. Everyone else needs to abandon the Reagan right now. Support vessels to perform pickup duty and retreat to minimum safety. That is a general order -- abandon the Reagan right now.
C'mon, man, give me a break!
Rocketbox out, we're too close to engagement, over.
Aw, shit! It's got a weapon!
What do you want? Money? I got some money!
Aw, the boys are saying negative here, sir. No kill, no sight.
I can't raise anyone down there. One big coffin....
Targets cleared the Zone. No sign of hostiles at this time. What's next?
Thought you had me fooled. Wrong!
Oh, I think my heart skipped.
Deploy infantry and fire support to all remaining sensor suites. Cleared.
Hey! Whoa! Shit! It's, it's changing!

japanese: フーア！

english: All positions confirmed. Field ops engaging on RC command.
Voodoo, gonna hit it again, clear the Zone.
Duty asks that you confirm that's your suspect, over.
Stop! Turn around and walk away!
Push on through! Give it everything!
Ghost in the Blue Zone, subject MIA. Your call, RC.
Wooo! It's going down! Fuck that thing!
Whoa! We got lucky that time!
Guns down! Watch your line of fire!
Hold on. Might be a clue.
Chalk Three to Red Crown. We're negative at this Twenty. Standing down.
We're seeing it too, watch yourselves!
Red Crown, we're negative on site. He's gone.
Hey, watch out for the tank!
Situation is clear! Await new orders, over.
Got a pop in the acquisition. Nah, I got it, over.
Keep your heads, everybody -- panic will not help!
We have clearance to deploy a fighter wing for priority support to the Tox Teams. Orders from the old man himself is that sustained Bloodtox deployment is the number-one priority.
japanese: Toxチーム援護のためにヘリ部隊を展開させる。 おやっさんからの指示じゃBloodtoxの展開が最優先だ。

english: That's not possible -- he's just sucking it dry.
Here we go, back in range!
Thought you could beat us, huh?

japanese: 身を隠せ！

english: Fox company, we are now stepping down the alert. Cancel Red status.
One of the arrays just went offline. What the hell's going on down there?
Do not move! DO NOT MOVE!
We made it, give me a status check.
Going down, repeat, we are going down.
It's done for! Lean on it! LEAN ON IT!
Shake it off, shake it off!
Praise Jesus. We're OK, we're OK.

japanese: やってやる！ 来いよ、やってやる！

english: I can feel it. I'm close to the one that took Dana.
japanese: わかるぞ、ディナをさらった奴が近い。
カラだ！

english: Did you HAVE to do that?
Maintain a perimeter! Don't let it touch you!
Get the fuck out of here!
Negative, I cannot offer support right now, over
Red Crown, we do not copy!
Oh, no, man! Here they come!
I can give you money! Lots of money!
Oh, no! No, no, don't! Don't, please!
Kill the hostage before ZEUS can absorb him!
I'm a friendly, you dumb fuck!
Can't talk right now, Dispatch -- I'm a little busy!
It's no good. Not while this thing is in me.
Red Crown, I'm taking a closer look, something doesn't look right.
Charlie Nineteen pulling out, Dispatch. Nothing here.
E Seven D. I got movement, Red Crown. Will update, over and out.
Target at 100 meters, ready to engage.
I've got people here anxious to engage on the ground, request clearance to insert.
Enemy has been sighted, repeat, burners at twelve.
Pull back! Get the team out of there!
Conditions are good. Load a shell and prepare to engage.
This means he's still here. Does anyone have an ID?
Noo! You don't want to do this!
All Units are negative on ZEUS. Commence sweep at last known location.
Aw, where the hell is he now?
We need support and we need it now. Can we get a strike, over?
Another one down. May God have mercy.
Confirm suspect is in custody, over.
A li'l -- back up, back up! Get away! Watch out!
These guys are up to no good.
Strike, we have a new mission, pogo to One Niner Seven.
ZEUS is MIA, pull in the Package, over.
Regroup at Alpha Five Niner, over.
FAC Ground Control, targets marked, need combat close assist. Danger close, over.
South side, you have movement at the south end of your perimeter.
All combatants, you are to stall ZEUS until support gets here.
Stay calm! Marine Corps is here to help!
Hostile is down, we are returning to base, over.
Voodoo Seven, coming by on a run.
Subject out of sight. Attempting to reacquire.
That's it. It's done. ZEUS is finished!
It's disappeared. Not on screens anywhere.
Freeze and drop! Freeze and drop!
Damn it! Sort this out, pronto!
Target has left the Zone, packing it in.
I think my leg's broken -- shit!
Hostile is within the perimeter, Red Crown. Base is compromised! Not sure how long we can hold it, out.
Red Crown, advise. Highball Nine is capable.
Dispatch, suspect is mobile. Repeat, mobile!
Red Crown to all units. Bloodtox effectiveness on ZEUS confirmed. Bloodtox supplies en route to infected zones. Deploy as needed. Out.
japanese: レッドクラウンから全部隊へ。 BloodtoxはZEUSに効果があることが確認できた。 散布機を感染地区のビルの屋上に設置しろ。

english: Job done, we're RTB for chow and medals, RC.
This is harassment! God damn harassment!
Oh, God! I need a doctor!
Check yourselves for damage on reform, I want a clean wing on the reinsert.
Running, he's running! We got him moving!
Red Crown, this is Ranger Two Seven, we have major casualties here.
All right, what's all the fuss here?
Stabilizing! Just about bought the farm, RC.
Red Crown, we have Alpha target sighted, need priority Strike Package, over.
I saw the dude head that way!
That's him, that's him! Over there!
Echo One Alpha. I got him right here!
Get out! Don't make me fucking hurt you!
We show zero activity across the board. Moving to condition Yellow.
Did that Mercer guy do this?
Take a close look over there. Forrest, you're up!
Uh, we have numerous burners at these coordinates, over.
That's the plug on this one.
Gunner, keep your auto weapon systems on.
Field Team advises: scrub current op, over.
God, my leg. My fucking leg, I'm trapped in here.
We're downgrading the threat level. Go clear for now.
Shut it down. All Recon Teams report back to base, out.
Target has amped up, record visual, that's vital Intel.
Fire and rescue have been alerted of the situation and are inbound to your location.
Red Crown, we've found nothing. Ghost sector.
Either we missed it or it just stopped our best shot.
10-4, trail's cold. Please return to precinct and log a report.
Numerous civilians and boots dead in the Zone. Send help.
Confirmed last comm, bring what's left of the Package home, over.
Well that adds a new tactical fuckin' wrinkle.
All targets terminated, we are RTB.
What are you, f...are you insane? Don't kill me!
This guy a DCODE? Give 'em some space.
Rejoin and sound off, over. Fire ready.
Spread out, keep alert, and maintain discipline.
Dispatch, this is Charlie Nineteen. I copy.
Suspect is mobile, Dispatch. Suspect is mobile!
Tornado Hotel Niner to Chalk Three. Bird-dog 'em for me, Marines. Mark friendlies with IR, over.
Cover your Zone. Move with me. Eyes forward.
Ranger Two Seven rolling in, over.
Target has gone, Red Crown. Pull us in, over.
This is Ghost Three Three Eight Four, we are go!
japanese: こちらゴースト3384、離陸する！

english: It won't go down, try another run, over.
Hey! Hey! Hey, you see him!?
I don't know how I did that. I just did.
It’s not enough to beat you Mercer. I want to BE you.
All units, sounds like we have him. Not confirmed at this time.
Now he's the one I need.
Call it in. We need an EMT out here.
Pilots on the deck, scramble, scramble! Get those Birds off the deck and into the fight!
This is Charlie Nineteen. It's all good here.
No shots, roller up. Maneuver, maneuver!

japanese: 下がれ！

english: Code midnight, code midnight, we are in deep urgent, anything armed and flying need urgent base return. NOW.
Woo, we nearly took that one, stabilize and reform on Target Zone, over.
ZEUS on the deck, contact made! Clear the Landing Zone! Everyone up!
You know me, you fucking know me!
We got a shit-ton of smoke and rubble.
They’re distracted. They haven’t secured Parker yet.
japanese: 連中、感染者に気を取られてる。 まだパーカーの周りを固めちゃいねえな。

english: That's what I like! Lots of fire!
We got it, we got it dead center. Sustain laze.

japanese: 射程内に近寄るな！

english: Fire control says we're nearly done here. Hit it again.
We're hit, but still intact, over.
This is Taggart. We’re one mile out.
Thunder Four Five switching to recon, over.
Hostile assault on Field Command. Countermeasures in place, out.
Enemy in the clear, taking shot.
Target destroyed, where to, Red Crown?
I just crapped my fuckin' pants.
Red Crown, we’ve lost control. Containment One has been compromised.
That thing dead? I don't believe it.
Oh, this is JUST what I need.
Let's put this thing down, over.
Pull back from the search. Hold for further orders.
We're clear, we're clear, pack it up, over.
*grunts* I can't see for shit -- is anybody out there?
They're all dead! They're all fucking dead! Over.
Bring in the Strike Team, Dispatch. I've got the suspect ID'd.
Oh, God! I need a doctor!
Medical is on the way. Does anyone know how many officers are down? Report.
Don't kill it, you stupid bastards!
Steady, boys, steady. RC, you have anything for us? Over.
All units, be on the lookout for suspect, Mercer, Alexander, Caucasian male, five feet, ten inches tall, dark hair, blue eyes.
Until they relax, I can't get in.
Sensors lighting up. Looks like skins. Watch your backs.
What's going on...who the fuck are these guys?
Nobody leaves the area. Zero tolerance. Any Runners, we are at a standing clean sweep policy.

japanese: クソ！

english: Steady, steady, let's regroup. Zero that.
Damn it. There has to be another way to get inside.

japanese: フーア！

english: If anyone can get those fucking things out of my way, I'd God damn appreciate it.
Good work, boys -- we got 'er done.
No dice.  He’s not going down!
Target has been lost, encircle the Search Zone.
Move it, move it, move it!
Roger that Kilo One One, firm up ground positions, over.
Damage confirmed. Still good to engage.
Security level Delta. Hold Delta until further orders.
It's not me, I mean, I'm not it!
Let's put this thing down, over.
Please, man, think of my little boy!
I think we got it! We got it!
Blackjack locked and loaded, awaiting shot.
Voodoo Seven, we have deployment, can you check that? Over.
All units, be on high alert. Suspect at large.
Control's gone. Control is gone. We are spinning out. Wha-oot! We are spinning out -- Yeaaaaahh!
It's a no-go and we are retuning to base.
Aw, fuckin' hell. Don't do this, man!
This may be our best shot at ZEUS! SHOOT HIM!
Dispatch, I've locked in on the motherfucker. I'm going in!
This stuff is like cancer in liquid form. Avoid it at all costs....
Fuck! There's too many of them!
Delivering heavy fire, repeat, heavy fire. Splash payload.
Nothing will protect you from me.  Not men, not weapons, not armor.
This is fucking Blacklight we're talking about, Private. This is the big one. Report!
japanese: 俺達はブラックライトの話をしてるんだぞ、二等兵。 重要な事なんだぞ。 報告しろ！

english: Goddamnit. Search came up negative, Red Crown. I need medical and transportation for our men, over.
Dispatch, this is Two Juliet Eleven. I'm 10-84, stay tuned.
Fire on board! We are on fire!
Red Crown, we're holding for strike support! Get that motherfucker.
Whoa! Red Crown, Red Crown, Tornado Team just took one. Systems are a go.  We are re-engaging.
The battle is nearly ours - keep pushing.
Can't you see he's trying to turn us against each other? It's HIM!!
We're cold, repeat, cold, scrub it, over.
Damn it! Not what I needed!

japanese: 撃て！

english: The old man is running the show -- personally. Taggart ain’t top dog on this one.
We got a red spread, over.
This is Red Crown, key units are primed and ready. Hold for codes, over.
Splash target, do we have confirmation, over.
This is Alpha 4 - we are losing the line, fall back.
We have clear sight of target, over.
And the wife just paid two hundred bucks for a haircut. Shit, I'd have done it for twenty.
Hold the line, Red Crown, over.
What you got!? Come on! Do it!
Move and fire, move and fire!
Gas, gas, gas! The structure here, it's taking hits. We've lost one of the main tanks. Looks like it's filling the air with this toxic shit.
Hostile's gonna unleash, create some space.
Holding stable here. Enough to finish the job.
Here it comes again, up out of the street. Watch out!
Let me go, you slimy, germy fuck-bag!
Clearance to engage, your lead is Mike Two Alpha.

japanese: ここから出て行け！

english: Red Crown, mission accomplished, ZEUS is down.
You think it's ME? Don't be a fucking idiot!
Get on the net -- tell Red Crown we have a developing situation here.
Sir! The police are on their way!
I don't want to see this! I don't ever want to remember this!
Oh, I think we still got a hostile in the area.
Dispatch, this is Charlie Nineteen. There's skins all over the place here.
Pursuit is eluding the unit, over.
It's a no-go and we're retuning to base.
Four Sixty is my minimum, yes ma'am.
Hostile is down, we are returning to base, over.
Here it comes, here it comes!
We’ve got red at 2 o' clock. Moving in.
Red Crown, hits but no kill, stay on target?
Possible bogey on our sensors. Taking a fly by. Report movement.
Confirmed, it's ZEUS, send all you've got!
Take it easy! Take a breath!
Why are they shooting at innocents!?
This is Command. We have multiple conflicting reports of ZEUS’ position.
Hit him now, or back off!
Looks like all the bad guys have gone for the day, over.
Roll the vehicle around before it hits us again.
Screw this, Razorback One pulling out.
Geisler said he saw these fucks torch a whole family. A whole fuckin' family!
Officer, I need a 10-1 right now.
We're orbiting. Fifty knots, eyes open.
Full alert, we are at combat go, hostile inside the perimeter!
Dispatch, something's not right. I'm going in for a look-around.
All Sigma units converge on Central Park for immediate extraction.
Stay back or I'll shoot you.
Stalker Six Zero, acknowledge last transmission.
Dispatch, route EMS to my Twenty. There's gonna be casualties. I'll stabilize, but respond over.
Looks like it's running north through Central Park! All available units in that area to intercept!!
Contact cold, it's gotta be here, we just can't see it.
Had no idea there was that many of these things. Christ.
Kill Zone clear, we're clear. Package RTB.
Roger, Red Crown assessing target loss, stand by.
Target's in-Zone, request aerial support mission, auth Bravo Whiskey Five Four Niner.
Sweep for target. It's here somewhere.
Red Crown from Chalk Three. Skins at these coordinates. My boys will chew 'em up.
Keep out of the area that's black and flaming, people. Don't want blue-on-blue.
You have the perp, is that correct, over?
Dispatch, I may need a 10-85 on this one.
Ranger Two Seven pulling out, over.
Infected structure ready for demolitions. Call the engineers.
Please, it's my boy's birthday tomorrow!
We are in the Kill Zone and set to engage, over.
Bravo Base, this is Bravo Squad One on point, we are perimeter compromised!
Nice job, troops. We got him.
Red Crown, I have priority airlift request for Almighty. Access code Charlie Oscar Charlie. Please confirm, over.
I have negative on that, Red Crown. Negative.
japanese: 俺は悪い予感しかしないぜ。 レッドクラウン。 最悪だ。

english: Hot on the trail! Maintaining visual, over.
Air support can't re-locate hostile. Red Crown, send new target vector, over.
We're deep in the shit right now, HQ!
Uploading ZEUS' location, feed via GPS channel.
Verify your targets, make sure they're not ours, over.
Uh, Roller barrage can cover on abort, call targets and we will aid exfiltration.
Does anybody see this? Somebody, stop him! Kill him!
Red Crown, multiple hits on Chalk Three's location. We can't raise them.
I WILL shoot before I let you compromise security.
Red Crown, this is Ranger Two Seven, we have painted target at Seven Six Seven Nine.
Target is moving! Get on him!
We're in deep here, hold comm, HQ.
Are we done? What's the order, sir?
It's on your Six, Delta Team!
Busting this into the field, you got some?
It's looking good, HQ. Looking real good.
You see something weird, kill it, over.
Who do you think you're messin' with?
It's OK, man, we got him covered!
I got a line! Over here!
I can't help you. Put me down!
Thunder to Red Crown, we're clear.
Bring back those extra units. Regroup and downgrade the alert, over.
Oh, fuck. It's on us, it's on us! Pull a turn!
Additional support Units moving to your location. Check IFF, out.
It's him! The one the cops are after!
Those fuckin' spooks are rolling out some new detection network. I bet they give us fuckin' cancer.
Pull out. Let's reform and hit it again. One and Two.
Where's your ID? WHERE IS IT?!?

japanese: 散開、撃て！

english: Do I have to kill everything myself around here?
japanese: こいつら全員俺だけで殺らなきゃなんねえのか？

english: Ready munitions, green light to engage.
This is Razorback One, no visual on target.
What was it? What did this?
Mark and update the grid. ZEUS is clear.
Keep 'em off the streets. Clear a path.
Red Crown, get this to the 'WATCH, we have downed our target, out.
Christ, do we have clearance for this?
He's confirmed. Try outrunning this, you greasy little shit.
Check that, was that civvies in the Fire Zone?
Target sighted, bring on the strike.
There it is -- take it down!
McMullen's no soldier. He won't touchdown until he knows it's safe.
I'll kill you, I'll fucking kill you!
Don't let their looks throw you.
Elizabeth Greene is only one part of the puzzle.  I need to get to Randall to solve this.
I will shoot you! Deadly force, fucker!
Infected are not our only problem - Zeus is here too. Employ maximum firepower.
I have a crime scene for forensic.

japanese: 身を隠せ！

english: Massive instability in the Zone, watch it, ground.
How we doing on payload? Can we do that again, over?
Back up and get us out of here.
Get the fuck out of here. Now.
That's a Judy. Got it in my sights.
We're getting out. McMillan, can you cover?
This is Hotrod Two Four. We have a target rich environment in all directions, Red Crown, engaging best we can.
Target not on site. Repeat. Not on site.
Armor is go to engage. Ranger Two Seven, out.
ZEUS is down, repeat, ZEUS is down, over.
Burner down. Add one to my list.
Be on the lookout for anything unusual. All reports are of that nature, over.
No good, boys. And Steg, I don't want to see you takin' no fuckin' photographs of this shit. Are we clear?

Red Crown to all Command Units. Be advised, we have uncontained outbreaks throughout Manhattan. Computer projections place total infection at plus minus seven days. Total containment protocols now in effect. Out.
Unidentified aircraft, turn about and return to the Quarantine Zone immediately! You are not cleared for exfiltration!
Check all opticals, give me a jump in ten seconds.
Be aware, BW Ghost Four Five just in the Blue Zone.
Dispatch, I got a possible 10-34. Charlie Nineteen going in for a look.
Shit, man, we need the fuckin' army!

japanese: ありゃなんだ？

english: What's happening to these buildings? It's like they're alive.  Time to get Karen out of here.
Confirmed, Red Crown. I’m on it
It's not me! Don't be a fucking idiot!
If they're running, there's probably something to kill over there.
Red Crown, Tornado Five pulling out of the Kill Zone.
Wait -- hold on, hold it, man. Wait, OK! I'm not whatever you think I am!
Pour it on. Get everything we got out of this base and into the fight. Now!
Hold comm, we're in the thick, Red Crown.
Damn it - can't let them flatten the Hive until I've got enough genetic material.
Containment One REPORT! This is Colonel Taggart! Sit-rep!
This city's going to the dogs!
ZEUS is down, repeat, ZEUS is down!
Uh, maybe we should get back!
Get us out of this fucking shit!
You are not cleared on that.
Can anybody hear me out there?
These people need help over here!
No sighting. Don't we have a spotter up?
Target has successfully lost us, let's pack it in.
Button it down, now! Red Crown, we're switching to lock-down here. Hostile offensives are penetrating! Request support, out.
Possible hive in the area, I'm seeing large crowd moving outward from possible hive source.
Thunder in the Blue Zone, subject MIA.
Reds pushing back hard - get the firepower up.
That's Donaldson's Bird, get him back on assignment, over.
Hostile is on the move. He's hauling ass too.
Standby, engines warming, about to clear.
You girls run and it'll just keep throwing.
Blood, thicker than water. We'll see.

D-Code Pursuit Team here, target is lost, repeat, target lost.
Out clean and smiling, some serious action at the ground station. Will orbit and report.
All points secure. Base is fully operational. Red Crown, do you copy?
You should hear sirens any second. Standby.

english: The Blackwatch have the hardware that can crack these hives apart. I could use it to free Dana.
Lost suspect, can we get a 10-13?
We're in the shit here. Hold the line, over.
Somebody get a visual of that!
We have confirmed kill. Skin pasted in the Red Zone, over.
All me. This is all me.
japanese: 俺だ、俺だよ！

english: Any BLACKWATCH out there? Sound off!
Oh, man, wait, wait. Hold on, hold on, man. Look, look, OK? You don't have to do this.
Friendlies mixed with bad guys, but I'll take my fucking chances. Get them in here.
Be aware! Be aware! Watch for skins!
It's only two of them...I'll just have to take one out and "interrogate" the other.
Site status is negative, Dispatch. Awaiting reassignment.
Ground search is negative, please advise?
Captain! Captain! God, I think he's dead!
ZEUS situation is under control. Back our teams out.
People, can we have some order please!
It's down there, keep looking. KHOOYA.
Let's go, let's go, let's go!
I don't think you have the guts.
We don't have to kill him, just get rid of him. Cripple him and get us clear.

japanese: 下がれ！
持って来い！

english: Don't be treating me like I'm your boy, motherfucker.
Heavy payload not having desired effect, Red Crown.
Get me pertinent info if you have it.
The serum! Come up and get it!

japanese: 下がれ！
散開、見つけ出すんだ！

english: Recall, recall. Fire stations report in, are we clear?
Red Crown, confirm last known vector, we'll start from there.
Let me do my job, you do yours!
I need weapon support, get them up here!
Encountering a lot of resistance. Over!
Situation has gone to stage Theta.
All points secure. Switching to clear status, over.
Not our job. That's not our fuckin' assignment.
Freeze! You are not allowed in here.
Watch your GPS, coming in hard and fast.
This motherfucker has got to go down.
Charlie Nineteen. My Twenty is clear. We're done here.
Fall back! Get clear of the tank! Jesus!

Habla Ingles? Fuckin' perfect. You must fuckin' leave.
Command, we have an unidentified combatant here. Something big. Uploading imagery.
Hold the line, Red Crown, we're in the shit.
Not like this. I don't want to die!
We got hostiles. It's generating hostiles.
I can smell that son of a bitch.
Having trouble with that active pursuit. Give me the status.
Whoa, suspect, I mean, suspect is onsite!
Hope you got briefed on the REAL mission.
Truck has been damaged. We're down but not out.
We are in the Kill Zone and set to engage, over.
Use caution, hostile gone risky, over.
Ah, fuck. I'm goin to the stockade, dude.
Target is marked. Clear to engage. Pepper it!
Failure is not acceptable. Turn it around out there. NOW.
Come on, man, please, I got a family!
OK, this ends when I'm dead...or I have all the facts.
I'll tell you one thing, we are in deep shit.
Bulldog Unit is leaving the field, over
See you in hell, you son of a bitch.
Left track's taken damage, weapons good.
Something's going on. Let's get down there.
Is that the fuckin' best you can do?
Buddy, you'd look real sweet in a hair shirt.
Bridgett, Jesus Christ. What the fuck are we doing!?
Dear God, no! What did I do?
I think the game was called off.
FUCK! THEY'RE STILL HERE!! MOVE OUT MOVE OUT!!
This is Razorback One, recommend mission abort.
Heeeeeellp! Heeeellp!! Somebody, help me! Somebody!
Uh. Sir, we have another red light. Team Three isn't responding either. Sir, please advise.
japanese: サー、こちらも交戦中。 Team 3も応答しません。 指示を。

english: Back up! Get away from him!

japanese: 来たぞ！

english: Check my tags! It's not me!
Hang tight, Search Team, awaiting confirmation on a wider grid or suspended operations, over.
Testing negative for contact. Damn it!
IR shows nothing. Packing in the search.
Son of a bitch! Keep back, this is burner palace! I'm gonna radio this up the chain.
Secondary target terminated. Good job, good job, over
Confirmed, we'll get the Marines an Intel update.
Red Crown, I am moving in to engage, over.
No, thi...this is all a mistake!
Echo Twelve, reporting hostiles at my Twenty.
All clear, repeat, all clear on scope.
You're really starting to piss me off.
Over there! Do you see him!?
More of them!  And I’m just getting started!
japanese: まだ来るか！ だが俺もいい具合にノってきたところだ。

english: Dispatch, this is Charlie Nineteen. I found him!
I have a clear fire path, launching now!
Lower deck here. Elevators are prepped with more wings for the fight. Give the word.
Car wreck. This could be a distraction!
Voodoo Seven, we have visual on hostile, ready to engage. Tally two on my nose.
HQ, we're wasting our time. If he was here, my boys would have smoked him.
We're hit. We've been hit. It's OK. We're good. Quebec Romeo reports Six.
Tell Willy to warm up some diesel, we got some to-be corpses.
Railrod is in on the front. You can go ahead and punch that.
Stand down! That's an order, jerk-off!
Sector Seven Three Alpha is clear. All targets down, over.
I was trying to protect the country!
Copy, I don't see him. He's in the cover!

Red Crown to Sigma Command. Secure all locations at stadium control zone. Prepare assault teams at north and south west points of entry. Incursion team 19 is mobile. 12 working up from beneath stadium. Out.
japanese: レッドクラウンからSigmaへ。 スタジアム周辺の安全を確保してくれ。 さらに北と南西入場門に攻撃部隊を手配してほしい。 19番隊が機動隊。 12番隊はスタジアム下部だ。 アウト。

english: Pour it on! It's on the ropes!
Check your ammo, reload before you verify!
Looks like our luck is gonna earn it's pay, over
The APCs with shit-sniffers should be on their way. Find one particulate in a million.
Cannot advance, enemy has breached defenses.
It's that guy! The one they're after!
Dana! Can you hear me?! I can't...can anyone hear me? Anyone?
Yeah, that's him. OK, squeeze it off.
I'm here tracking ground targets, range is good.
Air Element with priority target, marking for Sierra Papa. Punch it good, over.
Assemble! That's the germ, right there!
Keep an eye on those screens. Target is close, over
We did it. *laughs* We fuckin' did it.
Permission granted. Make it a fuckin' smear on the road.
Copy that. All units, make sure that tank doesn't blow until we say it does.
Corpsman to the front! We have injuries.
What did I do!? Please!? Don't kill me!
It got me! Smoking but stable. Uh, this one's going back to the taxpayers.
This is Bulldog Seven, back it up and sustain, over.
Just how are we supposed to fight that thing??
This area is clear! We can take it from here.
Boys, the game is over, home team wins.
We have orders to bring in the body, send in the Collection Team.
We're hit! We're hit! Minor damage, over.
Target down, Chalks ready for pick-up, over.
Son of a bitch. Can't maintain altitude! Going down!
No, no, please! Spare me, please!
Firepower here...if you want this fucker dead, that is.
Who the hell do these pricks think they are?
God damn, that thing's still moving. Target in the open!
It's a major disaster scene down there, RC. Get some help to the grunts.
Auto-lock jigging around on something. Checking it out.
I get that kill -- chalk it!
This is Red Crown requesting visual confirmation and upload of the target status, priority.
Oorah! Let's show those things what Marines can do!
I need a sit-rep right fucking now! Whose still outside? Are there any more of these fuckers? Where are they? Talk to me, talk to me!
Always this restless little bundle of energy -- like you're afraid that at any minute you're gonna burn out.
Confirmed. Wait for the Strike Team.
Shit, I can't feel my legs!
It was supposed to be tough.
Close all access points. Unknown target in the perimeter.
Get your wounded clear, we will push through.
Closed to the public! Out now!
McMullen's in deep with these guys. Someone at the Landing Zone has to know something about where he is.
Keep your sights on the field of fire, over
Officer does not have a clear shot at the suspect. Understood.
Gadgets are on and seeking lock on hostile, over.
Mercer...you're a hard man to find.
Is anyone trapped? Call out if you can hear me.
Oh, shit! Get away from them!
It's full-on war out here, Dispatch!
Sweep and clear. Stay cool, we've got it.
Command, we see losses in the Strike Zone but this thing is still on.
Break off pursuit and await new commands.
Chalk Three from Tornado Golf Mark, ready to engage hostile. Roger Six. Get ready to come in, over.

japanese: カバーしろ！

english: Roger, warm up the tracks, we're rolling in.
Echo Unit reporting skins. Check your Six, Cudahy!
Oh, no! A gun! Watch out!
Stay on alert. He could be anywhere.
Knock it out of the sky.
We've been expecting you, badass. Bulldog engaging.
You don't want to know what they got in there. You do not want to know.
Ghost engaging and in pursuit, over.
Our tactical objectives are still unmet.
This is Charlie Nineteen, I read you, Dispatch.
Changes nothing. We still gotta hit it.
I need to get back to Dana, sort out what I know.
Scanning the last known location, over.
East. To the east. RC, out.
Situation is critical. We have more wounded than guns down here! Need Medevac and support on the ground if we're gonna hold this.
No signs of movement, think we cleaned house, Control.
Isn't that Mercer? What the fuck is going on here!?
Nice work. We got the bastard.
Red Crown from Chalk Three. This quadrant clear. Can we call it a day, over.
Come on! Out of my way!
Stand by for reassignment. Zone is clear.
God, what's going on in this city?
Fire Mission cancelled, uh, where do you want us?
You won't get that chance again.
Rolling out of Hot Zone, over.
Mission achieved, HQ. Bring us in, over.
There! That guy! Take him out!
Back in business, Red Crown, uploading visual.
Did not copy, repeat, did not copy.
Yeah, Red Crown, we got movement.
We have clear sight of target, over.
He's among us, no one move!
We seem to be getting re-inforced - about time!
Red Crown, recommend you vector Thunder for multiple Medevacs.
Yeah, it's ZEUS all right, over.
Locked and loaded, clear us a path, over.
ZEUS termination is a success. Collect the body and bring it in.
Voodoo Seven reporting cold trail. Target has evaded the strike, over.
Ain't seen nothing like that before. But I still reckon we can kill it. Guns up, Marines -- give it some!
I have visual on red bodies! Confirmed.
They know I'm coming. I have to think about this.
japanese: 奴らは俺の接近に気づいてる。 要注意だな。

english: Send Strike Package. We will shadow target.
We're good to go here, Red Crown. All Units in place and ready for deployment, sir.
AT and Bulldog Units ready. Hotrod holding outside Red Zone
Emergency backup has been sent. Confirm their arrival, over.
Requesting heavy Strike delivery. Bring the rain, HQ.
Officers gave chase but lost visual. Last seen westbound at contact site.
We've got a contact. That's a definite. Redirect any patrols and call up a Package request ASAP.
Fuck, man, we need air support NOW.
We are dark status on primary target, over.
I can't die here. No! No, not like this. Not like a God damn dog.
Oh, shit. Target is on our Bird, he's trying to board, motherfucker is trying to get on board.
Tell the armor to check targets!
ZEUS is outside the Kill Box.
You're going to have to repeat that, over.
It's OK, man, we got him covered!
This must be where they're running the show.
I can get inside, or I can knock it down.

japanese: クソ！

english: Weapons hot, we are go for engagement, over.
Fools! Don't you see he's using you?
Be aware, infantry in the field, we are clear to go.
Orders are shoot to kill ANYTHING non-military. Civilians too, team. Anything here is probably red-to-be. No hesitation, fuckers. You got me?
I saw that guy, it's him!
Roger that. All units, engage search protocols.
Waiting for targets, feed co-ords -- we'll hit them.
No visuals, advise trying FLIR -- F-L-I-R.
Splash success, we have positive confirmation.
Looks like a corpse. Better get crime scene onsite.
All clear. Gather ammo and form a new perimeter, this might not be over yet.
We've beefed up ground forces, Red Crown.
I mark this as a body, Dispatch. Put it in the forensic pipeline.
Red Crown, we've lost him, permission to return to base?
You've pushed me too far, asshole!
Red Crown, we have eliminated the target, over.
Go White, go White, we are clear on contact with hostile, over.
Pipe down, remain calm and evacuate at a WALK.
HQ, we are clearing temp base H Thirty-Two.
Let him go! Let him go!
Let me go, you don't have to do this!
Regroup. Regroup. Do what you can.

japanese: フーア！

english: Delta Squad, support the Hammer at all costs. The moment you have even the slightest incline to believe it isn't friendly, engage and destroy it, over.
This is CITADEL Command. Straight from General Randall: Three hours, twenty two minutes to FIREBREAK. Out.
Dispatch, something's not right. I'm going in for a look-around.
Charlie Three approaching Citadel. Support troops on the way
Oh, your mommy teach you that, huh?

japanese: 地面に伏せろ！

english: All right, bitch, show me what you got.
Bits and pieces here, you might want to get a scooper.
Check your fire! Check your fire!
Did you see that? I'm taking a look.
Requesting routine sit-rep from all engaged units, over.
I'm seeing red! Kill and contain!
Did you talk to the police?
This is Voodoo Seven, one more ought to finish it, coming in again.
Assault Bird Seven, we're clear. I'm showing blue alone.
Let me help you! I can help you!
Alright, listen up -- there's a change in the plan. I have a new path on your systems, maintain and follow us through. Keep it tight!
Red Dog, Red Dog on our laser target. Strike Package now!
Charlie Nineteen, Dispatch. Subject has disappeared.
Unit in pursuit, do you need 10-13? Report.
Whoa, that was a little too close for comfort.
Clear the area, y'all! C'mon, get out! We're all gonna die!
It's that thing. Hit it and get us out of here!
We lost visual on ZEUS, over.
Check it -- that's the same guy!
More fuckin' red. Clear the street, we are green. Fire for effect.
Red Crown, target is out of our sightline.
Someone call HQ. Get the Medevac ready!
Watch yourself. Meat on the move.
Kev, shout my name if you can hear me!
Why me, man!? Why me...!? I don't mean you any harm!

japanese: 集中砲火だ！ じゃなきゃ俺たちが死ぬぞ！

english: The good news is, it ain't likely to get worse.
Barrage successful. Holding for fresh co-ords.
Give it everything you've got, boys!
I said, do NOT do that again. Don't test me, sir.
No thermal image, not even a breath, it's gone.
Hit the gas, fold up the mount!
At my position, priority engagement opportunity. Send in some mean motherfuckers, sir!
Fill me in, unit. Need a 10-13?
We've marked the soft points, see what you can do about that.
We have direct hits on target.
Interesting... looks like infection levels are dropping throughout the area.
Strike Package Bravo, abort and return to base, over.
That's a wrap on this op, RC.
Dispatch. Come in, Dispatch. Charlie Nineteen here, 10-84.

Check for targets in the crowd!

Seal the crime scene. Keep civilians and military back until BLACKWATCH officers take custody.

Mission complete. Let's head on in.

Ranger taking hits. Systems operational, over.
Crowd of nasties, headed our way, over.

Something's not right down there, Red Crown, over.
Arty barrage positive, we are at positive. Forward keep target clear.

I-I-It's like he melted, or some shit!
Tally, tally, we may have something!

Location is clear. Repeat. Location is clear.

Hotel and Whiskey Units, come back with an update, over.
Call in a Scrape Team -- and tell McMullen we have his sample.

Squeeze it out, search every corner.
Don't kill me! Don't do it! No!

english: Don't take any chances, continue firing.
What did I ever do to you?

This just got tactically fucked up!
Ground support, in the field, north spot, over.
Hold on, this is gonna hurt!

english: Last time I checked, this was still a God damned carrier. Get us some fucking air support, NOW, GODDAMNIT!
Nobody's gonna believe I saw this.
Move your ass out of here!
Hold on. Contact established. Standby for hostile Intel.
I think I'll take the family out of state for the holidays.
Engage defensive protocols. The entire street is now classified safe to bring it.
Threat has been removed, we're turning around, over
Standby, the military are aware you no longer have contact.
Assuming attack formation Red Crown, over.
Visual? It's him. I have Mercer, feed this across the net, priority Zulu.
Mark it on the FLIR, we'll drop down and put the zap on him. I want you to pull the trigger until they don't get up.
This is all kinds of fucked up.
It's working. Just a few more.
Get the fuck away, it'll get you too!
Stand by for Charlie Nineteen -- investigating a possible 10-30.
Watch your flanks! Move and fire!
Guns down! Watch your line of fire!
Confirmed, initiating search pattern Zulu, over.
Hostiles, hostiles to the north! Engaging!
Shit. Where'd it go? Do you see it?

This is Thunder Five, preparing for second run, to Ranger.
You are cleared to end his fucking life. Do it.
This is when America needs you the most...don't let her down.
Bird going down, repeat, Bird going down!
Zone neutralized, we're Blue status, over.

These things seem feral, instinctive - but organized. A hive mind?  If I could tap into their stream of thought then it's possible that I could find Dana.  And maybe Elizabeth Greene.

HQ, I am confirming positive contact on the building status. It looks like a disease center.

Unidentified aircraft, turn to Zero Nine Zero or you will be treated as a hostile combatant.
Negative on engagement, get setup first, do you copy?

Calvary's here, boys. Clear a path, over.
Attack failed, target is still standing!

Strike Leader reporting target down, over.
Oh, come on! I-I-It's not me!
Who fired the first shot? Who the fuck did this!?
Building security compromised. Lock it down -- and don't let them leave alive!
Red Crown from Chalk Three. Enemy defeated. Area clear.
Right. Well if he shows up, he's going to get two in the chest and one in the head.

japanese: こちらレッドクラウン司令部。 コードブラックが進行中。 全部隊帰還せよ。 ファイアブレイクへのカウントダウンが始まっている。 繰り返す、全部隊は即刻帰還せよ。

english: We got skins, over, switch to laser and get a reading.

This Zone is now clear of hostiles, over.
Let me go. I won't tell them anything.

Keep him in your gun sights!

Strong signal on three. Triangulate with the others and redirect.
Regroup. Regroup. Confirm systems and prepare to re-engage!
Winding up. Give us a few seconds here, we're legs open right now.
Stand down! I said stand down this INSTANT!
Heading to the Red Zone. Permission to engage.

Bring everyone back! Incoming fire! Incoming fire!
Target ID'd. Mark our coordinates. Send in Strike Package.
Keep him in your gun sights!
Keep in mind, it still bleeds and dies.

english: Affirmative. Mercer is dead. Go status White.
Yo, don't do it, man. You'll fuckin' regret it! I'm tellin' you.
Confirmed, Red Crown, FIREBALL has been overrun. I repeat, FIREBALL has been overrun. Looks like no survivors.
Doing a follow-up on last known location, over.
All points, we have fire on the ground. Deploy and engage.
Acknowledging the request for medical and support. Standby. Standby.
Multiple targets, Red Crown. Skins in the area!

Romeo Charlie auths engage Package protocol. Deploy, rikky-tik.

It's full-on war out here, Dispatch!

Cops will be here any minute.

ZEUS has slipped the net, be careful.

Get out of here. You don't want me to say that again.

Red 4 reporting... currently things could go either way.

I see the target -- I see it!

Fan out, boys. It's here for sure.

Hold your fire until we ID the hostile.

english: We're going to need clean-up crews on the ground, over.

We're gonna need some help here!

Voodoo Seven reporting hostile down, repeat, hostile down

Do not move! DO NOT MOVE!

english: We have visual. Repeat, we have visual, over.

english: Someone up there's giving us another shot.

HELP ME! No, no, no, please! No!

Trigger's hot, we're ready to unleash, Red Crown.

Come on, you bitch, turn, turn!

Bulldog One, Bulldog Three, we are lasing for target, you are weapons hot.
ZEUS just took it up a notch.
Clear the area! I think it's gonna collapse!

Step down the alert, Base is clear, out.

ZEUS cocksure, get eyeballs on that thing and Sci-Teams protocol.

Fully armed and systems tracking, over.

english: I surrender. Let me go. I won't report anything. Look in your heart, man. You fuckin' freak.

japanese: ペンシルバニア駅の死体はハーレムの基地にある。 行こう。

english: I said, do NOT do that again. Don't test me, sir.
Deploying at reds. Time to inoculate.
I will NOT kill one of our own!

This won't take long. Just give me some time.
japanese: そんなに長くはかからんさ。 少し待っててくれ。

english: I got enemy fire up my ass and a dead end, over
You know it -- that's one for the chalkboard.
This shit is INTENSE!! Keep on rockin! Keep! ON! ROCKIN!! WOO!
ZEUS spotted. Where the fuck is the Captain?
Major damage on the ground, Red Crown.
Red Crown, engagement had no effect, do you copy?
Watch the tank! It's gone nuts.

I can't see, can you see?

japanese: フーア！

english: Not much chance of a blue-on-blue here. Ready munitions.

Reposition this crate, we have unstable structures.
Target is not down, repeat NOT DOWN.
Targets Alpha and Bravo confirmed, initiating.

Cover your Zones, someone get on secure and request UAV overflight.

Form a perimeter and call it in.
Don't touch me. Please. I want to live!

Ah, shit. The ugly one is still into it.
Everyone! Stay calm! Tell me what happened!
Get on the wire. Request local EMT.

Red Crown, radar is showing something, we'll eyeball, over
Strike Team tallied up, you are on point.
Red Crown, I'm seeing hostiles in the vicinity. Permission to open fire.
Looks like you found a shortcut to hell.

Show some ID and mission documents, or I will open fuckin' fire.
Bring in the pest control, we got skins here.
Shoot the shit out of it!
Hostiles neutralized. Perimeter status secure. Do you copy?
Make sure you have a positive ID!
It's done, ZEUS is down, repeat, ZEUS is down!

I will never get used to that.
I can't see. Can you tell me what's going on?

japanese: ヤるかヤられるかだ、カマ野郎！

english: C'mon, boys, we have a reputation to uphold!
Stalker Six Zero, comms check, come-back?
Slipped from our sights again, Red Crown.
It's here somewhere. Burn it out.
Red Crown, this is Delta base. We've got confirmed engagement with hostiles within base perimeter, route patrols our way to box him in.
Medical and fire are en route, hold on.
Red Crown, we're in the Strike Zone, over.
Don't let up, lay down fire till it drops, over.
Rearm one system at a time, do not leave us empty. I repeat, do not leave us empty.
Confirmed. You are on fresh assignment, out.
His skin is burning.... It's Mercer!
Mobility lost, dead in the water here!
Karen. We need to go - NOW!
We got two -- negative, we have one there. Preparing to re-engage.
RC, new picture -- target is on the run and as fast as a motherfucker!
Squad, regroup. It's a cluster-fuck in here.
Yeah, we got a civilian crash here, patch it through to 911, over.
Going down, mayday, mayday, this is Ghost Nine going down.
Show some pity, man! I-I-I'm innocent!
Base Command, Ground Teams have lost hostile, over.
Take and hold the area. We're talking about a four block radius minimum, people. This is it.
Called it. You're in the game.
Strike Boss, you have permission to deploy.
Target has escaped. Alert all points.
We got visitors, HQ. You copy?
They'll be transferring whatever Bloodtox reserves they have in a convoy, an armored convoy.
What the hell is he doing!?
Did you hear me? I WILL open fire.
Jesus, was that a hit, any damage?
I have him. Get laser range and I'll hold it there.
That’s it. OK, I need to crack it.

japanese: カバーしろ！

english: Rounds are ready, target is hot, clear the Zone.
I have a negative on SD. It's your call, sir.
Get a Strike Team in here, over.
Fire and maneuver, fire and maneuver!
All teams are cleared. Situation elevated.
Escort the fucking tank they said.... WHO'S GOING TO ESCORT US, HUH!? Fuck me....
I'm gonna shove your balls right through your fucking head, MOTHERFUCKER!
Last known report has target heading east. Can we get a Bird in the air to recon, out.
Pull it together. Pull it up!
We're scanning the Zone, Red Crown.
Heading towards the Red Zone. Permission to engage.
All fingers, hands, legs, feet. It's all fuckin' good.
No need for the Corpsman here.
Secure the Blower. Those things can't close with this stuff in the air.
Tornado Five at rally point, awaiting friendlies, over.
Do not aggravate the sample. We'll switch this to the 'WATCH, over.
You can cut him off three blocks south of here, get the patrols on it.
Roger that, strike request answered, Package en route now, over.
Fuck me, what the hell's NEXT?
Tighten up! Let's bring this package home!
That vehicle is out of control!
Perimeter reported clear. Base clear. Return on assignments and report in.
Charlie Nineteen reporting, Dispatch. 10-84 and going in.
Target acquired, request Strike Package on my mark, over.
Cover left, cover left. Move, move!
Roger that. We see your mark. Closing.
japanese: 了解。 目印が見えた。 接近する。

english: Ghost Twelve, close in on your assigned target area and assist ground forces.
Get me out of here! Somebody, help me! Get this guy away from me! HELP ME!
Next time, call the army -- straight outta the box.
Close air support calling. This sector is negative, over.
Check your fire, there's live fucking ammo in those things!
Red Crown. Echo One Alpha requests Strike Team support, urgent.
See? You owe me a dollar.
Be ready to respond, Field Units, mission green light imminent.
There he is! There's Mercer and those fucking things are after him!
Hang on, Voodoo Seven joining the game.
I want anti-armor and high-explosive on it. Whatever we've got that pierces armor or bursts bunkers, pour it onto that mass!
japanese: 対戦車砲と榴弾を持ってこい。 徹甲弾や貫通爆弾をありったけ叩き込め！

english: Holy Shit! We beat it. We beat it.
All is quiet here, Red Crown. Mission status gold, over.
HQ, get air support on this turd.
Keep those things off of me!
Somebody, do something! Where're the fuckin' cops!?
Right about now I could sure use a hero. Man size. None of that dainty cuisine shit.
Our mission's over, but keep defense sensors on.
Four Hotel Nineteen -- calling for assistance. EMS.
Negative on that pursuit so far.
Push it, push it. Engage, sustain engage.
Form up, Field Team, let's regroup.
Was getting hairy in there, let's pull together, over.
Good thing I didn't save for retirement.
japanese: 退職のために節約なんてしてなくてよかったぜ。

english: Keep it up boys, this is turning in our favour.
Fire mission, fire mission, call sign is Almighty, co-ords as punched. Do it now!
Opening fire in three, two, one....
Extra hands always gratefully received... let's kick some ass.
Textbook, boys. Get you a case of beer for this one.
Grunts, you don't want to see this.
Red Crown, we're in the Zone and at the ready, over.
I will break your God damn face!
Triggers hot, we're ready to unleash, Red Crown.
Those UAVs can detect where I am - and where I've been.  They'll pick out Dana's safehouse - I can't let that happen.
Target marked for support fire, blow it into the stone age, son.
This is Charlie Nineteen, *cough* Charlie Nineteen -- we've got casualties!
Pull us out, pull us out, over.
Black gear, no badges, no ranks, no fuckin faces. These guys are in asshole heaven.

japanese: 何しやがる！
ここから出て行け！

english: Whoa! I think we should pull back.
You gotta be fucking kidding me.
Attack failure. Hit it again, over.
Threat is neutralized. Switching Delta and India Teams to viral containment mission.
I see it. I'm going radio silent.
Strike failure! ZEUS is still standing, over.
Ghost Nine, Combat Teams ready -- move in and kick some ass!
Dispatch, this is Four Hotel Thirty requesting immediate assistance for a 10-53.
*exhales* I thought we'd seen the last of this.
Hey that worked! Now I know how to drive it!
I can't move my legs. I can't move.
All units, maintain your pursuit protocols.
No, man, I got a family!
Search scenario, repeat, search scenario. Alpha Team set up a check point, over.
Confirmed sighting, requesting support. Pass visual to the old man.
This grid is vacant. Where do you want us, RC?
Confirmed kill in Target Zone. Burner down.
Mayday, mayday, I've got negative on controls, negative.
Red Crown, kill is confirmed, over.
Pull us out of the Zone. Go.
Come on, man. Let me go!
Hit the target. Hit the fucking target!
He'll fucking kill you! Watch out!
You don't have to kill me. Serve and protect!
Red Crown, we have burners in sight.
That's a launch. Every smoke in the pack.
It's among us! Be sure! Be sure!
Red Crown, we're a minute too late. Moving out.
Any witnesses, pick 'em off. We can't let photos get out.
Target slipped our net. Comin' home to re-supply.
You have possible cover on the target.
There's the target. Shoot him! Shoot!
They are spies. Greene is infecting soldiers and using them to spy on the military. If I consume them, I should be able to connect to their Hive Mind.
Field to Red Crown, we are clear, over.
It's getting clearer. Piece by piece.
Yeah, I'm gonna try and get a look. I wanna see if this shit is real.
This is not fuckin' right, man!
I can't believe what I just did.
japanese: 俺にこんな事が出来たなんて信じられねえ。

english: Initial positions secure. Command to give the order to engage, over.
We're negative on Mercer takedown. Roll in a Package on this -- I say roll in a Package at my location. Out.
What the hell is it doing? Someone get a picture of it!
Stop right there! This is a restricted area!
Shit, losing it. Gotta punch out.
Smack this bitch in the fuckin' ass!
Targets marked, start by priority, over.
Oh, what the hell. What is wrong with them. FUCK!

Air support, where's the fucking air support?  We're getting murdered down here.
Red Crown, we have re-acquired target, moving in.
I can contain them inside a military base.
This isn't going to be easy...
Red Crown, hostile nearly took us out.
Bring it on, fucker! Show me what you got!

No sign of target, we are returning to Citadel, over.
Withdraw to meet point while we reassess, stand by.

japanese: ここから出て行け！

english: Let me know when they're clear, hit it again, over.
Alex! Get us OUT of here!

japanese: くそ、COPPERHEADだ！

english: Nice shot, Barker. Not bad for a fucking hayseed?
Target destroyed, Thunder returning to Palace.

japanese: 下がれ！

english: Captain Roche, report to Briefing Area Three A. Captain Roche, to Briefing Area Three A.
That was the closest God damn shave I ever had.
I will not let this happen, you understand?
Pursuit is no longer the priority, officers are to resume security duty in accordance with standing military orders.
Initiating Bat-turn and heading out over the water, follow my lead back in. Tighten it up back there.
Hostile on board, hostile on board.

No crowding, I got bullets for all ya!
japanese: 1ヶ所に固まるな！ お前ら、撃たれたいのか！

english: I'm on my way Dana, I'm on my way.
Palace compromise, get a Response Team on this guy! High alert!

japanese: このヘリはDNAセンサーが装備されている。 俺に必要なハンターを見分けれるよう設定するか。

english: I don't know. I don't know!
I've got a vehicle down there, ripple the shit out of the entire area.
Uh, we got, uh, wounded crew, but, uh, we're still functional, over.
Don't do it, take everything I've got, please.
Request deployment of Strike Package Alpha, do you copy?
Fire, shoot before he fuckin' eats me!

english: Red Crown, Tornado Five losing altitude!
If you have a phone, call 911!

japanese: 近くにハイヴは無いそうだ。 奴らは地下からくるに違いない。

english: Dropping angels for a look see, over.
Charlie Nineteen, Dispatch. Subject has disappeared.
What the hell is that? Greene? Elizabeth Greene?
OK, Strike Team, here's your chance to blow this fucker off the map.
Ghost Four Five reporting kill, over.
Red Crown, you have this on scope, over?

japanese: 下がれ！

english: Breaking off, you're on your own.
We're negative on the target. Let's take it home.
Ranger Two Seven ready for action, over.
We're hit but not adrift, maintaining course.
I can't see! Can anybody see!?
Target break in grid Yankee, get us a team in and commence grid sweep.
Target's gone off the grid, over.
Fresh kill here. Call in the bucket squad.
Wha-wha-was that some kind of trick?
Motherfucker's think their shit comes out wrapped in ribbons.
Scrub the board. That's it. Do you copy?
That's messed up. Call in Arty on that shit.
Come out, come out, wherever you are.
Red Crown, this is Strike Boss. Trail is cold -- returning to base, over.
Punch this in, keep it on twelve rating.
Field Units, rendezvous at rally point, over.

japanese: クソ！

english: Drop the Package at my location, we will sustain contact with the target, over.
Red Crown, mission success, target eliminated!
Red Crown Command, advise ETA of reinforcements.
All Racecar and Hotrod Units. We are disengaging contested Zone. Rally point Zero Delta Hotel. Pogo to India Papa on my mark. Three, two, one -- mark.
Send me co-ords, Voodoo Seven is fangs out. Vector inbound.
Support Mission accomplished. We're heading back.
Tornado Five coming in on attack vector Nine Zero, clear target.
These coordinates are negative. It's not here.
Stop! You're in a restricted Zone!
Clear previous orders and stand by.
I need information, people! Stay calm!
I'm not out of it yet.
Field Team, can you repeat. Please respond, over.
Please do not panic! The situation is under control!
Emergency support is coming soon. Standby.
Dialing in. Ready to fire on targets, FO.
That's it. Drinks are on me.
Roller Three actual, requesting Red Crown diversion call, over and out.
Confirmed. Relay the status to military. They can take it from here, over.

japanese: カバーしろ！

english: Oh, man, wait, wait. Hold on, hold on, man. Look, look, OK? You don't have to do this.
Whoa, that was some shit. Don't get near it!
It's a fucking mess out here, RC. What can we do to help? Over.
Scan for targets. If you get anything, open up.
Do not let him try that again.
Oh, my God, are they dead?
Fire on my target! Do it!
Yo! What the fuck you doing here!?
That was close, too close. My fun meter is pegged.
Get us a Strike in here pronto, Red Crown.
Fire Mission complete, that's a wrap at this time.
Oh, man, I think it was him.
That's a confirmed hit on a secondary target.
Somebody, help! He's gonna kill me!
Something strange over there. Follow me in.
Mercer seems to be helping us! What the hell?
Ground, heads up. Hostiles at your Six.
You heard the order. Red Crown, out.
Nobody take a rest yet, it ain't over.
Can't tell who is who down there, upload visual.
He's gone to ground. We're searching.
Grab your weapon and get on the street, this is Highball Three signing off.
Field Units confirming loss of target. Drop the active search. Perimeter patrols stay active, out.
Ghost Four Five, I'm seeing a thermal that looks unusual, do you have a confirm?
FC found nothing, we're winding down and RTB.
Can't believe Command agreed to this.
Red Crown, do you want us in on the rescue effort, over.
Hotrod Two Eight, what's your status...? I can't read you....
He's right there -- no, there. Oh fuck.
This is Red Crown, scrub the strike and return, over.
On your toes, we got slimers.
People, move in an orderly fashion and nobody will get hurt!
Echo station clear. Hostiles have been stopped from advance. Check with NCOs and return to assignments, out.
C'mon, show yourself! Little shit's lurking in the shadows.
You must've dropped a decimal point somewhere! It needs more!
This is Charlie Nineteen. That's a negative.
It's a total cluster-fuck out here!
Dispatch, I'm in pursuit of the suspect!
Grid shows some sort of clusterfuck.  Onsite in thirty. Lim out.
Fire support overhead. Marines, see various targets, can you laser the hostile for us, over.
Scan, scan. Check for blood, anything.
japanese: 探せ、探せ！ 血痕、なんでもだ。

english: Red Crown, no hostiles on site. Terminating sweep, over.
Infection has moved beyond human form.
All Zones cold, repeat cold. Stand down on primary, over.
Keep this off the net. It's not news.
Shots reporting no damage on target, over.
Good work, boys -- we got 'er done.
Push the button on that. Do it.
Local units, give chase to suspect at flight.
Let's go, man, right now. You and me.
What the fuck is that thing doing!?
Oh, baby, I think we got problems.
We're good, we're good, stay on target!
McMullen wants you on a slab. So that's what he gets.
japanese: マクマレンはお前を解剖台に置きたいんだとよ。 だから俺を送り込んだ。

english: City's a fucking mess. Send the Medevac, over.
Stand down! That's a God damn order!
Solid job, troops. We got him.
Get that fucker on a stretcher!
Fire support now, we have close hostiles!
One, two, three. Just like that. One, two, three. BOOM! One, two, three!
Hang in, we still got enough to take it down.
Escort the fucking tank they said.... WHO'S GOING TO ESCORT US!? Fuck me....
Scanners dark, no sign of target.
Red Crown, we have burners in sight.
Target may have left the sector, over.
I don't care if it's the company president or a fucking janitor, if it walks outside and it's not one of us, you kill it dead. Understand?
Get cover where he can't use it!
I'm calling it off. Abort search.
Voodoo Sierra Hotel, I'm clear and heading home.
No way is he far from here.
All clear on our Twenty here, Control.
Boss, you want we should check that out?
Got our boy, Dispatch. Send Strike Team to Three Charlie Seventy-Seven.
Red Crown, we've got a negative on it, over.
Pick up the pace...let's get this done.
Give Zulu Team first strike, I want immediate support if this is confirmed.
That red stuff is spreading fast. It has to be connected to Elizabeth Greene.
Check your fire, there's live fucking ammo in those things!
Requesting additional forces on point. Come in at my Twenty, I have an insertion ready to go.
I'm seeing a sea of red out here, HQ, over.
We're in a big fuckin' mess here, over.
Add one to the body count.
10-80 the back-up, Dispatch. Our Twenty is clear.
Negative HQ, the area is still too hot. Moving in to stabilize
Did you at least hit the target?!
Hostage! Check your fire! Check your fire!

So you can see, by interpolating between multiple detection data points in real-time, we can triangulate his movement paths. In short, we can zero in on where Mercer has been as if following a trail. After that, it's just a question of putting the right air package where he shows up brightest. We'll flush him out.
Come on boys, we can't let them roll us over.
Direct from General Randall. We need to make more progress. Let's go people.
We can take this crowd of reds - hit 'em!
All sectors reporting empty. How do you want to proceed, Commander?
Scrub the search, he's not here.

english: Target located, good to go, over.
Lost target, I'm blind, repeat, blind, over.
Red Crown! We're going in. Request SAR -- SAR immediate.
Contact faded, we are clear, over.
Damn. Maybe God really DOES love me.

english: He's the one you're looking for.
Tactical shows you have movement on the western sector, do what you can down there.
Yo, Dispatch, I got him! Dead ahead!
Thunder Four Five, we see activity, over.
I don't believe it.... Ready Pod Two, hit it again!

Send team to my coordinates. I have visual.
Major flak. We're beat up a bit. The controls have some movement. Please advise.
WRONG! I'm NOT the target. Think it through!
Scrub the search and regroup. Out.
Make it quick, man. Do it!
We ain't gonna sweep this under the rug.
I called 911! Bastards put me on hold!
Holy shit - he's on his feet!

As easy as flexing a muscle.
Hang on, shit is coming. Confirm.
Fire all weapons, we're going for a grand slam.
I need a 10-1 on that pursuit?

Hang tight, Red Crown, engaging hostile, over.
Red Crown requesting situation update, do you copy?
Send in a shovel and a bag.
Watch it! Watch it! ZEUS is hot!
Why kill me?! I-I-I didn't do anything to you!
Red Crown, I've been hit, I think I can keep her up.
Keep firing, it's gotta go down, over.
What do they think they're doing!?
It's about time that fucker went down. Nice work, team.
I've got live arms and moving targets.
Don't look at him. Move away.
You three, head back to the checkpoint and flag a transport.
Aw, fuck. Going to hell, man.
Dispatch, this neighborhood is crawling with burners.
Oh, Shit! That's him! That's him right there!
Give me cover fire, I have to retreat.
Who the hell are these guys? They look more like mercs than Marines.

Red Crown, target is evading assault.
Unidentified source on sensors. Checking it out.
Yo -- no, no, no, no! Don't fuckin' shoot!
See that? D-did you SEE THAT?
I ain't no fucking hostile! Think about this!
When I get the next one, get outta here!
Radio this in. We need it verified.
I got him! Help me take him down!

Dispatch, I have no idea what this is -- but I'm calling it in.
Brass only in there. I bet inside it's all biscuits and pussy.
Let's turn this twenty ton bathtub around and go.
Shit -- the fucking base is on fire!
Run, get outta here! Run, run!

In range, Red Crown, awaiting orders.

Four Hotel Nineteen -- calling for assistance. EMS.

He's down. We'll mop up, scrape to standby.

english: This is the address we need to get to.
All units instructed to form a search-and-cover web.

Red Crown. We have the eye on hostile skins, over.

Standby, moving to Target Range, over!

english: Get out of the way from the tank!
Evil Eyes have positive contact with Zeus. Spring cleaning -- now.
One contact source. Perimeter identified, marked and uploaded.
Let's fucking kill 'em all to be sure!
Why is it shooting at everyone!?
Repeat, repeat. We lost your last comm.
This facility is on its last legs. Fuck.

english: All burners down. Nice work, people. Roll up the diesel.
No, no -- it's all a mistake!
Thrust down 30%, something's wrong here. Voodoo, out.
Anyone see it? Anyone God damn see it?
japanese: 誰かあれを見たか？ あのクソッタレを見たか！？

english: I've gotta call target evaded us. Heading home.
Confirmed sighting of burners in the Red Zone, warming up the 30.
You can hide, but you can't ride.
All units, battle-space is now clear. Do you copy?
What kind of thing does this shit?
We're in deep, RC, hold the line.
Oh, you can kill me, but we'll keep coming.

EMS inbound. Do what you can for the wounded.

OK, here comes the big boy, over.
Uh, that's a pull command, we're on the back foot and pulling back.

I can't die here. No! No, not like this. Not like a God damn dog.
Request confirmed. Firing for effect, report errant immediate.
Chalk Three -- Tornado Charlie. Do you copy? Do you copy? Over.
Beat it, stupid. I should have shot you already.

Visual! I got ZEUS! Fire on my target!
Give him a seat at the round table, over.
It's moving fast, will try to maintain visual, over.
We're done here, Red Crown. Nothing left to do but the drinking.
Lookin' around, give him a little pow-wow, over
I will break your God damn face!
Nothing in the sights, pop the hatch -- I'll eyeball it.
Put him down, nice and easy.
