We have some serious wreckage right here.
This is Voodoo Seven, form up on my Six, over.
Zeus sighted - give it all you got people.
We'll get this up to the Brass.
We've got people hurt here! Call 911! CALL 911!
We're going in, pick your targets.
Dispatch, I have an affected structure.
Razor. I'm calling it, this sweep is done, over.
This is all over the news.
Contact is clear, all units consolidate.
My fuckin legs! Jesus, I can't move my fuckin' legs!
Multiple reports from the field. I think we got him, over.
We got some more going on down there, check it out.
Get Armstrong up there! Guns up!
We're not going anywhere, I can't turn it around.
Target's still moving. Haven't seen that before....
Confirmed, ZEUS in the Zone, requesting Strike Package.
Don't let up -- we got it!
Dust is messing with our sensors, Red Crown.
Cover your mouths! Don't breath in the dust.
You think that fuckhead Mercer let this shit loose here?
Structure marked and uploaded. Hardtack One, clearance.
I got it, I got it here!
Alert, we have a combat engagement in the Blue Zone. Deploying additional forces at Hotel Foxtrot Delta, out.
Dispatch, you have this place marked for forensic, already?
Ghost to ground, terminating recon sweep, over.
Bravo Six Niner, we have fresh target for the Strike Boss. Deploy on these co-ords over.
This is Charlie Nineteen. That's a negative.
Soft target taking direct fire, we have to relocate.
I have ZEUS in sights, permission to engage, over.
Echo One Alpha here. I got nothing.
Go White status. Hostile terminated, over.
Command is rescinding orders, go back to dark mode, we are clear, over.
Tornado Five, confirmed kill in the Red, over.
Alpha Charlie - be advised Nighthawk is en route to the extraction point. Rendezvous at the evac primary, northern edge of the park. Red Crown, out
I got all the back up I need right here.
Exfiltrating aircraft, turn your vessel around and touch down immediately, you are carrying potential contaminants and cannot be allowed to continue your flight path.
Don't get sloppy. It's not over.
Arm up, it's a real shit-storm down there, Red Crown.
This is Charlie Nineteen -- I got movement on my Twenty. Stand by for update.
Target in the Zone, back up, back up!
Suspect is on the run, please acknowledge
He’s here! Get wings in the air! All pilots, wind up and takeoff.
Someone get on the net, we need Medevac here ASAP.
Keep it locked or lose it, boy!
Let's make use of these extra units.
Hold it! I'm BLACKWATCH -- Three Three Oh Six Two Three Four!
Wait a minute! I am not resisting! Please!
Surface contact, share any Intel at this time, over.
Hold the line, Red Crown, over.
Take him down! Make it happen!
Grand slam! Hostile down. It's in the bag, over.
You got him? I fucking got him.
Search and destroy, target is at our location, do you copy?
Get me back to MY range!
He couldn't hit a barn door from there.

japanese: 責任は奴らに在る。

english: Man, I think he's got that disease!
Ghost Four Five, we see activity, over.
Red Crown, we have re-acquired the target.
I hope the sample was worth the trouble. I have to get it back to Parker’s.
Nightlight status is clear, ground forces take cover and clear a path, heat coming.
Save your ammo. We need more.
All units, I have lost contact with suspect.
Sweet sugary shit. That fucker's BIG.

japanese: あいつの注意をひかないと（LEADER INTERESTメーターが0になった時）

english: Mission complete, Package delivered. Message received, over.
HQ, we've got the hot target here. You wanted priority comm on this, over.
Dog Company reporting in, we have hardened facility up and running.
Green has to know something about what happened. I have to get inside.
Hostile is down. Nice work, crew.
Awww shit! Here comes the cavalry!
japanese: ああ、クソったれ！ ヘリ部隊のお出ましか！

english: Red Crown, we're cold on trail, new co-ords? Over.
Dispatch, Charlie Nineteen is 10-84. Just give me the word.

japanese: 分隊！ 俺に続け！

english: Unit is breached! Get us out of here!
Red light status has been stepped down.
See if you can find out who's stirring this crowd up!
Withdraw to search pattern Golf. Command says close it down for now.
Red Crown, I have it. Target is back on scope.
I killed him. *laughs* Shit, I really killed him.
This is Ghost Hog One Seven, we are deploying forces on the ground, over.
Man, no. Come on, no. Please.
Taking a beating here, RC. Continue engagement? Over.
You took my sister! I'm going to end you!

japanese: 上手くいけばいいんだがな……。

english: What was it? What did this?
At least we have plenty of expendables, eh.
Three grids are negative on visual.
Pfft. BLACKWATCH. It should be Pinkwatch. Bitches.
This is your Commander. Give me an update.
I need to look like one of them....
People, calm down! We need some order before we can help!
I don't understand this -- we just shot ten holes in his chest and two in his head.
We did it, HQ. This area is secure.
All points, Fox company holding position. Zone is still Blue occupied, repeat, Blue, over.
Ready to start search Red Crown, any sightings?
Let's keep them all like that.
Fuckin' watch that! I'm not fuckin red!
What? What the hell is that? I can't hear you!
Red Crown to Sigma One. Understood. Regroup at Red Crown Base. Out.
It's like somebody shat out a building.
Red Crown here, clarification pending. Hold clear status, over.
Given this is martial law, we COULD shoot that fucker.
I got it, at my target!
We're going to move in for a closer look, RC.
If you didn't see that, I can't describe it.
We are OK, tell me we are OK.
Pull back and assume formation. What's your status, over.
They think I'm dead. Perfect. I can't wait to see the look on McMullen's face.
I'm here, right in the guts of it!

japanese: カバーしろ！

english: Code November Charlie, Zone is neutralized. Send in the Scrape Team, we're Green for exfiltration, moving out.
HQ requests an update. Sit-rep, sit-rep.
All air units, open fire on APC Foxtrot Lima One Five Four, if sighted.
There's nothing in there you want, trust me.
Roll in, roll in, fire when clear.
japanese: 集結せよ、集結せよ。 確実に見えたら撃て。

english: Sidekicks form up, get ready for the drop.
We need to get our act together here boys - quick smart!
Get out the way! Get out the way!
We have a launch, got launch.
We're in the shit, repeat comm, over.
Johnson, get some fire on that thing!
What do you want with me!
We need more firepower here - it's not going our way so far.
Clear the area, give us the shot.
Oh, shit. Things have gone from bad to worse.
He's close. Very close. We were right next to him!
Still mobile, still in this, over.
Red Crown, we are in range, give us a target, over.
Chalk Three has lost visual. You want us to sweep?
Voodoo Seven calling for strike. Spank that sucker, over.
Hostile is HOT! Repeat, hostile HOT!
All teams are responding. We're at go status.
Not working! Get the fuck away!
Oh, no, not like this, please!
Ghost twelve, return to your assigned mission area! Get back in there and provide air support for our men!
Are you seeing this video, Red Crown?
We lost it, turning back, over
Recall Search Units. Search is over.
Target is outstanding and at our Six. Coming in.
OK, destroy the filtration units and the whole thing comes down.
What a cluster-fuck -- hit em hard! Make 'em bleed!
Skins, repeat, skins. Paint them and stand back.
Don't say I didn't warn you.
Confirmed, we'll get back to you.
Anything and everything, FC requesting a hail Mary. Danger close, just pound the earth and make it fast.
Don't kill me, don't fucking kill me.
You sure nothing shows on the thermal? I got shit, over.
Yeah, hostile's gone dark, RC. Package failed, over.
Dispatch, 10-80 that request for back-up. We made it.
I don't want to die! HELP!
There, there! That machine -- it's fucking out of control!
The tank! It's firing on us!
Field Teams requesting sweep cancellation, Command, awaiting orders.
Fuck, this place stinks. I'll call this one in, get a little fire on the household.
Get your people back, this is gonna be a big one.
No, I-I-I got ID. No, please, don't kill me!
One Adam Nineteen. Adam Nineteen. I got a positive on hostiles.
We're clear, no sign of hostile, do you read?
Aircap, checkout that last dropped contact. Rikky-tik, uploading co-ords to you now.
Brute sight on the laser, you need to retool.
Roger, ground forces, clear targets and ready fire.
No-no-no-no-no-no-no! Don't, don't, don't, don't, don't do it!
I see them, Red Crown. Will open fire.
We need support, Red Crown, get us some air backup -- now.
japanese: 援護が必要だ。 レッドクラウン。 エアサポートをよこしてくれ。 今すぐに。

english: We got a real pretty bang-up.
Lots of rubble and debris, get our teams out, Field Commander.
Red Crown, Voodoo Seven commencing attack run Bravo. Running on you, marking.
Pulled a Houdini. Plenty of bodies here, none of them his.
It could be any of us!
Shit! We're hit! But...we're bringing it back online.
Got a bogey. I'm checking it out.
What the fuck are you doing?
He's playing you, you fuckin' idiots! Shoot him instead!
Strike Team is deployed to your Twenty.
ZEUS has broken away. I'm searching.
Ghost Twelve has gone rogue. Scrambling gun-ships to escort him to Palace. You're done, Ghost Twelve, DONE. I don't want to hear anything else on this channel until someone is reporting him splashed.
I'm with the Strike Team. You call, we curb-stomp.
This place needs to come apart piece by piece.
Balls to the wall, you sorry sons of bitches, here they come again!
If anyone got that full transmission, please rebroadcast, over
Sector is hot again. Paint it, hot, over.
Movement, movement. Punch it in, hit it.
Uh, Red Crown, we just found a shortcut to hell.
Man, we should get out of here!
Negative, Echo Team. I'm still getting some promising readings from the sensor arrays here.
Sound off friendlies, Tornado Five approaching.
Red Crown, Tornado Victor Juliet, hostile marked. Request Strike Package to this vector.
What's the deal with those guys anyway?
Pull it back and sweep the other side, over.
Couple more! Just a couple moreand we're close!
Sound off! I want everyone accounted for!
I'm hit! F-O-D. Pulling up. Holding.
Check your Six, teams, we got infected. Multiple targets, over.
Somebody up there fucking hates me.
Sustain on my laser target, I have a soft spot.
I can't believe what you just did.
Twenty seconds to impact. Vacate immediate area around target.
All points, prepare for counter-attack, keep corners covered.
Confirmed. We are go on target. Loader, standby.

english: Taggart, you're going to die here.

Everybody, settle down -- let's stay focused!

english: What did I do? Come one, man!

english: Red 4 reporting - we are on the verge of victory here.

Vision block down! Vision block down!

Shoot the shit out of it!

Target back in our sights Red Crown.

english: Damn you, point that gun away!

Target is down, repeat, ZEUS is down.

Some idiot damn near killed themselves.

english: Ahhhhh! Ahh! The pain! Ah, aaagghhh!

english: Jesus Christ, check your fire! We're Devil Dogs!
I warned you this could happen!

Driver down! Driver down! Bail out!

Oh, God, it hurts. It fucking hurts.

english: Gearbox is damaged but otherwise functional!

Sweeping area of last sighting, over.

It's almost down! Nail it again.

english: Form around me! Form up! Over.

We have a visual on center of infection, over.
Hey, man, settle down -- I'm one of you!
I'm gonna fuck you up, asshole!

Voodoo Seven is on the scene and go to engage. Report hostiles, we will flatten.

english: Heads up! Target head on. By the vehicle.
Tornado Eight unable to re-acquire. We're still good to go. Standing by for re-assignment.

Stop right there or you WILL be shot!
Lousy fuckin' snake in the grass....
D-One, D-Two, give me an entry point.

Lock on last coordinates, clear for launch.
Yo! What the fuck you doing here!?
Pulling up! Can't hold it. Going down!
Boys.. wind it up! Come on! We're on the edge of failure here.
We are deep in shit. Repeat. Deep in shit.
Roger, he's open. Go forward and hit it.

english: Somebody, help! He's gonna kill me!
I have to take them out before they can radio in. That includes the detector unit.

Some sort of fibrous organic growth. And it's spreading.  It looks like the same material Greene created.
Whoa, I've seen some weird shit, man, but...this tops it.
Cannot reply at this time, Red Crown!
Red Crown from Chalk Three. Hostile located. Send us some support.
The tank! It's firing on us!
ZEUS is packing, watch your Six!

ANYBODY STAYING HERE IS A FUCKING MORON! Get out!

Confirmed, Blue Zone is clean, repeat, clean.

japanese: Toxチームの1つと連絡が途絶えた。 全部隊、臨戦態勢をとれ！ おそらくZEUSだ。

english: Aw, not now! Why would that bastard show up NOW!?
We'll be moving in to check out possible, Wong, Garcia, move up!

Mmm, I loves the smell of cordite.
japanese: んー、コルダイトがかぐわしいぜ。

english: Will attempt to confirm sighting, over.
Contain it here. Don't let any of these fucking things out! This is the red line!
Get ready to roll some thunder.
How many more passes, Red Crown? It ain't here.
Sweet mother of God. What the hell was that thing?
Red Crown. Preliminary Intel suggests ZEUS is down, out.
Aim for the collateral. Won't hurt to flatten all of it.

Red Crown, requesting Strike Package, do you copy?

japanese: ハマー、答えろ、ハマー！ くそっ！デルタ、ハマーがやられた。 すぐに向かえ！

english: Get this to HQ, we need an eye in the air.
Confirm your targets, let's avoid a Charlie Foxtrot, over.
Movement confirmed, we're still in this.
All points, situation is updated. Withdraw and deploy as previous, over.
Death from above, Fire Mission underway.

Thunder Four Five, hostile on board, hostile on board!

Unidentified pilot, you are leaving the Manhattan Safe Zone. You are not cleared to move beyond. Return to your flight path or you will be shot down.

We're right in the middle of it.
Target is visual, target on visual!
Do you know how big a hole this gun will leave in you?

english: Open up on this guy! It's this guy!

We're in the shit here, Red Crown.

Aw, shit! I can't fuckin' breath, man! *coughs*

Bravo Base, this is Squad Y-Y. We've got some sort of wild fucking animals loose on the streets. We need air support.
I don't know what you are, but I know I'm going to kill you.
japanese: お前が一体何かなんて知ったことか。 だが1つ確かなことがある。 お前はここで俺に殺されるってことだ。

english: They have no clue what they're in for.
Anyone else see that? I can't believe it.
Field Team reports negative on target.
Look, it's my beat, and I don't like sharing it with these spooks.
Hit it again, Highball control. Hit it again.
Roger Wilco, commencing sweep for target.
We have shut them down, Red Crown!
We're clear here, Red Crown. All fire points report broken attack or neutralized hostiles. We will update with casualties, out.
Tell Ground Forces we'll be inbound in a second.

japanese: いくぞ。

english: This is Command. We have multiple conflicting reports of ZEUS’ position.
We're doing good boys"," we're doing good."
Field Commanders, issue cease fire until further command, over.
God damn, man, hold your fire!
Re-inforcements have arrived at the scene - thank you HQ...
Hull down, find a hull down and deploy for effect!
Ghost Four Five, circling the target, fall in formation and confirm status and munitions, over.
Target has disengaged, Tornado Five blind.
Contact at the rear, be aware.
Get some support in there, now!
OK men - keep it together, we can turn this around.

japanese: 終わりだ。

english: Hotrod Two Eight, what's your status...? I can't read you....
There's no way that just happened.
Situation report, come back. All teams, do you copy?
Last buzz confirmed something smokey down there, tell the Ground Brass, over.
Dispatch, we got him on the run!
Voodoo going down! SAR at my last!
Please, let me go. I don't deserve to die.
We are clear to engage, let us through.
I got him. I fuckin' got him! Keep on me!
He's around here somewhere. Let's go!
We're pulling out, Red Crown, over.
We got some motherfuckin' infected on the motherfuckin' pump.
Tied up here. We'll hit you back!
Clear over here. Find us something to kill.
Do we have a visual from the air? We're cold on the ground here, over.
Strike request Alpha. Can we get a team in here pronto, do you copy?
Aw, I've heard about this, you know anything?
That's an ugly turn, get in close on that one.
You're out, we're in, have a nice day.
Steady! Keep us at range, over.
Oh, no. I think she's dead! S-somebody, help me!
Get out NOW! Forget what you saw!
Hey, wait! Hold on! Hold on!
What do you want? Money? I can get you money! No!
Red Crown, the situation is under control, over.
Ground teams need to confirm it. I just see shit.
Someone here knows McMullen -- and they'll tell me everything they know.
More pieces, more fragments.... It's frustrating....
Requesting new instructions, target unavailable, over
He's in our Safe Fire Zone!
Hold tight. Check that out. We should check that out.
Ready for kill, repeat, ready for kill.
Got him! Target, ten o'clock, target ten.
There's no right or wrong, man. Only right.
I never thought I'd fuckin' go like this.
We have confirmed disinfectant assignment, clear downrange and give Highball a shot.

japanese: 見つけた。

english: Take my van! Take everything! Please!
We did a visual outside, it's nowhere. Fold it up, over.
Please, don't! Let me go! I beg you!
Give him some space. Back up.
I can't feel it anymore. I can't feel it....
You're not getting away from me!
Roger Whiskey Team, Command requesting RTB, search is off, over.
Don't lose him! Tag him, tag him!
We got company, lots of company, and it's not welcome.
Dispatch, this is Charlie Nineteen. I got an ID on the suspect. Bring the rain.
Situation's under control, do you copy?
Check all weapon systems, tell me what we got and what we don't.
This is Delta Squad Leader. Target is active. Commencing ground assault. Will radio All Clear when ZEUS has been neutralized, out.
Bad guys are back, Dogs, hang tight.
Keep up, y'all! Stay with me!
I've got to find someone important who I can use to get into that facility....
japanese: あの施設に入るために必要な奴を探さねえと……。

english: Ranger Commander here. Point us to ZEUS and we will destroy, over.
This is it. Moment of truth.
Hey, man, I know it’s top-secret and shit, but what the fuck -- why aren't we on the need-to-know list?
Think about this. You don't have to kill me!
Red Crown, there's a swarm of burners here.
It's on board, shake if off, shake it off!
Lieutenant, we just lost the captain!  You're on your own!
Leader Hunters...  I know the one that took Dana.   If I find him - and I consume him, then I can find her.
Attempting evac, Red Crown, please advise rally point.
Call in local EMS. Maintain your Zones.
This is Blackjack Commander, any Field Team units alive out there?
Smoking holes on the way, Ground troops cover up!
Confirm our status. Strike Package was a hit, over.

japanese: リロード！

english: That thing is the fuckin' DADDY! Yeah!
Call it in! Call it in! We need EMS!
Looks like that hurt it. What was that?
Perimeter restored Red Crown. Field Command is ready to go.
Sighting confirmed on hostile, tell two Corps and get grunts down here.
Let me check this again.... Reds are on scope, over.
Merged on vector, awaiting tactical, over.
It's gotta be close by. Commencing grid op.
What's with these guys -- they act like they got an extra set of balls.
Keep track of him! Tag him!
Red Crown, we are scanning last known co-ords, over.
Wait, I could shift into one of their forms and join them.
Get me a strike package at Mercer's location!
Dig it out! It's here somewhere.
Hostiles in the wire, get the Bird in the air and wheels on the street!
ZEUS is in the Palace. I repeat, ZEUS is IN the palace!
Roll up the carpet, we are heading home.
We're good, still good. Razor One operational, over.
We have reacquisition. Weapons ready, over.
Nicely done! One more to go before the MOTHER-load!
japanese: よくやった！ ママのとこまであと1つだ！

english: Oh, hell, what now? Can't these people learn to fucking drive?
I've lost control. No control, we are going in! This is Ghost Bird Three Seven Niner, we are going down. Three Seven Niner, going down. SAR to our location. SAR!
japanese: 操縦不能。 どうにもならない、墜落する！ こちらゴーストバード379、墜落する。 379、墜落する。 本位置へ救助を求む。 救助を！

english: Fire, fire, you got the target, over
Have I gone blind? All I see is fucking black.
Nothing we can do, Tower. Pucker factor does not describe.
Just cool down, man, just, just cool down!
Back up and establish a perimeter. Keep everyone back from the remains.
On Roller Unit, reform and ready to engage.
Hit it with the cannon! Now!
Strike Package is go, repeat, Package is go.
Alert all points. Target has left the Zone.
Bring in the lifters, he's done!
I saw him go that way!

japanese: 2分やる、間抜け。

english: We have confirmed sightings of hostile. Step us up to red alert, combat status, over!
Son of a bitch, that was close!
One more step and I shoot.
Target broke lock, initiating sweep. If you hit collateral, hit it good.
Locked and ready for shot, you're cleared to re-educate. Bear right.
Hold your fuckin' fire, I'm a Marine!
Check all weapons systems, switch to manual operation.
Grid search order is belayed. Alert Gray, repeat, Alert Gray.
What the hell are you doing!?
Spotters, do you have a visual of the target? Security is negative, out.
Can we tap into the local security net, RC? Need acquisition, over.
It's dead. Call this one up the chain.
It can't take many more hits.
Now, what the hell in God's name was that?
All Birds, get distance and new picture, over.
Tornado Oscar to Chalk Three. Good job, we're on him. Go ahead.
Strike Team is mobile. Ground Teams, find cover and await clearance to evacuate.
I know! I wished to God it wasn't!
*coughing* Jesus, man, what the hell was that?
I have visual. Winding deflection to point and engaging.
Attention, you are not cleared for approach. Change course immediately.
Thirty meters, thirty meters, target assigned!
Visual on Target Zone, we are systems green and weapons active, clear it.
Make sure that thing is dead.
Red Crown, air element here, cruising and snoozing. All quiet here, over.
HQ, I got a positive on the target, we are in close ballgame, over!
Protocol says we wait, hold it!
We have a clear picture, mission success, Voodoo Seven coming home.
We're taking repeated hits here. Heavy damage. Should we abandon the position, over!?
Ace Four, take the lead and keep moving! We got this!
Fox Squad Oh Five. We're standing strong here. We're clear of engagement, over.
I won't lie to you. This is bad. Red center.
I survived weeks of this shit to die here? I don't deserve this.
Uh, we've come up empty, stand down and out.
This is Charlie Nineteen. We got an MVA! MVA!
Have to withdraw, we're in too close, over.
Ranger Two Seven coming in. Mission complete, over.
Take it! Take it! Take it!
God damn, man, hold your fire!
Zone is hot, repeat last transmission.
This is Blackjack Two, regroup on me.
Now, what the hell in God's name was that?
Target marked. Don't fucking hit us, hit the target.
Nothing's here, we'll hold and await confirmation.
This is Command. ZEUS is now FULLY contained.
Strike Boss to Strike Team Alpha. Aborting mission. Disengage, over.
Update, update. Burners positive. Contact closing!
Send team to my coordinates. I have visual.
Red Crown. Awaiting arrival of medical supplies but otherwise good to go.
That's far enough! Now get down on the ground!
We're going to pull back and strike again, clearance codes confirmed.
Squad command reporting target mobile, over.
You there! Stop where you are!
We need Strike support, RED CROWN!
Where the fuck is that support!?
Ranger Two Seven here. We're going to sweep the area.
Lotsa fuckin' pus, but we're OK.
Dispatch, it's time to rock. I got him back!
Hotrod Two Two, sit-rep....  Red Crown, can't raise Hotrod Two Two on the net, over.
Pulling this beast back, too hot in here, RC.

japanese: 伏せろ！

english: Cannon cockers and fast movers, you have the mark, out.
They're coming from all directions! Hold the line!
Call it in. They've got the wrong target!
Keep 'em coming, prepare to fire again.
I'm not ZEUS! Not the target!
Do not copy, Dispatch -- we're under fire!
ZEUS is down, repeat, ZEUS is down. Continue engagement with burners if you have them, over.
Lim on channel.  What the fuck is going on down there?   Thunder three and seven, support assign.
I can't see a fucking thing in this.
Too hot. I'm outta here. This is Evergreen, we are punching.
Come back? We're tied up, over.
We've got a threat pattern search scenario.
Yo, yo, yo -- slow down, chief. You don't have the authority to start the pump. We're waiting for the Major.
Bravo and Delta Teams, you're up. Maintain cover, search and destroy, over.
Here they come again! Get some fire support on those catwalks. Get to cover. MOVE! MOVE! MOVE!
Despite the progress, we have a ways to go, people. Stay on target.
Blackjack Two, folding it up, no sign of target.
Three Five, Three Five, coming in from the east.
Roger, moving forces up. Make that redeployment most rikky-tik, Sergeant!
Tornado One's lost power! Going in badly!
Shit, that one almost has Chalk Two. See what you can do.
You're fast, I'll give you that.
japanese: お前、速いな。 そいつをくれてやるよ

english: The signal is maxed out here, Red Crown. Get a Package on point, over.
Mission aborted. All teams confirm target clearance.
Gimme a break, man, I was just doing my job!
Backing out, will send new locale, over.
McMullen is the head of research.  He knows what happened to me - so I need to draw him out.
Red Crown, we have positive ID on your rogue Bird. Request permission to engage.
Let the military finish this. I'm done.
There's gonna be a lotta heat coming our way.... Let's just get this shit done and stay frosty.
I can't see a fucking thing. If you're down there and able, squawk now.
You stay alive, big fella -- then I'll kill you.
Whoa! That thing packs a punch!
Got contacts at twelve, nine, three o'clock -- they're fucking everywhere!
Switching to containment mission Alpha, all Black Teams ready or engaging.
Anyone moves to leave the building, you take them down. You understand me? We shoot, we burn.
Stick a fork in him, he's done.
What the hell's going on here?
Finish it, Ground, it's nearly there, over.
Red Crown from Tornado Twelve, mission over. Repeat, mission over. Hail Mary.
I said sustained fire! Sustained fire!
It's gone dark, phone me a locale, over.
Site checks out, Dispatch. We're out of here.
That's not possible -- he's just sucking it dry.
I need to get us clear.
If you can get me a couple of minutes with those corpses, I think I can get what you need.
japanese: 死体をしばらく調べさせてくれれば君に必要な物がわかると思う。

english: Abort, abort! Operation Bulldog is immobile.
Alright, we need to keep our heads down - steer clear from any military.
Watch out for those fuel tanks! Clear the God damn area!
Command channel! Main target marked. Bring in some muscle to heat him up, over.
Casualties down here, Red Crown, I'd put us at 80% of the first wave. You have to get us support and let me get my men out.
I'm gonna roll and sweep for visual of hostile, over.
I read you and will proceed.
I think it's in that vehicle!
Let's go find something to blow up.
Everyone, on me! I see him!

japanese: 下がれ！

english: Son of a bitch shoulda known better.
Zone is Blue, threat down, repeat, threat down.

japanese: カバーしろ！

english: Go Yellow. Repeat, go Yellow status, out.
Get in. Get out. No fucking around.
Where the fuck is the target?!
japanese: 標的のクソッタレはどこだ！？

english: After this, I will never complain about this old tub.
OK, we can still turn this around, just get going with it!
Positive ID. We are ready for a strike. We'll withdraw on your call.
Requesting permission for close proximity combat drop, Ghost Seven Niner can finish this.
Hostile onboard! Clear this fucking hostile!
Let's go! Let's go! Let's go!

japanese: ハハ、連中、逃げてやがる！

english: Yeah, we see it, too. We'll eyeball and hit you back, over.
Make the firepower count - we can take them.
It's fading. I need to consume more.
We got him, we got him. OK, check his hands.
On my mark. Go, go, go!
Contact in the northern sector! They're coming from the north!
Here's where we find out what she can take, over.
We are back in the game, my friends.
Keep it up squad, we got this.
Infected! Man, get outta my way!
I'm a mother! I have children! Please!
What the hell are we fighting here?
Take them out before ZEUS busts him open!
If the Blackwatch have hardware that can crack these hives apart, I could use it to reach Dana.  Let's check it out.
japanese: ブラックウォッチがこのハイヴを破壊できる兵器を持ってくるっていうなら、それを利用すればディナに辿り着けるか。 やってみるか。
伏せろ！

english: Search code Delta One Five terminated. Five Unit, stay on current location, over.
The shit has hit the fan, Dispatch!
Let's get this thing pinned down.
Red Crown, this is Voodoo, moving to investigate threat. Will update.
Dispatch, this is Charlie Nineteen. This site is negative.
Red Crown, I have possible activity at my Twenty. Moving in.
Radio check, radio check, roll in a Strike Package at this location.
Stand by for new orders. Belay the search.
RC, there goes a perfectly nice day. Our location is marked.
We're God damned cannon fodder up here, fall back!
Lasing target. We're in range and go to release. Awaiting orders, over.
Soldiers...if they know who I am, they probably know who she is.... I need to get to a good view point and scope the area out.
japanese: 兵士か……俺のことが知られてるなら、おそらく妹も……。 眺めのいい場所から状況を把握する必要があるな。

english: Guys, some fucked up shit here.
Augh -- fuck! OK -- we're still OK.
This is Red Crown, we have target disconnect, over.
Eyes peeled, folks. He's all SLY.
Get us a strike, RC, ZEUS is in the Zone.

japanese: Dコード、装甲車、自動機銃……。 すげえな。

english: Don't be treating me like I'm your boy, motherfucker.
Holy Christ -- what's going on there?
Response Unit has lost target. We're coming home.
It's back on the scopes, let's light it up.
Strike Boss, we will stall him until your Package drops. Fire engagement distance.
Look for targets in the crowd!
Fire on my location! Fire on my goddamn' loc…Ahhh!
Remember, don't make trouble if it's not there, over
Cyclic, collective, rudder.  I can fly this thing.
japanese: 補助翼、昇降舵、ラダーか。 操縦できるな。

english: My line of sight's cluttered, I lost it.
Red Crown, Red Crown this is Tornado Leader, hostiles defeated. Homeward bound.
Tornado One to Red Crown, Zone negative. Target has vanished. Want this guy to go to spiker, over?
Here's an idea: raise your hand if you're not the fuckin' target.
HQ, that's a no go. We lost him.
In the shit, Control, in the shit!! Delay comm. Out.
Red Crown, target not down, over.

japanese: 来たぞ！

english: Call 911, we need an ambulance over here!
Thunder to ground, terminating recon sweep, over.
ZEUS is here. Repeat, we have commenced engagements with ZEUS, over.
Co-ords confirmed, target is hot. Light it up.
This is Charlie Nineteen, I'm in pursuit of suspect!
We did it, we all did it. Good job.
RC, please confirm, satellite visuals confirm mission sequester.
Wait a minute! I am not resisting! Please!
Ballgame is moving, contact is at new co-ords, check your system.
Officer rank and above only get inside. Barker tried to go in just for a piss and now he's in the stockade.
Red Crown, rally Field Team on us, over.
Get the fuck back in the fight!
I'll take all the God damned help we can get.
Let me go! You don't need to kill me!
Holy shit, I've heard about this.
Let's get the drop on him.
Voodoo Seven requesting strike. Target confirmed.
We've too many machines going offline. Something's wrong here. This mission is an abort. Repeat -- scrub this mission.
Close shave, Red Crown, still operational, over.
We're going to help them, poor bastards.
We got a Code Four! Code Four!
He was over there -- man, that's him!
It's that man! There, over there!
Wait -- stop. I'm not a criminal.
Alert rescinded. Stand down, standby for update.
Another day in the big apple.

japanese: ざまあみろ、くそったれ！

english: Get some eyes on that. There. Move it!
Contact faded, you want to bring us in, Red Crown?
This is support element Three through Five, confirmed hostiles. Uploading to the net.

japanese: 伏せろ！

english: Hold the missiles back, but keep 'em on ready.
We have no new Intel on ZEUS. Regroup, over.
ZEUS is in the house, sweep and locate.
Target lost. Hold up, spread out.
Don't get too close to him!
Patrols, we have limited sensor suites remaining, Red Crown suggests you deploy infantry teams at their Twenty.
Bring those units back in. Search is off until further orders, out.
Get a signature on that and get it to Intel.
Hey, when did the law get handed over to these guys?
It's a mess down there, Red Crown, you have my visual?
Freak can move. He can move.
Roger that, Delta Strike Boss, RTB., do you copy?
OK, now I have to factor that in....
Blackjack here. Zone is clean, over.
It's not me! Are you fuckin' blind?
Who do they think it is?
Are we gonna finish it, you bet we are, Marines.
Forget ancillary goals, we need ZEUS.
Dispatch! He just took off! Charlie Nineteen in pursuit!
Marines from Tornado One. Mark our target. Minimum safe distance, over
Stay on point, we'll flush this thing out.
What a clusterfuck -- hit em hard! Make 'em bleed!
Red Crown, this is Ranger Two Seven, we are at the Red Zone, over.
Highest degree of force is warranted. Strike Package is requested to deploy at officer location. Standby.
Try another system. Hit it again.
Target is armed, target is armed!
I'm hit...Command, crew is...oh, shit, I'm bleeding heavy, sir....
Understood, firing initiated. Keep your heads down and your panties on.
What? Wh-what? No, no, no, no! It's not me!
You boys have medical training, check those civilians out!
I say hello, you say goodbye.
There you go, sucker! There you go!
Come on!  I’m here!  Come and get me!
japanese: かかってこい！ 俺はここだ！ 俺をぶっ殺してみやがれ！

english: Oh, man, I think it was him.
I can't see a fucking thing.
I swear, it's not me! It's not fucking me!
Forget the dead guys, we have to MOVE. NOW!
Ammo! I need some fuckin' ammo here!
Red Crown, Red Crown, Strike Package support, rikky-tik.
All field and range confirm adjustment for deflection. We're close on this.
Sigma One reports Bloodtox catalyst units have been destroyed. Inform Director McMullen that ZEUS is among the casualties. Body en route to his location. Out.
Ready to start search, Red Crown, any sightings? Over.
Hostiles, hostiles, deploy to defensive positions!
Burners! Burners! Stay alert, Fire Teams!
Still here, bitch! I'm still here!
Ready for engagement. Hostile spotted on our Twenty, over.
...and now the bystanders are crashing their fucking cars.
Incoming. Brawlers above street level. Watch your corners.
Ah, this is surreal. It's like I can see what they see.
Go be a jackass somewhere else.
I got the suspect nailed down, Dispatch. Give my Twenty to support.
You see those operators? Answer me this: why ain’t WE wearing NBC gear?
We've got a cold trail here, Red Crown, over.
Strike Team Bravo. You're authorized, field clear.
Burners sighted, HQ. Do you copy?
He's on the prowl, but I got him.
We nearly bought it, Red Crown, permission to pull back.
Right. Well, if he shows up, he's going to get two in the chest and one in the head.
Hold your fire, I'm down range!
Scrub the search. Regroup at insertion points, over.
ZEUS is here, requesting priority Strike Package!

japanese: くらったがまだ動けるぜ、Red Crown。

english: Hold your fire, hold your fire!
Just let me live, and you'll never see me again.
D-Code Six reporting negative on this one, over.
All systems are green. Ready to fire.
Flight Leader, get those Birds in the air. NOW!
Hostile terminated, that's kill. Combat pay worthwhile.
Get out of my fucking way!
Get the Corpsman to shelter the wounded and get some fresh Marines on the ground. Move it, move it!
We're hit! We're hit! Mayday, mayday, MAYDAAAAY!
Strike Boss, it's time for steak, beer and medals. Ghost, out.
Help has arrived - let's get moving gentlemen.
Reds are not our only problem - Mercer is here too. Maximum firepower.
Strike Team assembled and en route. Coming in hard, over.
Laying down a barrage. Heads down!
I see them. Looks like they're crouched down, copy?
We're hit! Tracks down! We're done!
Advise ETA of extra support. Strike, strike, over.
Delta Forty-Five here. He slipped the noose, over.
Aw, shit, please man, please! Don't do it!
It’s protecting that structure. Focus fire on it!
Hey, anything you can walk away from.
Field Teams in position, minimize chatter and await orders.
Hey! Hey! Get the fuck back!
Target terminated! That's a confirmed kill, over.
Air Wing, you are clear to deploy full munitions in Kill Box, engage hostile, clear and hot.
I should start in an infected zone
Two Five, this is Two Six, target back in our sights.
I didn't do anything. Let me go.
I don't know why, but things are looking up today.
Hey, put your hands up where I can see 'em!
That officer -- whoever’s behind this trusted the officer. I need him.
Stand down! Looks like it's neutralized.
ZEUS has gone to ground. Voodoo Seven is out.
Come on, man. What the fuck is the matter with you!?
Confirm kill, confirm kill, do you copy?
Drop your weapons! I mean it! Drop your fucking weapons!
Get out of the area! There's gonna be another collapse! Let's move! Move!
We all fired on him. All of us.
This is Bravo Sixty-Four. Hostiles dead ahead at my location.
Mission complete. Returning to Palace, Thunder out.
More than one way to hurt you!
Shit! Dig in! It'll throw it!

japanese: 今だ、来い！ 今だ！

english: Cannot continue assault, busting a hustle, over.
Repeat attack, give it another load.
Looks like someone got here before us, doc...
japanese: 俺たちより先にここに来た奴がいるようだぜ……。

english: Watch out for the tank! It's firing on us!
Get a picture of that, sustain it on thermal, over.
Red Crown, Alpha Nine report, the pump is lost. We're done here. Out.
Razorback disengaging RIGHT FUCKING NOW, Red Crown.
What the hell is he doing!?
Why me, man!? Hey, why me!? I don't mean you any harm!
Thunder Four Five, just in the Blue Zone.
We got one, we got one, nice shooting.
That was easier than I thought...better get moving before they realize these guys are gone.
Hit him now, before he let's go!
We got him, but we're empty. Status?
Red Crown to all units, Confirmation on kill, ZEUS is terminated, over.
Dispatch, this is Charlie Nineteen. Investigating a 10-10.
Ghost Twelve, you're next in the briefing rotation. Return to Palace and report for debrief in Twelve C.
Get off, you can't come in here.
This is Charlie Nineteen. We got an MVA! MVA!
We're scrubbing this op. Relay new coordinates or bring us in.
I got thermal on my screen, over.
Strike Boss reporting success in the Kill Zone.
Not him? Can we confirm it!

japanese: 下がれ！

english: That's not possible -- he's just sucking it dry.
Hello! Anyone! Come to my voice!
This is Red Crown, ZEUS has faded, fall back and await further instruction, over.
Strike Team, Strike Team, I have fire assignment, priority Bravo Whiskey One Zero Niner.
Target area cleared, ingress at this time, Voodoo package at Angels' Twelve, will orbit immediate target area.
Do you see him? That one, right there!
Suspect has escaped the scene. Repeat, escaped the scene.
You're cleared. You're cleared until they're all fucking dead.
Take out that vehicle! Take out that vehicle!
We're in too tight, get us back.
APC Foxtrot Lima One Five Four is leaving Containment Zone! Consider hostile.

japanese: あれがヤツだな。

english: Reposition and ready to flank, over.
What the fuck are they doing!
Infected hive confirmed. Gonna need some firepower on it.
No need for a Corpsman. Poor bastard.
No, man, I got a family!
We got problems here... need more firepower. Hose 'em!
We are in range and about to unload!
OK, I have fuckin' had it!
Voodoo Seven sweeping on the initial. Scanning for ZEUS, over.
Red Crown, we have lost contact. Orders?
japanese: レッドクラウン、我々は目標を見失った。 次の命令は？

english: This is Terrific Tornado Quebec, we've lost contact. Search negative. Returning to base.
Air to Ground, find hard cover, fast!
Don't move another inch or I'll open fire!
japanese: そこを少しでも動くな、さもなければ発砲する！

english: One more skin down, do you copy?
Base Command relay does not read you, out.
Do not copy. We're taking fire. Repeat. Taking fire.
Lock and load weapons, we're gonna use 'em all.
Abort, abort. Mission is at abort code.

This is what we call a target rich environment, Ghost Twelve. Your assignment is close ground support of any ground forces that request it, your targets will automatically be prioritized by your flight system.
Please, Ok? Please, I'm begging you. I'm begging you to let me go.
I am authorized to use deadly force. In fact, I'm fuckin' eager.
A Runner! Chase him! Chase him now!
Anyone here feeling a little ill?
Did not copy, RC. Fire fight is on!
Delta Unit to Red Crown. Bring a Strike Package into sector Whiskey Eleven, over
Ground is cluttered, we'll see what the instruments can pick out.
Get the fuck out of the way of that vehicle!
Give him a couple of rounds, 25, 25.
Rack this one, Red Crown. We are golden.

japanese: ここから出て行け！

english: Ain't never seen anything like that before.
Stay calm, you'll be all right!
Thunder Four Five, operational, coming home.
Fire Teams, stand down. Set up patrols on the perimeter but otherwise go Yellow, out.
What's up here? Why the fuck is the army here?
Hostile on board, shake it off! Get some evasives on!
Send in the body bags. Fuckin' bloodbath.
They’re going to flatten the entire block!
All Birds, snuggle up. Maintain and prepare to reengage. One Oh Seven at Twelve, over.
Get your IDs out RIGHT NOW!
It's gonna throw it, get back.
Red Crown, we are still operational, over.
Fire up, Blacks! Fire it up!
japanese: 撃て、ブラックウォッチ！ 撃つんだ！

english: You seeing anything on the east side? We got a weak signal on the scanner.
Transmit target data to the computer now!
Redirect Teams Delta, Echo, and Foxtrot. Close in on the area.
Jesus, these streets are just not safe anymore!
Base Command confirming hostile down, out.
Sweep that entire area, I don't trust any fucking thing over there.
On me! Check out that movement!
Got us backed up, I need help, over
That's how we show it what we got.
Target in sight, requesting fire support. Squelch it.
Come off on Two Three Five, that's good.
I got him, I got him! It's this one!
Disperse from the area or you will be shot!
Bloodtox breaks down anything infected with the virus. Dispersed through the air, it's like a modern day agent orange.
japanese: Bloodtoxはウイルスに感染しているモノを全て破壊する。 Dispersed through the air, it's like a modern day agent orange.

english: Listen to me. This is Red Crown and as such I am giving you your final warning! You turn that Bird around and get on point or you will be touching down to a God damn court martial!

japanese: 下がれ！

english: So much for our surprise attack....
Control, target is not down. Lay some more shit on it, over.
New picture, new picture, all clear. Re-evaluate strategy.
Red Crown, we got major malfunctions, we can't stay on the field, over.
We took care of this fight.
Can't stay with you, re-entering orbit.
Red Crown, we are go to engage. Confirm deployment, over.
Relay kill from the Red Zone.
I see more! Move it! Move it!
Oh, fuck. It's on us, it's on us!
Damn it, that's my team down there! Get them out!
Alpha Charlie Three Two to Red Crown. We're done! Strong-point down! Yankee signing off!
No need to gawk, boys. Let's get ready to move out.
Attention, Red Crown, we've got red all over this Twenty, over.
Attention! You are exiting quarantine airspace! Return at once!
Eyes sharp! Anything moves, blast it.

japanese: 畜生！ （溜息）引き上げるぞ。

english: We've got Walkers and Runners, at my Twenty.
Trust me, please! I'm not it!

japanese: 弾切れだ！

english: Nah, no, wait, I'm not the fucking guy!
The situation is in order! Do not be alarmed!
Tornado Five, confirmation of nearly-fucking-crashed, over.
Look, you're making a mistake here.
What's the status on the armor, we need it in the streets yesterday!
Someone! I need a hard ID!
I knew the military was a bad sign!
Red Crown, hostile down, will maintain Zone control.
What is it? What is it?
Don't touch it. Do not approach.
Infra red sensors are tracking immediate area, over.
He must hurt or he wouldn't fuckin' hide!
Too God damn hairy in here, get those tracks rolling!
Lindsey!? Where the hell are you, girl!?
Hey! Hey! Hey! Duane, can you here me, bro!?
Manhattan Charlie Zero Seven Base Command reporting contact, Yankee Zulu Three update, as per.
This motherfucker has got to go down.
A network of detectors; If they can track me, they can track Dana.
japanese: ウイルス探知機網か…… もし奴らが俺を追跡できるならば、ディナも追跡できるということだ。

english: In formation now. Orbit maintain, over.
Red Crown, he's...it's on the move!
Field Commander, get your team out and leave the rest to the armor, over.
I'm from the government. Calm the fuck down.
Hey GERM! That supposed to SCARE me?
Red Crown, moving to new locale, over.
Case is closed, Red Crown. Requesting permission to return.
Mission status Green. We're done here, over.
Let me see, let me see!
I guess I have to kill you again!
We got him, we got him, get in positions.
Intel shows hostile movement north of your position.
This whole fuckin' street is just fuckin' FUCKED.
Did you not hear me? I said GET THE FUCK OUT OF HERE!
Would you look at that! Fucking scary shit!
Fall out of pursuit pattern and regroup.
Gotta get Karen and get the hell out of here
Separate, check your angle. Go, go!
Bird's eye view showing nothing, give me a target.
That's negative, all Base Teams reporting loss of visual.
Relay to Strike Package, mission aborted, over.

japanese: クソったれ見失った？

english: Strike Boss, deploy and confirm. Report arrival and engagement, over.
Hey, when did the law get handed over to these guys?
Nothing alive there, no movement shown.
Why are they firing on us!?
Copy that -- weapons free, fire at will. Splash the bogey.
We've lost its attention, Red Crown. Few casualties and the corpsman is working on the wounded, out.
I can hear them. Every infected creature in the city. I can see their minds.
All BW HBs with ordnance, at my location, over.
Move in, move in! Maintain pressure on the target!
Unable to do anything BUT hold our point, Red Crown!
I need to get somewhere with a lot of people...somewhere where they can't just keep firing at me....
Red Crown, reducing alert status. Kill Zone quiet for now, over.
It's called a STOP SIGN, you fuckin' knob!
Keep your heads down, there's gonna be some noise.
Damn it, there just aren't enough military here to slow them down.

japanese: よし、あいつが中へのチケットだな……。

english: Gearbox is damaged, otherwise functional. Check status, over.
This is not the right thing to do. Please, you don't have to do this. You have a choice.
Outstanding, outstanding! Tank is drained and position still secured. Looks like the deployment is a success. Standby for new orders.
japanese: よし、よくやった！ タンクは空、そこも無事だ。 作戦は成功と言えるな。 次の指示を待て。

english: Dispatch, this is Charlie Nineteen. We have the suspect.
Jesus, um, Dispatch -- I need help. MVA! MVA!
You got to move out. This is a war zone.
It's starting to fail. Tear it to shreds!

japanese: クソ！

english: Don't kill me! Don't kill me!
I'm coming in straight up the center.

japanese: 援護だ、援護しろ！

english: I need a Corpsman in here -- NOW!
Keep on the alert -- he's gotta be right under us.
Relay to Strike Package, mission aborted, over.

japanese: 下がれ！

english: Think the "Semper Fidos" figured it out?
Is there anybody hit? Tell me now.
Got it on visual. Requesting orders.
We are in range and about to unload!
That's a thermal pop -- is that an equipment malfunction?
Command, we are inflicting heavy casualties, over.
Target coordinates Alpha Hotel Five Three. Fire sustain.
Dear, God, no! What did I do? Oh, shit....
Ghost Eye winding up, Red Crown.  Moving loud and fast, out.
This ain't right, it just ain't right!
I can only say "go fuck yourself" so fuckin' often.
What the fuck is wrong with you?
Do you think they come from in there, Dispatch?
Hotrod Leader to Red Crown, requesting instructions, over.
Just give me one big miracle!
We're still in this, crew, hang tight!
Guys, hold on a minute. You see that shit?
Thunder engaging and in pursuit, over.
Air to Ground. Scanners negative. I don't got it.
Authentication for General Quarters. Armories cleared, Fire Teams to upper deck. Deploy hot.

japanese: 下がれ！

english: Roger, requesting Hazmat to your Twenty for collection of waste, over.
What the fuck is that? --Elizabeth? What is she?
Dispatch, I don't know how to describe this!
Switch to brevity, engaging target, over.
He’s here! Get our wings off the ground! Clear, clear!
japanese: ここにいるぞ！ はやく飛べ、飛べ！

english: I'm backing up, we missed something. Sweep on the way back, over.
Red Crown, no sign of target here, packin' it in.
Dispatch, the area is clean. We're out.
Oh, dear God! Don't kill me! Please!
Here it comes again, up out of the street. Watch it!
Get paranoid, he's fucking changing or some shit.
C'mon, man, give me a break!
All Zones clear. Stand-by for reassignment.
One of the boots must've missed him.
Negative, target has been lost, over.
Kill in the Zone, repeat, kill in the Zone, out.
Hey, look -- I'M not the one!
Dispatch, this neighborhood is crawling with burners.
Support mission appears complete. Await ground confirmation.
Concentrate all fire on target ZEUS. I repeat, all fire on ZEUS
What the hell are you doing?
Come on, man! Come on, stop!
All units, I picked him up again!
Burners sighted, running wild. Watch your Six, Ground.
City's a mess, RC, a fucking mess.
Voodoo Seven to Citadel, we gotta break, over.
Red Crown, target is at fort gone, over.
While Taggart has access to the helicopters he can get out anytime he wants. I can fix that.
We've been hit. Minor injuries but we are re-engaging.
Put the torch on that one.
Separate, separate, it's that fucking Mercer guy!
I'm BLACKWATCH! I'm one of you, fuckin' moron!
What we got here is a cut and run.
It's happening again. I thought this was done.
Get on him before he gets to a high density civilian area!
Ground, inform Chalks to create space, over.
Form a perimeter, that's standard OSP!
Can you confirm again, out. I'm just drawing static....
If this ain't hell, it's got the same zip code.
They're in the God damn way. Shit, burners on, coming through!
Move ahead? I can't move a God damn inch.
On-site Ghost Team reporting visual at Zero Niner Six, over.
Reporting for duty, Red Crown, fire clearance?
Echo One Alpha reporting for duty, sir!
Send us a Strike, RC. Bring it!
You've gotta be fuckin' kidding me.
Shit -- the fucking base is on fire!
Come on! Out of my way!
Kill it! Kill that fucking thing!
Red Crown, Chalk Three. The SOB slipped by us. Request we pack in the search and proceed with another glorious day in the Corps, over.
Watch for debris. Shit is still raining down.
Terminating search pattern Zulu. Ground forces, you're on your own.
It's gone to ground. Check your footing...if it feels unstable, MOVE!
japanese: 地下に潜ったぞ。 足元に注意しろ……揺れたらかわせ！

english: Oh, please, God, no! Why me!?
Confirmed hit! That a flameout? I have lights.
Be advised, we have fire on the target, Wolverine Three sweep left.
Hold fire, hold your fire, scan and sustain.
Keep your distance, Field Team, await Hazmat for pick-up.
I've got wounded! There's wounded people over here!
No one is getting on or off this island.
This is Package Leader, hostile down, that's a wrap.
Get a hold on that. Reign it in. Hold it. Going down!
We got a class one breach and you sit there with your THUMB UP YOUR ASS?!
japanese: それなのにあるのはキサマの得意げなケツだと！？

english: Roll this one over your boss' desk and get me some fuckin' artillery here.
I don't trust those secretive motherfuckers.
Come on, we're so close now.
What a mess.... Red Crown it's shit-city down there.
Hold your fire, Ground, I'll shake it off!
Can I get a sit-rep? Over.
Tornado Six, have a visual on a disturbance. Moving in for a look.
Get me a satellite view on that, and pass to the 'WATCH.
Watch it! They have the virus!
We ain't never down, remember that.
Hey -- what's going on here, do you know?
I've seen a lot of shit, but I’ve never seen the virus do this.
Did you see what he just did!?
Lock it down! Nothing goes in or out. You are all cleared to engage hostiles on sight.
Here he is -- TAKE HIM DOWN!
That's an all clear on my Twenty, Red Crown. We made it.
Primary scan clean, widening search grid.
Come on. There we go. Beautiful.
It's right in front of me!
Listen! Just tell me how to deliver the killing blow.
Activate plan Charlie. Get us a Strike Package in here, deploy on our Twenty. Time sensitive, over.
Field Command, get me a sit-rep. Aerial is showing a compromise. Update, over?
It's stopped, locate via GPS and upload to Red Crown.
Ghost reporting substantial burn crowd, movement on friendly positions.
ZEUS pursuit is no longer necessary.
Tornado One to Marines. Target's marked. Go heavy, repeat, heavy.
I have no idea what the fuck it is, but it just gutted McMillan's team without breaking a sweat.
japanese: なぜグリーンが俺の妹を連れ去ったのか見当もつかなかった。 復讐か？ 罠か？ ただディナを連れ戻さなきゃいけないことしか分からなかった。

english: Red Crown, officers are in direct contact with your targets. They need your teams now!
Damage sustained. Maintaining altitude! Visual on damage?
We're cleared to engage. Primary is the Runner, collateral secondary. Open a can.
Burners, repeat, burners. We can take cover and hold or move back, please advise, over.
Dispatch, suspect has disappeared. I don't like this.
Splash the bogey. We can't let him break the quarantine.
So, you haven't had enough yet, huh?
Uh, Red Crown, you're gonna wanna take a look at this fucker.
Let the military finish this. I'm done.
Yeah, we see it, too. Gonna move in for a closer look, over.
I can walk! Just help me up.
Aw, man. Fuckin dogs been at this? Ohh.
I'm falling back, I'll try to send a replacement!
Red Crown, things are looking grim here. I don't know how much longer we can hold on.
Threat neutralized, Ghost Four Five, RTB.
Stand down. Think we got him.
Chalk Three, Red Crown. Suggest we sit and wait for ZEUS to reappear, over.
Dropping angels and trigger finger itching. Feed co-ords, over.
I mean, what's the big idea!, huh?
Tornado Five, gunner hit stable. I said stable.
Cease fire, take cover and stand by, over.
Hmmm, I'm thinking that guy forgot his vitamins.
We're done, turn her around, let's get the hell out of here.
That was my one shot at this.
Aw, shit! They'll tear us apart!
Ranger Two Seven to Red Crown, Bravo Strike complete.
I got the suspect right here!
Ground, get your men out of the area!
I didn't get that. Field Team, re-transmit, out.
People! Please clear the area in an orderly fashion!
Roger that, we'll give it the once-over, out.
Moving East! I have the target heading eastward!
Lock this area down! No one leaves!
Ground, come in. Give us an update.
Hard to see through the smoke and debris, Red Crown. Streets are a fucking disaster zone, over.
Waste 'em both! It's the only way!
Red Crown, this is Razor One, awaiting green light, do you copy?
Clear the area! Get out of here!!
Red Crown, mission complete. Strike Boss, out.
D-Three here. I see no target in vicinity, over.
Just what are we looking at?
Confirmed visual, send in a team.
Here we go! Laze that target!
Fox Company at the ready. Squads on rotation. Armor is go for launch. Fox, out.
Delta Strike Package request. Priority India Three Niner.
Pull back! Get us the fuck out of here!
Get HE on that thing, pronto!
Red Crown, come in. Ranger Two Seven alerting all points. Target has left the Zone.
Any second, he's going to show.
You have to be fucking shitting me. Evade, evade!
ZEUS is down, clear out the rest of the structure, go!
Oh, nobody messes with the Corps! Yay!
I lost him in the crowd!
Oh, God. Oh, God. Oh, God. Oh, God.
Any ZEUS sightings should be reported yesterday. Stick to SOP confirmation protocols.
Tactical pursuit is under review. Standby.
No confirmation at this time, but it appears ZEUS may be down.
Stay calm, you'll be all right!
Pack it up and bring us in Red Crown, target's not here.
Forward observer calling a rain dance, make it wet in the Kill Box. Target marked, out!
All units, engagement level is reduced.
10-16 and a 10-54! We have officers down and request immediate military intervention with hostile suspects.
Man, I don't wanna see this.
Things are lookin' like real shit out here!
Field Command. Can you confirm that report. Is our target down, out.
Field deployment underway, move, move. Move out!
Kill Box void, abort and return. Strike status neutral, over.
We are packed and loaded, show us a target, over.
All units are blacked out on the target.
Three green lights, you're cleared for another.
They track red, they'll find Mercer. We'll find that son of a bitch soon.
All units, sound off and report.
Don't get near that! It's not safe!
Where's your commanding officer? Where's Lim?
Field Leader, we've got Marines heading your way, over.
A heads up -- whatever did the killing might still be around.
Sweep complete, we've lost target, over.
Cease fire! CEASE FIRE! CEASE FUCKIN' FIRE!
That's a go on mission success. Hostile terminated, over.
Situation Yellow to White. No confirmed target, we are clear, over.
ONE of you. Take a deep breath and tell me what's going on.
Thanks, Ghost Twelve. We're good here.
What the fuck happened to me?
Tangos to the west, consider this your only warning.
We got him, we got him. OK, check his hands.
This is Charlie Nineteen, I read you, Dispatch.
Alright, Ghost group, prepare for another pass.
Whoa, whoa, what's everyone running for?
Attention aviator, we have you on radar as leaving the Safe Fly Zone. Return immediately or deadly force WILL be used.
Dispatch, this is Charlie Nineteen. Investigating a 10-10.
You want a piece of me, bro?
Don’t let them past the perimeter!
What's that? Don't let your guard down.
Still in the fight! We're still in it!
*exhales* Tha...they, they sho..they should shut down the damn street.
Red Crown, ZEUS gone prickly, over.
It's over. Mission successful. Ain't nothing left.
Give yourself up now. It's not too late.
Kill Box, Kill Box, over. Strike Package urgent!

japanese: クソ！

english: Pulling back to safe distance, over.
I'll get you help, just wait there.
Aw, Christ, get out now! Get out!
This is Red 4 - we have spotted Zeus among the infected. Take him out.
Burners sighted, running wild. Watch your Six, Ground.
Where'd it go? Do you see it?
Did anyone get a visual on that?
Stand back, remember what we're doing here.
Please, don't kill me. I beg you!
Not just a job, it's an adventure.
Return to base. The search is scrubbed.
I need sustained fire on this target! DO IT!!
Voodoo Seven reporting mission success, it's in the bag, Red Crown.
Sir -- SIR! Do NOT do that again.
Good job! Nobody fucks with the 'WATCH! Out.
Command Units, Cat One breach in outbreak  zone contained. Level 2 Blacklight protocols are now in effect.
We got it! Send in a Strike Team. Send in a motherfuckin' Strike Team!
Nooo! Ahhhh! No, no, no. Don't leave me!
Ground, inform Chalks to create space, over.
Strike Team, withdraw and stand down. Hold for further orders.
Viral targets, we are entering launch codes, be aware.
Wait a minute, that must be him!
Dispatch. This is Charlie Nineteen on scene.
Hang on, load up fast, over.
I beg you! Don't kill me! I'll do anything!
Watch out! Watch out! The vehicle!
Can someone please step forward and tell me what's going on!
Sound off! Word of the day!
Come back, come back. Confirm search pattern status, over.
On full alert. Awaiting green light, Red Crown.
Nothing on radar, Voodoo lost it, I'm blind.
We've lost target, Strike Package RTB.
Bring in the Strike Team, Dispatch. I've got the suspect ID'd.
Mission accomplished. This hop is over. Do you copy?
I think I got something here. Stand by.
Sustaining damage, Red Crown, you want us to back out? Over.
Alpha 4 reporting...things could go either way.
We have confirmation of ZEUS on the ground. Standby for orders.
Got visual on some Walkers, over.
I'd like to see how tough these guys are when they're not hiding behind that uniform.
Possible sighting, relay location to Ground.
Red Crown, barrage FAILED, repeat, failed, over.
This is Command. I want a sit-rep. Now.
Move and fire, move and fire!
Wait, what was that? I'm taking a look.
Squadron Leader! We are in the open!
Voodoo hot, I've got visual, clear the Zone, over.
Standard search, maintain distance. Go, go!
Valor Two Niner gone quiet, over. Can you come back?
Now here's something I can get into!

japanese: ここから出て行け！

english: Visual on target. Relaying coordinates, over.
Man, I saw something like this up the street.
Hotrod Unit, this is an exfiltrate general order, move out, move out all points and rally as assigned. If you were not on your own before, you are now, out.
Just point us in the right direction, let us go.

japanese: ここから出て行け！

english: Ground Teams, you have immediate notice of inbound aerial strike, pull back and drop low. Air element, begin your attack pass.
Hold it, hold it, hold it, we got wounded!
We got movement. 100 meters at nine o'clock, over.
We are seeing effect. FO, can you confirm?
They said he's armed. Keep back!
Ghost Four Five hit, maintaining altitude, over.
Lost the target, repeat, lost the target.
Tornado Juliet Trio, all hostiles eliminated.
These fuckers get all the best gear, man. What's with that?
Enabling on-board scanners, eyes wide, over.
I'm killing here, I can't respond at this time!
Get anti-armor on that God damn thing!
Whoa, keep away from that guy!
All teams, Red Crown requesting Intel, over.
Grab some spinach and get down on that target. Zero, confirm.
Look, let me go, man! Please, let me go!
He's around here somewhere. Let's go!

japanese: 身を隠せ！

english: Operation is over down here, nothing but dirt.
This is Razor One, we've locked on target.
Man, you'd better get out of my damn face or I'LL kick your ass.
Hold it! Everybody, just hold it.
Dispatch, this is Adam Seventy-One. I got those naked freaks at my Twenty.
We've lost target, Strike Package RTB.
Whenever you're ready, come to me, and I'll give you the needle!

japanese: 気をつけな。

english: Get ready for impact! Brace, brace!
japanese: 衝撃に備えろ！ 掴まれ！

english: Please, please, PLEASE don't kill me!
Don't let that thing fuckin' touch you.
Red Crown from Chalk Three. We've lost the eye. You got an update for us?
japanese: チョーク3からレッドクラウンへ。 見失った。 何か新しい情報はあるか？

english: Sit-rep, we have confirmed visual, requesting Strike Package, over.
I don't see what he's doing, over.
Red Crown, suggest calling off the strike. Target MIA.
Heard this is what we call a target rich" environment
Visibility's low, there's fucking dust and debris everywhere.

japanese: 伏せろ！

english: Oh, shit. I'm gonna need a fresh pair.
I don't know, I-I-I just don't know!
We have a contact in the base perimeter, lock it down, lock down the entire base.
It's an Echo scenario. Put it down right over there.
I don't know what this is, but I know it's not good. Some sort of fortification.
Warm up the coffee, we're heading back, over
It's going down, we can't control it anymore.
No sign of target, terminating search mission.
Spotters, what the hell happened? We've lost visual.
This'll be the third today. More fuel than ammo. Pull the trigger.

japanese: こりゃ何の冗談だってんだ……。

english: Moving in for a closer look, Dispatch. Stand by.
Give us a feed, scanners are dark, over.
It didn't go away, and neither are we. Hold until contact, over.
Give us a new location, lost visual, over.
I know the streets. I can help you guys.
Roller Nine Five, target status request, FO please advise over.
We're cold on the trail, Red Crown.
Red Crown, Red Crown, check your incoming, you have Intel on your possible perp.
OK, OK...I need something to transport Ragland. There's a military base around here somewhere....
This is Blackjack, we're clear and RTB.
No way! No way! I'm not him!
It's died down at this site, over.
Too bad for them that the US Marine Corps is here. Take up positions around the structure!
This is Bravo Sixty-Four. Hostiles dead ahead at my location.
Get on the net, we're friendlies! Friendlies, you fuck!
Aviator, return to the Quarantine Zone. You're not cleared for landing.
No control personnel at our position, 200 meters east.
Weapons ready. Engaging now. Hold on.
Fire down, hold your fire. Confirm the target.
This is Charlie Nineteen, suspect is on the run!
Red Crown. Echo One Alpha has positive ID on enemy. Request Strike Team support.
Come on! We need to hit them hard"," or we're done for."

japanese: フーア！

english: Engaging at this time. Got my angle...now!
Significant damage being sustained... we need to start hitting them harder. Fast.
I'll get you help, just wait there.
It's gonna throw it! Back off!
Fox company suffering heavy casualties. Get us some air support in here ASAP!
Target destroyed, Ghost returning to Palace.
It's not him!? This can't be happening!
This is Fire Team Charlie of Darkhorse. We own the Zone. Out.
Voodoo backing off, main engine trouble. Two Two Zero, over.
Roll in some air support on that target, roll in fangs out, over.
Get a picture! Get a picture!
It's all clear, crew. Let's take it home.
Don't kill me! I'll tell you everything!
japanese: 殺さないでくれ！ 何でも話すから！

english: Get ready for some rock and roll.
Don't shoot! Check out my badge!

japanese: 償いはしてもらうぞ！

english: Has anyone heard any helicopters? Seen any soldiers? God!
Intel relay requests clarification, you are incomplete.
Confirmed, Red Crown, FIREBALL has been overrun. I repeat, FIREBALL has been overrun. Looks like no survivors.

Stay focused! We've got a shit load of movement inside that thing!

Crush it. Roll over and crush it.

I can't see through the dust!

I got it! I fuckin' got it! Shit! I got it, right?

Son of a bitch. Can't maintain altitude!

Don't let the jarheads get you down.

下がれ！

english: PRESS %0:BUTTON13 while in the air to AIRDASH.  Use the AIRDASH to dodge in the air, redirect your jump or to simply travel further.  The AIRDASH is an important move to master.
DOUBLE-TAP AND RELEASE %0:BUTTON06 while in the air to AIRDASH.
You have INCREASED your EFFECTIVENESS in ARMORED VEHICLES.
CONSUMING a COMMANDER replenishes your ARTILLERY STRIKE AMMO.
PRESS and HOLD %0:BUTTON03 to charge your ATTACKS. PRESS and HOLD %0:BUTTON04 to charge your SPECIAL ATTACKS. CHARGED attacks cause more damage, travel further, hit harder.
CLICK %0:BUTTON17 when driving an ARMORED VEHICLE to RESET the CAMERA and TURRET direction.
PRESS %0:BUTTON17 when driving an ARMORED VEHICLE to RESET THE CAMERA.
MOVE the %0:BUTTON07 to CHANGE the CAMERA. At any time, click %0:BUTTON17 to RESET the camera.
Find more HINT COLLECTIBLES to receive big EP rewards.  The more you collect, the greater the reward.
Find more LANDMARK COLLECTIBLES to receive big EP rewards.  The more you collect, the greater the reward.
You can MIX using ATTACK %0:BUTTON03 and SPECIAL %0:BUTTON04 to create unique combos.\$0ATry %0:BUTTON03 %0:BUTTON03 %0:BUTTON04.
You are now in CRITICAL MASS and can perform one of your crushing DEVASTATOR attacks. These are your most powerful attacks - DEVASTATORS will kill most foes with one strike.
HOLD SPRINT %0:BUTTON13 and then PRESS JUMP %0:BUTTON01 while IN THE AIR to perform the GLIDE move.
HOLD SPRINT and then PRESS JUMP %0:BUTTON01 while in the air to GLIDE.
You have INCREASED your EFFECTIVENESS with the GRENADE LAUNCHER.
THIS HELICOPTER is equipped with HOMING MISSILES. Once locked on, they track their target with deadly accuracy.
THIS HELICOPTER is equipped with ROCKETS. ROCKETS are excellent for strafing GROUPS of ENEMIES. Spread fire across the general area for SPLASH DAMAGE against all enemies caught in the blast.
You have INCREASED your EFFECTIVENESS in HELICOPTERS.
You have INCREASED your EFFECTIVENESS with the MISSILE LAUNCHER.
CHARGING your JUMPS enables you to jump FASTER, FURTHER, and HIGHER. HOLD %0:BUTTON01 to CHARGE your JUMP.
CHARGE your JUMP while sprinting. This executes LONG JUMPS - great for evading enemies, weapon fire or high-speed movement across the city.
CHARGE your NEXT JUMP while in the air. Release %0:BUTTON01 when you land to CHAIN MULTIPLE JUMPS.
Your SHIELD POWER has taken TOO MUCH DAMAGE and is temporarily BROKEN. SHIELD will be INOPERABLE until it REGENERATES.
Your SHIELD POWER has REGENERATED and will now protect you from damage again.
You have INCREASED your EFFECTIVENESS with the ASSAULT RIFLE.
You have INCREASED your EFFECTIVENESS with the MACHINE GUN.
It is possible to DEFEAT a STRIKE TEAM by DESTROYING it.
It is possible to DEFEAT a STRIKE TEAM by EVADING it.  Use your MOVEMENT or DISGUISE abilities to flee or fool the STRIKE TEAM.
HOLD %0:BUTTON12 to enter TARGETING MODE. When a TARGET is selected, all ATTACKS are directed at it, and it remains on CAMERA.
PRESS %0:BUTTON12 to enter TARGETING MODE. When a TARGET is selected, all ATTACKS are directed at it.
THERMAL VISION is a SENSORY POWER that allows you to see ENEMIES through smoke and fire.
PRESS %0:BUTTON12 to TARGET an ENEMY. Press %0:BUTTON03 to FIRE.
Ten or more WEB OF INTRIGUE TARGETS are at large. CONSUME them to unlock more MEMORIES in the WEB OF INTRIGUE.
japanese: 陰謀の記憶には10個以上の大きい目標があります。 より多くの記憶をアンロックするために、彼らを吸収してください。

english: DO NOT KILL WEB TARGETS. CONSUME each of them to unlock new MEMORIES in the WEB OF INTRIGUE. Come back later to retry this WEB TARGET.
