japanese: 軍事基地の中でブラックウォッチ指揮官を吸収して、空爆要請できる回数を増加させてください。

english: DESTROY the INCOMING TANKS with your ARTILLERY STRIKE.
japanese: 空爆要請で侵攻してくる戦車を破壊してください。

english: Press %0:BUTTON10 to TARGET a TANK and press %0:BUTTON04 to CALL in the ARTILLERY.
japanese: %0:BUTTON10で戦車を目標とし、%0:BUTTON04で空爆を要請してください。

english: You have gained the ability to call in an ARTILLERY STRIKE.\$0A\$0AARTILLERY STRIKES are STORED and can be USED LATER as long as you are in a MILITARY DISGUISE.
japanese: あなたは空爆を要請する能力を得ました。 \$0A\$0Aあなたが軍の偽装をしている限り、空爆要請を格納して、後で使用できます。

english: Consuming MARINE COMMANDERS OUTSIDE BASES replenishes your store of ARTILLERY STRIKES.\$0A\$0AConsuming BLACKWATCH COMMANDERS INSIDE BASES increases the TOTAL NUMBER of ARTILLERY STRIKES that can be STORED.
japanese: 基地の外で海兵隊指揮官を吸収すると、あなたのみせに空爆要請を補じゅうします。 \$0A\$0A基地内でブラックウォッチ指揮官を吸収することは、保存することができる空爆要請の回数を増やします。

english: ARTILLERY STRIKES are activated through the DISGUISE ACTIONS menu.\$0A\$0AHOLD %0:BUTTON11 to bring up the menu, HOLD %0:BUTTON12 to TARGET an enemy at the center of the area you want to hit and PRESS %0:BUTTON04 to CALL IN THE STRIKE.
japanese: 空爆要請は、偽装アクション・メニューから行います。 \$0A\$0A%0:BUTTON11を押しながらメニューを開き、%0:BUTTON12を押しながら攻撃したい範囲の中心にいる敵をターゲットします。 そして%0:BUTTON04で空爆を要請してください。

english: ARTILLERY STRIKES are activated through the DISGUISE ACTIONS menu.\$0A\$0ATap %0:BUTTON11 to bring up the menu, Use %0:BUTTON12 to TARGET an enemy at the center of the area you want to hit and PRESS %0:BUTTON04 to CALL IN THE STRIKE.
You can now STORE more ARTILLERY STRIKES.
japanese: あなたは、今、より多くの空爆要請を保管できます。
空爆要請

english: ARTILLERY STRIKES are upgraded.  More rounds are shot downrange, and the area of effect is larger.
japanese: 空爆要請はアップグレードされました。  より多くの弾が射程内に発射されます。 そして範囲はさらに大きくなります。
空爆要請
空爆要請

english: ACQUIRE more ARTILLERY STRIKES by CONSUMING more COMMANDERS.
japanese: より多くの指揮官を吸収することによって、より多くの空爆を取得してください。

english: The number displayed next to %0:BUTTON04 on the DISGUISE ACTIONS MENU shows how many ARTILLERY STRIKES you have stored. Upgrading this ability increases the total of ARTILLERY STRIKES that can be stored at any time.
japanese: 偽装動作メニューの %0:BUTTON04 の横に表示された数は、あなたがいくつの空爆を格納したかを示しています。 この能力をアップグレードさせると、いつでも格納できる空爆の合計は増加します。

english: INCREASE the number of ARTILLERY STRIKES you can STORE by consuming BLACKWATCH COMMANDERS inside MILITARY BASES.
japanese: あなたが軍事基地の中でブラックウォッチ指揮官を吸収することによって格納できる空爆の数を増加させてください。
空爆
空爆
%0:BUTTON03 で基本攻撃を繰り出す。
基本攻撃

english: MILITARY BASES are defended by both SOLDIERS and ARMOR. They can be formidable opponents.\$0AYour POWERS are generally INEFFECTIVE against this type of TARGET.\$0AUse WEAPONS, HIJACKED VEHICLES, and DEVASTATOR attacks to destroy a MILITARY BASE.
japanese: 軍事基地は兵士やアーマーの両方によって擁護されています。 彼らは手ごわい相手になることができます。 \$0AYourの力がこのタイプのターゲットに対して、一般的には効果がありません。 軍基地を破壊するために、\$0AUse兵器、乗っ取られた車、破壊者の攻撃。

english: DESTROY MILITARY BASES and INFECTED HIVES to TEMPORARILY SUPPRESS ENEMY FORCES and GAIN HUGE EP BONUSES.
japanese: 一時的に敵軍をおさえて、多大なEPボーナスを獲得するために、軍事基地と感染者のハイヴを破壊してください。
勢力のコントロール

english: GAIN UPGRADES by INFILTRATING BASES and CONSUMING KEY PERSONNEL.
japanese: 基地に潜入して、重要人物を吸収することによってアップグレードを得てください。
軍事基地

english: BASES ARE LOCKED DOWN DURING AN ALERT.\$0A\$0AKILL OR ELUDE the military to EXIT THE BASE.
PRESS %0:BUTTON02 on any surface to CLIMB it. PRESS %0:BUTTON02 again to detach, or %0:BUTTON01 to JUMP.
japanese: %0:BUTTON02 を押すことであらゆる表面上を登ることができます。 %0:BUTTON02 を再び押すか %0:BUTTON01 でジャンプします。
クライミング

english: CONSUME almost any living creature for HEALTH. Grab enemies with %0:BUTTON02 then PRESS %0:BUTTON04 to CONSUME them.  Some larger enemies must be STUNNED through extreme damage before they can be CONSUMED.
japanese: ほとんどの生きものは、それを吸収することでヘルスを回復できます。 %0:BUTTON02で敵をつかまえてください。 そして %0:BUTTON04で彼らを吸収してください。 一部のより大きな敵を吸収するためには、極端なダメージを与えて気絶させなければなりません。

english: CONSUME a marked TARGET to start a MILITARY or INFECTED CONSUME EVENT.  These are opportunities to reveal WEB OF INTRIGUE targets, unlock SKILL UPGRADES, and earn bonus EP by completing timed challenges.

japanese: 吸収イベント
吸収

english: ENTER the GLOWING VOLUME on the roof of the building and press %0:BUTTON04 to start the MISSION.
japanese: 建物の屋上にかがやくりゅうしに入り %0:BUTTON04 を押すことでミッションが開始されます。
ミッション取得

english: These infected structures are called HIVES. These HIVES are centers of infection breeding HUNTERS releasing the INFECTED.
To DESTROY THE HIVE you must TARGET %0:BUTTON12 and FIRE %0:BUTTON03 at the HIVE with MISSILES and CANNON FIRE.

japanese: ハイヴ

english: To the right of the MINI-MAP is the DISGUISE METER with a SHUTTER at the bottom. \$0A\$0AWhen the SHUTTER IS OPEN, you are being WATCHED BY ENEMIES. \$0A\$0AWhen it is CLOSED, you are UNSEEN.
japanese: ミニマップの横に、シャッターが下についている偽装メーターがあります。 \$0A\$0Aシャッターが開いているとき、あなたは敵によって見られています。  \$0A\$0Aそれが閉じているとき、あなたは見つかっていません。

english: Every ACTION that reveals your TRUE IDENTITY fills the METER. When it FILLS COMPLETELY, your DISGUISE is COMPROMISED.
japanese: あなたの本当の正体を明らかにするあらゆる行動がメーターを上昇させます。 完全にいっぱいになると、偽装は見破られます。

english: A COMPROMISED DISGUISE is marked in RED.  This indicates that military units are in a state of ALERT and will engage you on sight.
japanese: 偽装が見破られるとレッドマークになります。 これは直ちに部隊が警報を出し、あなたと交戦状態に入った事を示します。

english: When ENEMIES lose sight of you, the DISGUISE ICON slowly drains. Stay out of sight until the ICON is EMPTY.
japanese: 敵があなたを見失うとき、偽装メーターはゆっくり下がっていきます。 メーターが空になるまで見つからない所に隠れてください。

english: If you have a GREY FORM in your other disguise slot and are currently UNSEEN, the SWITCH ICON appears. \$0A\$0APress %0:BUTTON16 to safely change forms and EVADE your enemies. This is the best way to quickly get the military off your back.
japanese: あなたが偽装スロットに他のフォームを持っており、現在見つかっていないならば、スイッチアイコンが現れます。 \$0A\$0Aボタン %0:BUTTON16で気づかれずに偽装できれば、敵は感染者だけです。 これは素早く軍隊をあなたの背後から取り去る最良の方法です。

english: ENEMIES that CANNOT see you are WHITE on the MINI-MAP.\$0A\$0AEnemies that CAN see you are YELLOW.\$0A\$0AEnemies that are ALERTED to your presence are RED.
japanese: あなたを見つけていない敵は、ミニマップで白です。 \$0A\$0Aあなたを見ている敵は、黄色です。 \$0A\$0Aあなたに気づいて警戒している敵は、REDです。
偽装

english: The city is still partially infected, and there is much to be done. Find the remaining WOI targets, infiltrate or destroy military bases, and complete all remaining events for EP rewards.\$0A\$0AUse these rewards to upgrade your abilities, allowing you to reach your full potential. The battle isn't over.
You've earned EP (EVOLUTION POINTS).\$0AEarn more EP by defeating ENEMIES, destroying or evading STRIKE TEAMS, and COMPLETING MISSIONS.
japanese: あなたは、EP(エボリューションポイント)を得ました。 \$0A敵を倒す、ストライク・チームを撃破するか逃げる、任務を完了する、ことによってより多くのEPを得てください。

english: EP is spent in the UPGRADES MENU to purchase new POWERS, MOVES and ABILITIES.\$0ANEW ITEMS will appear in the UPGRADES MENU as you complete missions and advance in the game story.
japanese: EPはアップグレード・メニューで新しいパワー、移動と特殊能力を買うために必要です。 \$0A新商品はあなたが任務を完了したときアップグレードメニューに現れて、ゲームのストーリーを前進させるでしょう。

english: PRESS %0:BUTTON09 during gameplay to ACCESS the UPGRADES MENU via the PAUSE SCREEN. In the UPGRADES MENU, PRESS %0:BUTTON10 or %0:BUTTON11 to switch tabs.
japanese: ゲームプレイ中、%0:BUTTON09でポーズ画面にしてからアップグレードメニューにアクセスしてください。 アップグレードのメニューでは%0:BUTTON10または%0:BUTTON11でタブを切り替えられます。

english: PRESS %0:BUTTON09 during gameplay to ACCESS the UPGRADES MENU via the PAUSE SCREEN. In the UPGRADES MENU, PRESS %0:BUTTON22 or %0:BUTTON23 to switch tabs.
NEW UPGRADES are available. Visit the UPGRADES MENU to see what POWERS, ABILITIES or MOVES you can unlock.
japanese: 新しいアップグレードが可能です。 何をアップグレードするかはメニューを見てください。 特殊能力をアンロックすることができます。
エボリューションポイント
エボリューションポイント

english: EVENT MARKERS are displayed on the MINI-MAP and PAUSE SCREEN MAP.
japanese: イベントマーカーは、ミニマップおよびポーズ画面のマップ上に表示されます。

english: All completed EVENTS award BRONZE, SILVER or GOLD medals.
japanese: すべて完了したイベントは、ブロンズ、シルバーまたはゴールドメダルを与えます。

english: Achieving GOLD in ALL EVENTS unlocks PLATINUM LEVEL EVENTS.  These are the most challenging EVENTS - complete these for large EP rewards.
japanese: すべてのイベントでゴールドメダルを達成すると、プラチナレベルのイベントがアンロックされます。 これは最上位のイベントです--大きなEP報酬のためにこれらを完成してください。

english: New EVENTS are unlocked as you progress through the game. \$0A\$0AEVENTS are a great way to acquire EP for purchasing new POWERS, MOVES and ABILITIES.
japanese: あなたがゲームを進めると新しいイベントがアンロックされます。 \$0A\$0Aイベント は、新しいパワーや移動、特殊能力を買うためのEPを得るすばらしい方法です。
イベント

english: DAMAGE the APC to get the AGENT to BAIL OUT.
japanese: エージェントに脱出させるために、APCに被害を与えてください。

english: MISSILE LAUNCHERS are highly effective against ARMORED VEHICLES.
japanese: ミサイルランチャーは、装甲車両に対して非常に効果的です。

english: You can use any WEAPON that an enemy drops. KILL an enemy and press %0:BUTTON02 to EQUIP their weapon.
japanese: あなたは、敵が持つどんな武器でも使うことができます。 敵を殺して武器を構えるために%0:BUTTON02を押してください。

english: When a WEAPON is EQUIPPED, press %0:BUTTON03 to FIRE.
japanese: 兵器を構えているとき、発射するには %0:BUTTON03を押してください。
武器

english: You are now in FREE ROAM mode. Head to the MARKER on your MINI-MAP to acquire a MISSION.
japanese: あなたは現在、自由行動モードにあります。 任務を得るにはあなたのミニマップのマークへ向かってください。
自由行動

english: GLIDE is the fastest way to get around the city. Combine GLIDE with AIRDASH to maximize your movement abilities.\$0A\$0AWhilst IN THE AIR, HOLD %0:BUTTON13 and then PRESS AND RELEASE %0:BUTTON01 to GLIDE.
GLIDE is the fastest way to get around the city. Combine GLIDE with AIRDASH to maximize your movement abilities.\$0A\$0AWhilst IN THE AIR, HOLD SPRINT and then PRESS AND RELEASE %0:BUTTON01 to GLIDE.
%0:BUTTON06 MOVE\$0A%0:BUTTON07 AIM\$0A%0:BUTTON01 ASCEND\$0A%0:BUTTON03 DESCEND\$0A%0:BUTTON13 FIRE\$0A%0:BUTTON11 SWITCH WEAPONS\$0A[HOLD] %0:BUTTON02 EJECT

MOVE with %0:BUTTON06\$0AAIM with the %0:BUTTON07\$0AASCEND with the MOUSE WHEEL or %0:BUTTON01\$0ADESCEND with the MOUSE WHEEL or %0:BUTTON03\$0AFIRE with %0:BUTTON13\$0ASWITCH WEAPONS with %0:BUTTON11\$0A(HOLD) %0:BUTTON02 to EJECT

INFECTED HIVES are defended by hordes of INFECTED and by HUNTERS. They can be formidable opponents.\$0AYour POWERS are generally INEFFECTIVE against this type of TARGET.\$0AUse WEAPONS, HIJACKED ARMOR, and DEVASTATOR attacks for MAXIMUM DAMAGE.
DESTROY INFECTED HIVES to TEMPORARILY SUPPRESS THE INFECTION IN THAT AREA and GAIN HUGE EP BONUSES.
INFECTED WATER TOWERS are INCUBATORS for HUNTERS. When you APPROACH, they begin to HATCH. When you BACK AWAY, they become DORMANT. Stay NEAR too long and they will ERUPT.
GENERATE GENETIC MATERIAL by DESTROYING the INFECTED WATER TOWER before it can hatch.
You need to CONSUME an APC DRIVER to gain the ability to HIJACK and DRIVE an APC.
japanese: APCを乗っ取り、乗りこなす能力を得るためにAPCドライバーを吸収する必要があります。

english: MILITARY BASES house KEY PERSONNEL that can be CONSUMED for UPGRADES. VISIT BASES frequently to IMPROVE or ADD SKILLS.
japanese: 軍事基地は、吸収するとアップグレードできる重要人物を収容しています。 スキルを追加したり改良するために、ときどき基地を訪れてください。

english: To ACCESS the IDENTITY SCANNERS, you need to CONSUME a COMMANDER and ASSUME HIS FORM.
japanese: 身体スキャナにアクセスするために、あなたは指揮官を吸収して、彼のフォームに偽装する必要があります。
基地潜入

english: EVERY MILITARY BASE houses IMPORTANT PERSONNEL you can CONSUME to gain UPGRADED or NEW SKILLS.
japanese: あらゆる軍事基地に、あなたがアップグレードか新しい技能を獲得するため吸収できる重要な人員を収容しています。

english: CONSUME the APC DRIVER to gain the ability to HIJACK and DRIVE APCs.
japanese: APCを乗っ取り、乗りこなす能力を得るためにAPCドライバーを吸収しろ。
基地内部

english: You've unlocked the ability to HIJACK and DRIVE ARMORED VEHICLES.
japanese: あなたは装甲車をハイジャックして、操る能力をアンロックしました。
装甲車の強奪

english: You've unlocked the ability to SKYJACK and FLY helicopters.  To SKYJACK, grab %0:BUTTON02 any HELICOPTER in the air.
japanese: ヘリコプターを乗っ取って、飛ばす能力をアンロックしました。 乗っ取るには、空中でヘリコプターを%0:BUTTON02でつかんでください。
ヘリコプターの強奪

english: The MILITARY is taking steps to FORTIFY STRATEGIC AREAS to prevent the Virus from spreading across the city.\$0A\$0AZONES which have been SECURED by the MILITARY and ZONES suffering a VIRAL INFECTION are marked on both the MAIN MAP and MINI-MAP.
japanese: ウイルスが都市中に広がるのを防ぐために、軍隊は重要地域の守備を固めて処置を行っています。 \$0A\$0A軍隊によって守られた地帯とウイルス感染地帯は、メインマップとミニマップに記されてます。

english: ZONES that are colored BLUE are secured by the MILITARY. At the heart of most MILITARY ZONES is a MILITARY BASE.\$0A\$0ADESTROY MILITARY BASES to TEMPORARILY SUPPRESS THE MILITARY IN THAT ZONE and GAIN HUGE EP BONUSES.
japanese: 青色のゾーンは軍によって保護されています。 軍事基地はほとんどのゾーンで軍事の中心です。 \$0A\$0A基地を破壊して、そのゾーンで一時軍を抑圧して、膨大なEPボーナスを獲得してください。

english: BASES that are marked with a PLUS on the PAUSE MAP and MINI-MAP contain military personnel that you can CONSUME for UPGRADES.\$0A\$0ABASES without a PLUS do not have personnel that can provide UPGRADES.
japanese: ポーズマップとミニマップの上にプラスがある状態で示される基地には、アップグレードのために吸収できる軍人がいます。 \$0A\$0Aプラスのない基地は、アップグレード対象の人員はいません。

english: ZONES that are colored RED are INFECTED WITH THE VIRUS. Most INFECTED ZONES contain an INFECTED HIVE at their center.\$0A\$0ADESTROY INFECTED HIVES to TEMPORARILY SUPPRESS THE INFECTION IN THAT AREA and GAIN HUGE EP BONUSES.
japanese: レッドゾーンはウイルスに感染しています。 大部分の感染地域はその中央に感染者のハイヴがあります。 \$0A\$0A一時的にその地域で感染をおさえて莫大なエピソード・ボーナスを獲得するために、感染者のハイヴを破壊してください。
勢力のコントロール

english: There is a MINI-MAP of Manhattan in the BOTTOM-LEFT CORNER of the screen. Your position and direction are marked by a WHITE ARROW.
japanese: マンハッタンのミニマップがスクリーンの左下隅にあります。 あなたの位置と向きは白い矢じるしによってマークされます。

english: OBJECTIVE MARKERS appear in BLUE. These represent important LOCATIONS, ENEMIES or TARGETS.
japanese: オブジェクトは青い目じるしです。 これらは重要な場所、敵または目標を意味します。

english: ENEMIES are marked on the mini-map as WHITE DOTS.  When they see you, they become YELLOW.  During an ALERT, they become RED.\$0A\$0AINFECTED ENEMIES are ALWAYS RED.
japanese: 敵はホワイトドットとしてミニマップにマークされます。 あなたに出会うと、それらはイエローになります。 警報が出ている間はレッドになります。 感染した敵はいつもレッドです。
ミニマップ

english: NEW GAME+ mode unlocked.\$0A\$0ASelect NEW GAME from the MAIN MENU to play through the game again with all of ALEX'S UPGRADES UNLOCKED.
ARMOR reduces all damage taken with the compromise of reduced mobility. You cannot GLIDE, PARKOUR or DIVEROLL when this power is activated.
japanese: アーマーは、機動力の低下と引き替えに、受ける全てのダメージをへらします。 この能力を使用したとき、あなたはグライド、パルクール、ダイブロールができなくなります。
アーマー・パワー

english: The BLADE is a powerful and deadly cutting and thrusting weapon - perfect for slicing and swiping through even the toughest armored vehicles or infected hides. For individual attacks, this is your most powerful attack power.
japanese: ブレードは切断し突き刺すことができる強力で致命的な武器であり、最もタフな装甲車か感染者のハイヴを破壊するのにうってつけです。 それらを個々に攻撃するとき、これは最も強力な攻撃パワーです。
ブレード・パワー

english: You've acquired your first DEFENSE power. HOLD %0:BUTTON10 to show the POWER SELECT WHEEL, then SELECT with %0:BUTTON07. TOGGLE the selected DEFENSE power with %0:BUTTON15.
japanese: 最初のディフェンス・パワーを取得しました。 %0:BUTTON10を押している間、パワーセレクトホイールが表示されます。 そして%0:BUTTON07で選択します。 %0:BUTTON15で選択したディフェンス・パワーを切り替えます。

english: You've acquired your first DEFENSE power. HOLD %0:BUTTON10 to show the POWER SELECT WHEEL, and select it with the %0:BUTTON07. QUICKLY ACTIVATE the last DEFENSE power you used with %0:BUTTON15. Press again to DEACTIVATE.
DEFENSE powers ENHANCE your survivability through INCREASED DAMAGE RESISTANCE.
japanese: 防御能力は、ダメージへの耐性が増加し、生存の可能性を強化します。
防御能力

english: HOLD %0:BUTTON10 to open the POWER SELECT WHEEL.\$0A\$0AUse this to SELECT and TOGGLE your different POWERS.
MOVE the %0:BUTTON07 to highlight the desired POWER and then RELEASE %0:BUTTON10.\$0A\$0ARemember that you can use the QUICK SELECT SLOTS on %0:BUTTON05 to quickly turn selected POWERS on and off.
MOVE the %0:BUTTON07 to highlight the desired POWER and then RELEASE %0:BUTTON10.\$0A\$0ARemember that you can use the QUICK SELECT keys to quickly turn selected POWERS on and off.

You can have any combination of ATTACK, DEFENSE and SENSORY POWERS active at the same time.  Experiment with mixing/matching to find combinations that work for you.  If one combination doesn't work, try another.
You've acquired your first SENSORY power. HOLD %0:BUTTON10 to show the POWER SELECT WHEEL, and select it with %0:BUTTON07. PRESS %0:BUTTON00 to TOGGLE the current SENSORY POWER.
japanese: 最初の知覚能力を獲得した。 %0:BUTTON10 を押して能力選択ホイールを表示し、 %0:BUTTON07 で選択してください。 %0:BUTTON00 ボタンを押せば、現在のセンサリー・パワーをオンオフします。

english: You've acquired your first SENSORY power. HOLD %0:BUTTON10 to show the POWER SELECT WHEEL, and select it with the %0:BUTTON07. QUICKLY ACTIVATE the last SENSORY power you used with %0:BUTTON00. Press again to DEACTIVATE.
SENSORY powers enhance your perception, making it easier to see your enemies in even the most cluttered battlefield environment.
japanese: 知覚能力は、あなたの知覚を強化します。 とても込み入った戦場だったとしても、敵をたやすく発見できます。
知覚能力

english: SHIELD is a defensive power that soaks up initial damage from enemies. If the SHIELD receives a large amount of damage at once, the shield will BREAK and must regenerate. You cannot PARKOUR while using SHIELD - you will SMASH a PATH through obstacles instead. PRESS %0:BUTTON10 to activate the POWER SELECT WHEEL and choose SHIELD.  Quickly ACTIVATE or DEACTIVATE this power with %0:BUTTON15.
japanese: シールドは、敵からの最初のダメージを吸収する防御能力です。 もしシールドが一度に大量のダメージを受けると、シールドは破壊され、再生を待たなければいけなくなります。 シールドを使っている間、あなたはパルクールを使用できなくなります ―― そのかわりあなたは、進路上の障害物を破壊していくでしょう。 %0:BUTTON10 を押して能力選択ホイールを起動して、シールドを選択します。 %0:BUTTON15 で、素早く有効化、無効化できます。
シールド・パワー

english: You have acquired POWERS that you haven't yet ACTIVATED. PRESS %0:BUTTON10 to activate the POWER SELECT WHEEL and experiment with your new POWERS.
japanese: あなたはまだ作動させていない能力を獲得しています。 %0:BUTTON10 を押して能力選択ホイールを作動させ、新しい能力を確かめてください。
未開発の能力

english: You must PURCHASE a NEW POWER before entering the next MISSION.  PAUSE with %0:BUTTON09 and select UPGRADES to purchase the required power.
japanese: あなたは、次のミッションに入る前に、新しいパワーを買わなければなりません。 %0:BUTTON09 でポーズし、アップグレードを選択して必要なパワーを買ってください。
新たなパワーが必要

english: HELICOPTERS are fast and powerful. SKYJACKING one can turn the tide of a difficult battle.  To SKYJACK, JUMP %0:BUTTON01 and then GRAB %0:BUTTON02 at the helicopter to clamber aboard.\$0A\$0APro Tip: To improve your chances of a SKYJACK, you can JUMP KICK %0:BUTTON01 > %0:BUTTON03 to the Helicopter, then GRAB %0:BUTTON02 as soon as you touch the helicopter to begin the SKYJACK!
japanese: ヘリコプターは素早く、強力です。 スカイジャックは厳しい戦闘の流れを変えることができます。 スカイジャックを行うには、%0:BUTTON01 でジャンプし、ヘリコプターによじ登るために %0:BUTTON02 で掴んでください。 .\$0A\$0A高度な情報: スカイジャックのチャンスを増やすために、ヘリコプターに向けて %0:BUTTON01 > %0:BUTTON03 でジャンプキックできます。 それから、スカイジャックを開始するために、ヘリコプターに触れた瞬間に %0:BUTTON02 で掴んでください。

english: PRESS %0:BUTTON01 to JUMP towards a HELICOPTER in flight. GRAB the HELICOPTER with %0:BUTTON02. If the HELICOPTER is too far to grab, after jumping you can PRESS %0:BUTTON03 to close the distance with a FLYING KICK before grabbing with %0:BUTTON02.
japanese: 飛行中にヘリコプターに向けて  %0:BUTTON01 を押してジャンプしてください。 %0:BUTTON02 でヘリコプターを掴んでください。 もしヘリコプターが掴むには遠すぎる場合、ジャンプの後で %0:BUTTON02 で掴む前に、 %0:BUTTON03 を押してフライングキックで距離をつめることができます。
スカイジャック
%0:BUTTON04 で特殊攻撃を繰り出す。
特殊攻撃

english: HOLD %0:BUTTON13 to enter SPRINT MODE. In SPRINT MODE, you move at high speed, PARKOUR over obstacles and can WALLRUN VERTICAL SURFACES.
japanese: %0:BUTTON13を押し続ける間、スプリント・モードに入ります。 スプリント・モードでは、高速移動 - パルクールで障害物をこえる - 垂直な壁を走る - ことができます。

english: DOUBLE-TAP AND HOLD %0:BUTTON06 to enter SPRINT MODE. In SPRINT MODE, you RUN as fast as possible, PARKOUR over obstacles and WALLRUN.

japanese: スプリンティング

english: The MARKER added to your mini-map is a MISSION START POINT. Head to this MARKER to start the next MISSION.
japanese: あなたのミニマップに追加されたマーカーは、任務のスタートポイントです。 このマーカーに向かい、次の任務を始めてください。
ミッション

english: A STRIKE TEAM is inbound on your position.\$0A\$0AESCAPE the area before they arrive or ASSUME A DISGUISE before they arrive.\$0A\$0AIf a STRIKE TEAM locates you, DESTROY or EVADE it for an EP BONUS.
japanese: ストライク・チームはあなたの位置に向かいます。 \$0A\$0A彼らが到着するか、または到着する前に偽装して、その領域から離れてください。 \$0A\$0Aストライク・チームがあなたの所在を突き止めたならば、EPボーナスのためにそれを破壊するか、または逃げてください。

english: ESCAPE the area or ASSUME A DISGUISE before the STRIKE TEAM arrives. \$0A\$0AIf a STRIKE TEAM locates you, DESTROY or EVADE it for EP BONUSES.
japanese: この領域から逃げるか、またはストライク・チームが到着する前に偽装してください。 \$0A\$0Aあなたがストライク・チームに見つかったなら、EPボーナスのためにそれを破壊するか、または逃げてください。
ストライク・チーム

english: The ENEMY is radioing A STRIKE TEAM REQUEST.  STRIKE TEAMS ARE fast-moving aerial units that will pursue and engage you.  KILL the ENEMY before they complete the STRIKE TEAM REQUEST and you can cancel the STRIKE deployment.
japanese: 敵は無線連絡でストライク・チームを要請しています。 それは空中を素早く動きあなたを追跡する航空ヘリ部隊です。 チームを要請する前に敵を倒してしまえばヘリ部隊の展開を中止できます。
ストライク・チーム

english: SUPERSOLDIERS are capable of ENHANCED MOVEMENT and POWERFUL ATTACKS. They can DETECT ALEX, even when DISGUISED. They are vulnerable to GRABS when they are BLOCKING.
Alex is extremely strong, meaning that nearly anything in the world can be picked up and THROWN. Combine TARGETING %0:BUTTON12 and THROWING %0:BUTTON02 to destroy ENEMIES at range.
japanese: アレックスはとても怪力です、世界のほとんど何でもひろって、投げることができるでしょう。 敵を広範囲で破壊するために%0:BUTTON12で目標を選び%0:BUTTON02で投げてください。

english: Alex is extremely strong, meaning that nearly anything in the world can be picked up and THROWN. Combine TARGETING %0:BUTTON12 and THROWING %0:BUTTON03 to destroy ENEMIES at range.

japanese: 物を投げる

english: HOLD %0:BUTTON13 and run at any VERTICAL SURFACE to WALLRUN.
japanese: あらゆる垂直な壁面で、%0:BUTTON13を押しながら走ってください。

english: DOUBLE-TAP AND HOLD %0:BUTTON06 and run at any wall; you'll enter WALLRUNNING MODE.

japanese: ウォールランニング

english: PRESS %0:BUTTON02 to GRAB or DROP any WEAPON, from a RIFLE to a MISSILE LAUNCHER. When a WEAPON is EQUIPPED press %0:BUTTON03 to FIRE.

japanese: 火器

english: Congratulations!  You've beaten, cut and consumed your way through the entirety of the WEB OF INTRIGUE.  Youv'e uncovered all available memories relating to the events leading up to the Manhattan Outbreak - but do you know the whole story?
japanese: おめでとう！ あなたは全ての陰謀の記憶を通して自分の道を伸ばして、切って、吸収しました。 マンハッタン感染発生の原因となっているイベントに関して、あなたはすべての利用できる記憶を見つけました ―― しかし、あなたは全ての物語を知っていますか？
陰謀の記憶

english: You're digging deep into the history of the Manhattan Outbreak - you've consumed 50% of the WEB OF INTRIGUE.  Find the rest, and discover the truth.
japanese: あなたはマンハッタン感染事件の経緯を深く調べています ―― あなたは陰謀の記憶を 50% 吸収しました。 残りを見つけてください。 そして真実を見つけてください。
陰謀の記憶

english: You have consumed 75% of the WEB OF INTRIGUE, and you're getting dangerously close to knowing everything there is to know about the Manhattan Outbreak.
japanese: あなたは陰謀の記憶を 75% 吸収しました。 マンハッタン感染事件に関して知り得た情報は、真相に危険なほど近づいています。
陰謀の記憶

english: This is a WEB OF INTRIGUE TARGET. CONSUME him to gain memories and unlock more WEB OF INTRIGUE TARGETS.
japanese: これは陰謀の記憶です。 相手を吸収することで記憶を得て、より多くの陰謀の記憶を解除してください。
陰謀の記憶

english: The INJECTION has rendered your POWERS useless, but your STRENGTH, SPEED and DISGUISE abilities are UNAFFECTED.
japanese: 注射によって特殊能力が使えなくなった。 しかし体力、スピード、偽装の能力は影響を受けていない。

english: The PARASITE has rendered your POWERS useless, but your STRENGTH, SPEED and DISGUISE abilities are UNAFFECTED.

japanese: [機密情報]
billion(10億)
million(100万)
trillion(兆)
取得する
戻る
目標解除
アップグレード
スキルのアップグレード
アップグレード
空爆
グレネードランチャー
ミサイルランチャー
戦車コントロール
ヘリコプターコントロール
アサルトライフル
マシンガン

english: Select a save game to play through story mode again with all your previously unlocked powers, WOI targets, moves and abilities available.
HIJACK enemy ARMORED VEHICLES.  Rip open the hatch and commandeer.

japanese: 装甲車両を乗っ取る

english: SKYJACK enemy HELICOPTERS. Jump onboard and take control.

japanese: ヘリコプターを乗っ取る

english: Drop ordnance from above and blow your enemies into the stone age.\$0A\$0AUpgradeable.

japanese: アーティラリーストライク
アーティラリーストライク アップグレード 1
アーティラリーストライク アップグレード 2
アーティラリーストライク アップグレード 3
アーティラリーストライク アップグレード 4
アーティラリーストライク アップグレード 最大

english: INCREASED EFFECTIVENESS for the MISSILE LAUNCHER.\$0A\$0AUpgradeable.

japanese: ミサイルランチャー 1

english: INCREASED EFFECTIVENESS for the MISSILE LAUNCHER.\$0A\$0AUpgradeable.

japanese: ミサイルランチャー 2

english: MAXIMUM EFFECTIVENESS for the MISSILE LAUNCHER.

japanese: ミサイルランチャー 最大

english: INCREASED EFFECTIVENESS for the GRENADE LAUNCHER.\$0A\$0AUpgradeable.

japanese: グレネードランチャー 1

english: INCREASED EFFECTIVENESS for the GRENADE LAUNCHER.\$0A\$0AUpgradeable.

japanese: グレネードランチャー 2

english: MAXIMUM EFFECTIVENESS for the GRENADE LAUNCHER.
INCREASED EFFECTIVENESS for the MACHINE GUN.\$0A\$0AUpgradeable.

japanese: マシンガン 1

english: INCREASED EFFECTIVENESS for the MACHINE GUN.\$0A\$0AUpgradeable.

japanese: マシンガン 2

english: MAXIMUM EFFECTIVENESS for the MACHINE GUN.

japanese: マシンガン 最大

english: INCREASED EFFECTIVENESS for the ASSAULT RIFLE.\$0A\$0AUpgradeable.

japanese: アサルトライフル 1

english: INCREASED EFFECTIVENESS for the ASSAULT RIFLE.\$0A\$0AUpgradeable.

japanese: アサルトライフル 2

english: MAXIMUM EFFECTIVENESS for the ASSAULT RIFLE.

japanese: アサルトライフル 最大
装甲車両 1
装甲車両 2
装甲車両 最大
ヘリコプター 1
ヘリコプター 2
ヘリコプター 最大
クロー・パワー
ブレード・パワー
ハンマーフィスト・パワー
ウィップフィスト・パワー
マッスルマス・パワー
センサリー・パワー

アサルトライフル

ヘルスリジェネレーション
ジャンプアップグレード

エアアップグレード

english: CRITICAL MASS. Go beyond the constraints of maximum health, and enter CRITICAL MASS for increased attack damage, and the ability to use DEVASTATOR attacks.

japanese: クリティカルマスアップグレード
ハイジャック

english: Pound the ground. This powerful area effect is great for clearing an area of weaker enemies by launching them into the air.  CHARGE to increase area of effect and power of the attack.
GROUNDSHATTER is a vital technique for clearing groups of enemies from your path. Outstanding for clearing out crowds of weaker enemies. Add AIR GROUNDSHATTER as an upgrade.

japanese: グランドシャッター

english: Drop from above and create a huge ground effect. Great for clearing groups of enemies or just creating destruction. CHARGE or increase the height of your drop for an increased area effect and attack power.

japanese: グランドシャッタードロップ

english: One of the most powerful moves available. Devastate with a cascade of deadly GROUNDSPIKES to everything nearby. DEVASTATORS CAN ONLY BE TRIGGERED WHEN IN CRITICAL MASS.

japanese: グランドスパイクグレイブヤードデバスター

english: Drop from the sky and deliver a wave of deadly GROUNDSPIKES to impale nearby enemies. Very powerful against vehicles. DEVASTATORS CAN ONLY BE USED WHEN IN CRITICAL MASS.

japanese: エアグランドスパイクグレイブヤードデバスター

english: Pound your fists together to blast opponents away from you.  Not damaging, but can buy you a lot of time when you blast enemies out of your way.  Great for clearing an area among weaker foes. CHARGE for more power.
KNUCKLE SHOCKWAVE is a tool to create distance between yourself and other enemies.  Punch your fists together to create a localised explosion - CHARGE for increased RANGE.

japanese: ナックルショックウェーブ

english: Pound your fists together to create a powerful shockwave blast.  Not the most damaging attack, but great for clearing the air.  Use during jumps to clear away weak or damaged aerial opponents.

japanese: エアナックルショックウェーブ

english: Deadly tendrils erupt from your body to impale all nearby enemies.  Most powerful against biological foes. CAN ONLY BE USED WHEN IN CRITICAL MASS.
TENDRIL BARRAGE is the first DEVASTATOR you have access to.  DEVASTATORS are your MOST POWERFUL ATTACKS.  You must enter CRITICAL MASS to activate this ability.

japanese: テンドリルバーレイジデバスター

english: AIR version of the TENDRIL BARRAGE DEVASTATOR. Tendrils erupt from your form to impale all nearby enemies.  Most powerful against large numbers of weaker enemies or fast-moving evasive enemies such as helicopters.

japanese: エアテンドリルバーレイジデバスター

english: Let your enemy know how you feel about them with a fast PALM SLAM.  Clears nearby enemies from your path with a directed force attack.  Allows access to the CRITICAL PAIN DEVASTATOR.

japanese: パームスラム

english: The CRITICAL PAIN DEVASTATOR inflicts untold damage upon any enemies in the line of fire. Outstanding against large, powerful, or evasive enemies.

japanese: クリティカルペインデバスター

english: Drop from on high with a face full of hurt.  The higher the drop, the bigger the impact.   The elbow drop is useful against ground-based enemies, as you can move up high, then drop with a punishing strike.

japanese: フライングエルボードロップ

english: Perform a quick drop to create a powerful shockwave.  Useful to clear out a tight grouping of enemies, or stun a larger opponent for an immediate followup attack.

japanese: エアストンプ

english: Increase FLYING KICK range, speed and damage with this upgrade.  Great against HELICOPTERS or UAVs.
Use the FLYING KICK BOOST to take down enemy aircraft, UAVs or to single out enemies in a crowd.  Snipe larger enemies with quick hits and then use DIVEROLL to get clear of their counter-attacks.

japanese: フライングキックブースト

english: FLYING KICK COMBO allows you to repeatedly pummel an opponent from the safety of the air.  Jump, kick and then kick again.  All hits are chargeable.

japanese: フライングキックコンボ

english: FLIPKICK LAUNCHER turns your enemy into a projectile.  Jump kick, and then charge for launch!

japanese: フリップキックランチャー

english: Launch your enemy with a chin-shattering UPPERCUT LAUNCHER.  Follow-up while in the air, or AIR STOMP down as a followup.

japanese: アッパーカットランチャー

english: Use the SNAPKICK LAUNCHER to launch a single enemy far into the air.  CHARGE to increase effect.

japanese: スナップキックランチャー

english: Bash your target towards the horizon with a bone shattering combo!  Follows right out of the UPPERCUT LAUNCHER.

japanese: エアコンボ

english: SPIKE your enemy downwards. CHARGE the SPIKE DRIVER to increase damage.

japanese: スパイクドライバー

english: Face, meet cement.  Share the fun of a communal gravity experience with the POWERBOMB.  Excellent against the more resilient humanoid opponents.

japanese: パワーボム

english: While jumping, redirect with the AIRDASH.  AIRDASH can be used to avoid projectiles, get extra distance in a jump, or change your trajectory in mid-flight.  Experiment with this move - it's an important one to master. Upgradeable.

AIRDASH is a vital component of Alex's movement style.  Jump and AIRDASH %0:BUTTON13 to avoid attacks, or simply redirect your jump while in flight.  Try out using it at different times in the jump; just after takeoff, at the apex of the jump or just before landing; each has different uses.
AIRDASH is a vital component of Alex's movement style. To AIRDASH, DOUBLE-TAP + RELEASE %0:BUTTON06 to avoid attacks, or simply redirect your jump while in flight. Experiment!

japanese: エアダッシュ

english: Increase the speed and distance of your AIRDASH with this upgrade.

japanese: エアダッシュブースト

english: Add a second AIRDASH for each and every jump.  Use AIRDASH DOUBLE to double dodge, or alternately avoid an attack - then dash toward your foe for a retaliation!\$0A\$0AUpgradeable.

japanese: エアダッシュダブル

english: Increase the distance of the AIRDASH DOUBLE with this upgrade.  Dash further and faster with each AIRDASH!

japanese: エアダッシュダブルブースト

english: Launched by an explosion or attack?  Use the AIR RECOVERY to twist out early.
AIR RECOVERY lets you twist out into control in the air.  By AIR RECOVERING, you can turn a punishing float from an enemy into an aggressive counter attack.

japanese: エアリカバリー

english: GLIDE is a vital ability to increase your movement options. Perfect for covering a lot of real estate in short order, or dropping into bases without attracting attention.

GLIDE is an advanced movement technique, allowing unparalleled flexibility when combined with the AIRDASH.  Hold %0:BUTTON13 and then JUMP %0:BUTTON01 into the glide.  Exit into subsequent AIRDASHES for maximum control.

GLIDE is an advanced movement technique, allowing unparalleled flexibility when combined with the AIRDASH. SPRINT and then JUMP %0:BUTTON01 into the glide. Exit into subsequent AIRDASHES for maximum control.

japanese: グライド

english: From the GLIDE move, drop hard, drop fast for a maximum-impact splash effect with the BULLETDIVE DROP.  The Bulletdive drop doesn't track well, but it  hits extremely hard - your most powerful drop attack.

japanese: バレットダイブドロップ

english: SPRINTING GRAB allows you to snag ammo or victims without sacrificing movement.  Grab - and run.

SPRINTING GRAB allows you to pick up objects or enemies while on the run.  Combine with the SPRINTING THROW for maximum hit-and-run flexibility.  Grab consume victims without stopping, then consume from the safety of a rooftop.

japanese: スプリンティンググラブ

english: Allows Alex to throw objects while moving.

japanese: スプリンティングスロー

english: Whiplash any human into a shockwave knockout with the GRAPPLE SLAM, a powerful one-shot shockwave attack.

japanese: グラップルスラム

english: Don't stop moving with the BODY SURF; turn your enemy into a new form of movement.  Will only work with human-class enemies.

japanese: ボディサーフ

english: Launch whatever you're holding without losing your momentum.

japanese: ドロップキックランチャー

english: Introduce your defeated enemy's face to the heel of your shoe.

japanese: カーブストンプ

english: Break a Hunter - and consume him for health.

japanese: ハンターデスブロー

english: Slicing combo finisher for deadly damage.

japanese: アッパースライス

english: Slice. Cleave. Slash. Gore on the move.

japanese: ダッシングスライス

english: Shift your mass into a deadly spike that erupts beneath your enemies. Combine with targeting for pinpoint spike precision.\$0A\$0AUpgradeable.

GROUNDSPIKE allows you to channel biomass below ground level and then pierce an opponent from below.  GROUNDSPIKE is excellent against tight concentrations of weaker enemies, or slow-moving ground-based enemies such as armored vehicles.  Combine with TARGETING %0:BUTTON12 to strike with pinpoint accuracy.  CHARGE %0:BUTTON04 for extra damage.  Upgradeable for larger spikes.

japanese: グランドスパイク

english: Deploy a series of deadly GROUNDSPIKES, one after another.  Great for a crowd of enemies, or a confused melee of opponents.  Deploy against crowds of enemies and leave nothing but bodycount.

japanese: グランドスパイクリピーター

english: Powerful but slow combo for the BLADE power.  Extremely effective against ARMORED VEHICLES and LARGE, POWERFUL ENEMIES.

japanese: ブレードクロスカットコンボ

english: Slice your foes with a lunging blade sweep out of a sprint.

japanese: ブレードスプリントフレンジー

english: Unleash a series of slashing attacks from a standing start.

japanese: ブレードフレンジー

english: Slice and dice from the air. Cleave your enemy in half with this drop-down cutting attack.

japanese: ブレードエアスライス

english: Blast enemies out of your path with this powerful combo. It is slow, but powerful - especially effective against enemy armor.  Be wary of using against faster opponents.

japanese: ハンマーフィストスマックダウン

english: Sprint into a self-throw; put all your weight into a single, concentrated attack.  The HAMMERTOSS is dangerous when you miss - and deadly when you hit.

japanese: ハンマートス

english: Jump up, drop down.  Deadly against armor.  Add extra height to increase your damage and area of effect.  With the right conditions, you can crack an enemy tank with a single blow.

japanese: ハンマーフィストエルボースラム

english: Dismember all nearby enemies with a wide sweeping crack of WHIPFIST.

japanese: ストリートスイーパー

english: If there is an enemy at long range, use LONGSHOT GRAB to reel them in. Combine it with SKYJACKING and zip your way up to a HELICOPTER.

japanese: ロングショットグラブ

english: Use your disguise to accuse another of being hostile.\$0A\$0AUpgradeable.

japanese: パッツィ

english: A range boost to the PATSY move.

japanese: パッツィレンジブースト

english: A devastating attack move with extra charge potential. Combo into this and charge for outstanding damage.

japanese: ブレークダウンスマッシュ

english: Improved damage and area effect of the GROUNDSPIKE.\$0A\$0AUpgradeable.

japanese: グランドスパイクアップグレード 1

english: Maximum damage and area effect of the GROUNDSPIKE.

japanese: グランドスパイクアップグレード 最大

english: Chain quick wall jumps together with the WALL JUMP LATCH upgrade.  Useful for quick redirects and enhances overall movement control.

japanese: ウォールジャンプラッチ

english: Use DIVEROLL to avoid projectiles and attacks. DIVEROLL is an important move to master.

DIVEROLL is essential to surviving close combat.  DIVEROLL %0:BUTTON13 to avoid imminent close-range attacks or incoming projectiles.  Doing so will often offer you the chance for a devastating counter-attack; hit and run!

DIVEROLL is essential to surviving close combat. To DIVEROLL, DOUBLE-TAP + RELEASE any MOVEMENT key to avoid imminent close-range attacks or incoming projectiles. Doing so will often offer you the chance for a devastating counter-attack; hit and run!

japanese: ダイブロール

english: Increase your object throw range; pick off opponents more than a block away when combined with TARGETING.  Excellent against distant enemy groups, INFECTED HIVES or MILITARY BASES.

LONG RANGE THROW is a vital upgrade.  PICK UP and then THROW almost anything in the world; characters, vehicles, debris... the heavier, the better!  Throwing is your most powerful weapon against aircraft, and excellent at pounding military armour at long range.  Remember to CHARGE for maximum range and power on a throw; it takes a little longer but is more than worth the effort.

japanese: ロングレンジスロー

english: CHARGE your throw before releasing for vastly increased range and power.  THROW CHARGING is vital when engaging aircraft.

This upgrade unlocks THROW CHARGING.  Alex can PICK UP and THROW any object in the game, turning Manhattan traffic into long-range weaponry.  With this upgrade, you can CHARGE THROWS for increased DAMAGE.

japanese: チャージスロー

english: Air version of the CRITICAL PAIN DEVASTATOR attack. Does massive damage to anything in the line of fire; air version allows the player to jump and charge the attack without exposing himself to a counter-attack.

japanese: エアクリティカルペインデバスター

english: Tuck and roll; slice through the air and unleash a deadly splash impact on your opponents.  The CANNONBALL has excellent range and tracking, making it an outstanding attack against aircraft.

japanese: キャノンボール

english: HOLD %0:BUTTON10 and use the %0:BUTTON07 to select MUSCLEMASS
Greatly increase the damage of your MUSCLEMASS attacks, hitting for yet more increased damage with basic hand to hand attacks.

japanese: マッスルマスブースト

english: Need to reach out and touch someone?  Use the LONGSHOT STRIKE to hit enemies or object at range.  Fantastic against enemy helicopters or troublesome UAV patrols, this move is your built-in sniper rifle.

japanese: ロングショットストライク

english: Greatly increase the range and damage of your MUSCLEMASS throws.

japanese: マッスルマススロー

english: Grab and slam a HUNTER to the ground.  A good tactical option when you're surrounded by a pack of infected, or want to get away from a single troublesome HUNTER.

japanese: ハンターダートナップ

english: HOLD %0:BUTTON10 and use the %0:BUTTON07 to select CLAWS
Transform your hands into deadly edged weapons; slice and dice for up-close crowd control.
Claw attacks are very effective against humans and strong against ground-based foes. Limited damage potential against armored or large enemies. Ineffective against aircraft.

japanese: クロー・パワー

english: HOLD %0:BUTTON10 and use the %0:BUTTON07 to select MUSCLEMASS
Increases strength twofold.  THROWS go further and all STRIKE attacks carry more damage.\$0A\$0AUpgradeable.
MUSCLEMASS POWER boosts the power of ALL your hand to hand attacks.  Throw further.  Strike harder.  Do more damage overall.  The only downside is the attention you draw to yourself.

japanese: マッスルマス・パワー

english: HOLD %0:BUTTON10 and use the %0:BUTTON07 to select HAMMERFIST
Trade speed for power - shift biomass to your forearms to allow deadly area-effect attacks, crush guarding enemies and shatter armored vehicles. HAMMERFIST delivers the pain.

HAMMERFIST attacks aren't the fastest, but they are bone-shatteringly powerful.  Best employed against slow or immobile targets, they are outstanding against enemy TANKS, BUILDING STRUCTURES or other large, slow opponents.  Charge your attacks to clear out wide areas from crowds of smaller, weaker opponents such as tighly packed soldier groups or infected hordes.  Powerful, but a little slower than other attacks means that swifter foes can punish missed attacks.  Consider adding the HAMMERFIST ELBOW DROP to add a deadly aerial technique ability to your moveset.

japanese: ハンマーフィスト・パワー

english: HOLD %0:BUTTON10 and use the %0:BUTTON07 to select WHIPFIST
The WHIPFIST is a thin, flexible blade-edged arm that can be used to attack at extreme range, or whip through entire crowds of enemies.  Tame your foes from a safe distance.

WHIPFIST is best employed against groups of weaker foes or evasive aircraft.  The initial power allows medium range attacks against more powerful opponents, making it a powerful tool to tame hunters.  Once available, consider adding the LONGSHOT STRIKE %0:BUTTON04 upgrade to reach out and snipe enemies and aircraft at extreme range, or use the LONGSHOT GRAB %0:BUTTON02 upgrade to simply grab the aircraft and perform a SKYJACK!

japanese: ウィップフィスト・パワー

english: HOLD %0:BUTTON10 and use the %0:BUTTON07 to select BLADE

The BLADE is a powerful and deadly cutting and thrusting weapon; perfect for slicing and swiping through even the toughest armored vehicles or infected hides.  This attack power allows access to the most powerful strikes available.

BLADE is a single deadly cutting edge, and is your single most powerful attack power.  Uncompromising, the BLADE will carve through rigid military armor almost as easily as it cleaves flesh.  Use with total disregard for all life.

japanese: ブレード・パワー

english: HOLD %0:BUTTON10 and use the %0:BUTTON07 to select SHIELD
The shield will absorb damage on impact, preserving your health completely - until it BREAKS.  Once BROKEN, the shield must REGENERATE before it will once again repel damage.

The SHIELD power flares out a biological shield when you are hit.  It absorbs damage, and heals over time.  Should it take a bulk of damage in a short period of time then the shield will BREAK , neutralising the power for a short time.  The SHIELD is great for soaking up moderate damage, but puts you at risk against more powerful foes.

japanese: シールド・パワー

english: HOLD %0:BUTTON10 and use the %0:BUTTON07 to select ARMOR

Armor increases damage resistance overall, at the cost of movement abilities such as GLIDE or DIVEROLL.  Alex doesn't clear obstacles when Armored; instead, he will shoulder a path through vehicles and minor enemies.

japanese: アーマー・パワー

english: Vanish into the background with chameleonic skin; outstanding for evasion and infiltration. The chameleonic skin allows you to sow confusion and panic in your wake.

japanese: カメレオニックスキン

english: HOLD %0:BUTTON10 and use the %0:BUTTON07 to select THERMAL VISION
THERMAL VISION lets you see through obscuring smoke and other thin obstacles at the expense of a limited visual range.  Use THERMAL VISION to see enemies when smoke and debris fill your view.

Sharpen your predatory senses with THERMAL VISION.  Once activated, this power will cut through the clutter of smoke and debris to see what you need to: living enemies.  Due to the nature of infra-red, the downside is a limited visual range.

japanese: サーマルビジョン・パワー

english: HOLD %0:BUTTON10 and use the %0:BUTTON07 to select INFECTED VISION
See the world as the Infected see it; tune into the Hive Mind itself with INFECTED VISION.  Use this to spot enemies at range, and pick out hostile characters from simple bystanders.
INFECTED VISION lets you tune into the INFECTED HIVE MIND.  Pick out enemies and vehicles from even extreme ranges.

japanese: インフェクトビジョン・パワー

english: HOLD %0:BUTTON10 and use the %0:BUTTON07 to select DISGUISE
Mankind is your mask; use DISGUISE to conceal yourself as a perfect copy of the last individual you consumed.

japanese: 偽装能力
吸収 %1:NUMBER/%2:NUMBER\$0Aブラックウォッチ・コマンダー
吸収 %1:NUMBER/%2:NUMBER\$0Aヘリコプター・オフィサー

english: Increased HEALTH allows you to absorb more damage.\$0A\$0AUpgradeable.

japanese: ヘルスブースト 1

english: Further increased HEALTH, increasing your ability to absorb damage from enemy attacks.\$0A\$0AUpgradeable.

japanese: ヘルスブースト 2

english: Maximum HEALTH.  This is the maximum increase of HEALTH possible through upgrades.

japanese: ヘルスブースト 最大

english: Go beyond the constraints of MAXMIMUM HEALTH, and enter CRITICAL MASS mode for increased attack damage, and the ability to deploy DEVASTATOR attacks.\$0A\$0AUpgradeable.

CRITICAL MASS is a game-changing upgrade, allowing you to turn excess health into enemy bodycount.  As you consume opponents, your health will pass the regular limits and you enter CRITICAL MASS.  Once in CRITICAL MASS, you can trigger your most powerful techniques - DEVASTATOR attacks - to eliminate large groups of enemies or annihilate powerful foes with just a single attack.  Unlock the different DEVASTATOR attacks and test out each.

japanese: クリティカルマスアビリティ

english: CRITICAL MASS capacity increase.  Go further into the zone, allowing for a maximum of TWO DEVASTATOR attacks.\$0A\$0AUpgradeable.

japanese: クリティカルマスブースト 1

english: CRITICAL MASS Maximum. When health is maxed, this allows for up to THREE DEVASTATOR attacks.

japanese: クリティカルマスブースト 最大

english: Enhanced leg musculature means you can jump further and charge faster.  This upgrade is vital for high-speed, long-distance movement.\$0A\$0AUpgradeable.

japanese: ジャンプアップグレード 2

english: Jump further, charge faster.  This second-level upgrade is vital for high-speed, long-distance movement.\$0A\$0AUpgradeable.

japanese: ジャンプアップグレード 3

english: Max your jump charging capabilities.  This upgrade is vital for high-speed, long-distance movement.  Maximum upgrade level.

japanese: ジャンプアップグレード 最大

english: Boost your joints and streamline your body structure to SPRINT faster than ever before.\$0A\$0AUpgradeable.
SPRINT SPEED 1 will let you run faster than ever before.  This upgrade is vital to escape enemy STRIKE TEAMS - or pursue your prey.

japanese: スプリントスピード 1

english: SPRINT faster than ever before.  A vital evolutionary edge.\$0A\$0AUpgradeable.

japanese: スプリントスピード 2

english: Increase SPRINTING capability even more.  An important upgrade.

japanese: スプリントスピード 最大

english: CONSUME an enemy without raising an ALERT. Particularly useful for infiltrating BASES.\$0A\$0AUpgradeable.

STEALTH CONSUME allows you to consume unsuspecting prey on the fly. Sneak behind your prey, press %0:BUTTON11 to open the DISGUISE MENU. When the STEALTH CONSUME INDICATOR is highlighted, press %0:BUTTON02 to STEALTH CONSUME.

STEALTH CONSUME allows you to consume unsuspecting prey on the fly. Sneak behind your prey, press %0:BUTTON11 to open the DISGUISE MENU. When the STEALTH CONSUME INDICATOR is highlighted, press %0:BUTTON02 to STEALTH CONSUME.

japanese: ステルスコンシューム

english: INCREASES the SPEED of your STEALTH CONSUME.

japanese: ステルスコンシュームブースト

english: GAIN increased HEALTH from those you CONSUME.\$0A\$0AUpgradeable.

japanese: コンシュームブースト 1

english: GAIN more HEALTH from those you CONSUME.

japanese: コンシュームブースト 最大

english: Outside of combat, your health will regenerate at a steady pace.  With this upgrade your health will recover at an increased rate.\$0A\$0AUpgradeable.

japanese: レーゲンレートブースト 1

english: Outside of combat, your health will regenerate at a steady pace.  With this upgrade your health will recover at an increased rate.

japanese: レーゲンレートブースト 最大

english: Some time after taking damage, you will automatically begin to heal. This upgrade reduces the delay required for REGENERATION to begin the healing process.\$0A\$0AUpgradeable.

japanese: レーゲンディレイ 1

english: Some time after taking damage, you will automatically begin to heal. This upgrade further reduces the delay required for REGENERATION to begin the healing process.

japanese: レーゲンディレイ 最大

english: ADRENALINE SURGE is the ultimate survivability safety net.  As your health is almost gone; you'll gain a moment of INVULNERABILITY and access to a single DEVASTATOR ATTACK.  Use it wisely.

Catch your breath - and get back into the murder game.  ADRENALINE SURGE triggers just before you'd normally die, awarding a brief moment of invulnerability and the opportunity for ONE free DEVASTATOR attack.  Combine both of these advantages to turn the table on your foes - and finish them, before they do the same to you.

japanese: アドレナリンサージ

english: Jump further and faster. Vital for high-speed, long-distance movement.  A very important upgrade.\$0A\$0AUpgradeable.
japanese: さらに、高速のジャンプ。 高速、長距離の移動に不可欠。 非常に重要なアップグレード。 \$0A\$0Aアップグレード可能。

english: JUMP UPGRADE 1 allows you to jump further, higher, and faster.  Chain jumps together by CHARGING your next jump while in the air from the last!

japanese: ジャンプアップグレード 1

english: MUST BE LOGGED IN TO ACCESS STORAGE DEVICES
japanese: ストレージデバイスにアクセスするにはログインする必要があります

english: PRESS %0:BUTTON11 or %0:BUTTON10 to NAVIGATE between AVAILABLE SEQUENCES
The WEB OF INTRIGUE is your INTERFACE to UNLOCK, EXPLORE and GAIN MEMORIES.
japanese: 陰謀の記憶は、吸収した記憶をアンロックして探り、あなたの物にするためのインタフェースです。

english: Revisit the WEB OF INTRIGUE to REPLAY MEMORIES and COMPARE CONNECTIONS.
japanese: 記憶をリプレイして、接続を比較するために、陰謀の記憶を再訪問してください。

english: When you CONSUME a TARGET, their NODE is INTEGRATED into the WEB.
japanese: あなたがターゲットを吸収するとき、彼らが持っていたノードは陰謀の記憶に統合されます。

english: This is an UNLOCKED WEB OF INTRIGUE NODE. You can ACCESS its MEMORY at any time.
japanese: これはアンロックされた記憶のノードです。 あなたはいつでも記憶にアクセスできます。

english: The FLASHING GRAPHIC indicates which SEQUENCE of the WEB is CURRENTLY SELECTED. PRESS %0:BUTTON11 or %0:BUTTON10 to SHIFT between AVAILABLE SEQUENCES.
japanese: 光っているグラフィックは記憶のどの系列が選ばれているかを示します。 利用できる系列の間で、%0:BUTTON11 または%0:BUTTON10 を押して移動してください。

english: PRESS %0:BUTTON11 or %0:BUTTON10 to SHIFT between AVAILABLE SEQUENCES.
japanese: 利用可能な系列の間で  %0:BUTTON11 か %0:BUTTON10 で移動します。

english: WEB NODES are DIVIDED into SEQUENCES. PRESS %0:BUTTON11 or %0:BUTTON10 to SHIFT between AVAILABLE SEQUENCES.
japanese: 記憶のノードは系列で分かれます。 利用可能な系列の間で移行するように%0:BUTTON11 か %0:BUTTON10 を押してください。

english: Consuming WEB OF INTRIGUE TARGETS unlocks links to NEW TARGETS to LOCATE and CONSUME.
japanese: 陰謀の記憶のターゲットを見つけて、それを吸収すると新しいターゲットへのリンクがアンロックされます。

english: Each NODE is CONNECTED to other NODES by STRANDS. This REPRESENTS a RELATIONSHIP between these WEB TARGETS.
japanese: 各ノードはストランドによって他のノードに接続されます。 これは陰謀の記憶のターゲットとの関係を表します。

english: USE the %0:BUTTON06 to MOVE from NODE to NODE.
USE the MOUSE to select TENDRILS to MOVE from NODE to NODE.
japanese: ノードからノードに移動するにはマウスを使って触手を選択してください。

english: This NODE is the MEMORY of a CONSUMED TARGET. PRESS %0:BUTTON01 to PLAY the MEMORY.
japanese: このノードは吸収されたターゲットが持っていた記憶です。 記憶を再生するには %0:BUTTON01 を押してください。

english: This NODE is the MEMORY of a CONSUMED TARGET. CLICK the NODE using the MOUSE to PLAY the MEMORY.
japanese: このノードは吸収されたターゲットが持っていた記憶です。 記憶を再生するにはマウスでノードをクリックしてください。

english: When the MEMORY IS PLAYING, press %0:BUTTON01 to SKIP the MOVIE and return to the WEB OF INTRIGUE INTERFACE.
japanese: 記憶を再生しているときに、ムービーをスキップしてして陰謀の記憶インタフェースに戻るには%0:BUTTON01 を押してください。

english: PRESS [ENTER] to SKIP the MOVIE and return to the WEB OF INTRIGUE INTERFACE.
japanese: [ENTER] キーでムービーをスキップして陰謀の記憶インターフェイスに戻ります。

english: USE the %0:BUTTON06 to MOVE from NODE to NODE.
USE the MOUSE TO SELECT TENDRILS TO MOVE FROM NODE TO NODE IN THE WEB.
japanese: 陰謀の記憶の中で、ノードからノードに移動するにはマウスを使って触手を選択してください。

english: This is a PREVIEW NODE. HUNT the PERSON down and CONSUME them to UNLOCK their MEMORY and other NODES.
japanese: これはプレビューノードです。 人を探してそれを吸収し、記憶と他のノードをアンロックしてください。

english: PRESS %0:BUTTON08 to ENTER or EXIT the WEB OF INTRIGUE.
japanese: 陰謀の記憶を開始または終了するために %0:BUTTON08 を押してください。

english: PRESS the TAB BUTTON to ENTER or EXIT the WEB OF INTRIGUE.
japanese: 陰謀の記憶を開始または終了するためにTabキーを押してください。
ズーム

english: Waiting for response from storage device...
japanese: ストレージデバイスからの応答を待っています...
データのセーブに失敗しました

english: Saving content. Please don't turn off your console.
japanese: コンテンツを保存しています。 本体の電源を切らないでください。
Xbox360パッド
はい

english: YOU WILL NOT BE ABLE TO SAVE YOUR GAME
japanese: ゲームをセーブすることが出来ません。
拡大
縮小

ブラックウォッチ司令部
ブラックウォッチ・エージェント

ブラックウォッチ・トルーパー
ブラックウォッチ・タンクコマンダー
ブラックウォッチ・エージェント
ブラックウォッチ・移送ヘリパイロット
ブラックウォッチ・APCコマンダー
ブラックウォッチ・ガンシップパイロット
ブラックウォッチ司令部
ブラックウォッチ・コマンダー
ブラックウォッチ司令部

市役所職員

english: CHARGE your attacks by HOLDING the button down. A CHARGED attack is slower, but MUCH more damaging.

You can THROW almost anything. GRAB, CHARGE for power, and THROW.  The heavier the object is, the more damage it will do.  Upgrading your throw can give you boosts in both throw range and damage, and the RUNNING GRAB.  Throwing is a great compliment to your close-in hand to hand attacks; use it against enemy structures, evasive vehicles, or to pick off troublesome opponents when your health is low.
Vary COMBOS between %0:BUTTON03 and %0:BUTTON04 controls to find new ones. Some combos need to be unlocked before you can use them.
Jump attacks make you hard to hit, but don't do much damage. Use them to whittle down opponents.
Grappling HUNTERS is a great way to do significant damage in close quarters combat. GRAB with %0:BUTTON02 and then SLAM with %0:BUTTON02.
Regenerate health by avoiding damage for a few seconds. Find a place to hide out and your health will quickly recover.
Visit the UPGRADES menu to purchase new POWERS, UPGRADES, ABILITIES and MOVES.
Not all powers are useful against all enemies. Experiment with powers against new enemy types.
Almost any living creature can be CONSUMED for health.
Explosive weapons cause splash damage.  You don't have to hit directly - just get close enough and the blast will do the job.
FIRE WEAPONS in short bursts to maximize ACCURACY and DAMAGE.
Transform any object into a missile by pressing TARGET %0:BUTTON12 and THROW %0:BUTTON02.  With an adequate CHARGE you can strike even the most evasive foe at extreme range.
Transform any object into a missile by pressing TARGET %0:BUTTON12 and THROW %0:BUTTON03.  With an adequate CHARGE you can strike even the most evasive foe at extreme range.
PRESS %0:BUTTON13 to DIVEROLL. Avoid attacks and then punish the enemy.
DOUBLE-TAP + RELEASE %0:BUTTON06 to DIVEROLL. Avoid attacks and then punish the enemy.
The GUNSHIP cannon has explosive shells which cause SPLASH DAMAGE. Spraying an area with fire is highly effective.
When fighting TANKS, CHARGE your attacks by holding down the %0:BUTTON03 button to breach their armor.
Mix FAST attacks and CHARGED attacks against opponents. Each enemy type is vulnerable to different attack types.
Use UPGRADES to help achieve GOLD on all EVENTS.
TANKS tear through traffic, obstacles and enemies when driven at high speed.
Keep an eye on the DISGUISE METER to ensure your disguise doesn't become compromised.
FIREARMS are useful against humans - be selective when using them against the infected.
Trying to destroy a military base? Lure hunters in to join the fight.
In a FIRE-FIGHT use cover. MOVE while you FIRE. Enemies won't be able to LOCK ON TO YOU.
The DIVEROLL is a vital ABILITY against powerful opponents. Strike and retreat before they can hit back.
JUMP %0:BUTTON01 before you THROW %0:BUTTON02 to maximize your chance of hitting your target.
JUMP %0:BUTTON01 before you THROW %0:BUTTON03 to maximize your chance of hitting your target.
Throw larger objects to cause extra damage.
A CHARGED throw does FAR more damage. CHARGE your throws by holding down THROW %0:BUTTON02.
A CHARGED throw does FAR more damage. CHARGE your throws by holding down THROW %0:BUTTON03.
GRAPPLE large ENEMIES with the %0:BUTTON02 button to INTERRUPT their attacks.
The BLADE POWER is your most effective ATTACK. It's SLOWER than CLAWS, but more powerful.
Acquire the AIRDASH and DOUBLE AIRDASH to extend your JUMP DISTANCE.
Complete EVENTS to boost your EP score and buy UPGRADES.
Destroying INFECTED HIVES or MILITARY BASES, completing EVENTS, finding COLLECTIBLES and consuming WEB OF INTRIGUE targets are all great ways to gain EVOLUTION POINTS.
Use the Pause Menu MAP to view the INFECTED and SECURED Zones. INFECTED ZONES are RED circles. SECURED ZONES are BLUE circles.
SUPERSOLDIERS can DETECT ALEX, even when DISGUISED. Keep your distance unless you're spoiling for a fight.
Use the WHIPFIST power to GRAB objects at a DISTANCE.
Press %0:BUTTON10 to activate the POWER SELECT WHEEL. Use the %0:BUTTON07 to select from POWERS and DISGUISES.
PRESS the D-PAD in a direction to activate the POWER in that SLOT. UP for ATTACK. DOWN for DEFENSE. RIGHT for SENSORY. LEFT for DISGUISE.
Use the %0:BUTTON05 keys to activate recently selected POWERS. %0:BUTTON14 for ATTACK. %0:BUTTON16 for DISGUISE. %0:BUTTON00 for SENSORY. %0:BUTTON15 for DEFENSE.
ALCOVES, ROOFTOPS and ALLEYWAYS are great places to change your disguise.
Once unlocked, GRAB %0:BUTTON02 a HELICOPTER in the air to activate the SKYJACK ability.
You can't manually target CIVILIANS when MILITARY or INFECTED are nearby.
When your DISGUISE is compromised, wait for the SWITCH before shifting form.
%0:BUTTON11 activates the DISGUISE SPECIAL ABILITY MENU. Press it to access the STEALTH CONSUME, PATSY and ARTILLERY STRIKE abilities.
Is your CONSUME VICTIM getting knocked out of your GRASP? You can DIVEROLL during a CONSUME.
Mid-Mission Checkpoints are not saved. YOU MUST FINISH THE MISSION TO SAVE YOUR PROGRESS.
Always keep a VALID DISGUISE ready, just in case.
Don't enter a MILITARY BASE without a MILITARY DISGUISE. Bases are OFF-LIMITS to CIVILIANS.
GROUNDSHATTER attacks are good crowd control. Combine with the HAMMERFIST for maximum effect.
When STRIKE TEAMS are called you can ENGAGE them, EVADE them - or DISGUISE yourself and watch them search for you.
KILL an opponent before they can finish a STRIKE TEAM request. If you do, no STRIKE TEAM will appear.
CHARGING your JUMPS enables you to jump FASTER, FURTHER, and HIGHER. CHARGE your NEXT JUMP while in the air.
CONTROL Alex with your game controls while the POWER SELECT WHEEL is active. SELECT POWERS while on the move.

japanese: ヒント
コンタクト
ディナ・マーサー
D. C.代表者
エリザベス・グリーン
……すぐに、大きな報いを受けます
あなたは、雷を呼びました……。

軍 (ミディアム)
軍 (ハード)
感染者 (イージー)
感染者 (ミディアム)
感染者 (ハード)
ジェンテックサイエンティスト
ジェンテックサイエンティスト 2
国家公務員
サプリームハンターハイブリッド
カレン・パーカー
リム大尉

english: EXPERIMENT with COMBOS. Try each POWER and ATTACK against every ENEMY to find the most potent combinations.
japanese: コンボを試してください。 すべての敵に対して各パワーの攻撃を試みて、最も強力な組み合わせを見つけてください。

english: Vary ATTACK %0:BUTTON03 and SPECIAL %0:BUTTON04 to discover NEW HAND-TO-HAND COMBOS.
japanese: %0:BUTTON03 での通常攻撃と、 %0:BUTTON04 での特殊攻撃との組み合わせで、新しい接近戦のコンボを見つけ出せ。

english: When low on health, use JUMP ATTACKS to hit and run.
japanese: 体力が少ないときは、ジャンプアタックとヒットエンドランを使え。

english: Avoiding damage allows your REGENERATION to kick in. Find somewhere quiet to restore a portion of your health.
japanese: ダメージを受けずにいると、リジェネレーションが効き始める。 体力を回復するために、どこか静かな場所を探せ。

english: For maximum jump range and speed, CHARGE JUMP %0:BUTTON01 and release as soon as you land the previous jump.
japanese: 最大のジャンプ距離とスピードを得たいなら、%0:BUTTON01 でジャンプをチャージし、前のジャンプの着地の瞬間に放せ。

english: If one approach isn't working, try another; different powers, different weapons or a more subtle approach involving disguise.  Experiment to discover the right tool for the job - adapt and overcome.
Need to quickly switch POWERS in the heat of battle? Bind your favorite POWERS to QUICK SELECT keys.
japanese: 戦いの最中に素早くパワーを切り替えたいですか？\$0Aあなたの気に入ったパワーをクイックセレクトキーにバインドしてください。

english: When fighting GROUPS of MILITARY, target those with the MOST POWERFUL WEAPONS first.
japanese: 軍隊の集団と交戦するときは、まず最も強力な武器で狙え。

english: Once you have initiated TARGETING %0:BUTTON12, RETARGET by FLICKING the %0:BUTTON07 in the direction of the new target. FLICK the %0:BUTTON07 repeatedly to cycle through a group of enemies.
PRESS %0:BUTTON12 to TARGET.\$0A HOLD %0:BUTTON12 and MOVE the %0:BUTTON07 to SWITCH TARGETS.
japanese: %0:BUTTON12 でロックオン。 \$0A%0:BUTTON12 を押しながら %0:BUTTON07 を動かすとロックを切り替える。

english: To select the highest priority target on-screen, PRESS %0:BUTTON12.
japanese: 画面内で最も優先度の高いターゲットを選択するなら、%0:BUTTON12 を押せ。

english: %0:BUTTON12 LOCKS-ON to an enemy. SUSTAIN the lock-on to target THROWS, SHOTS and ATTACKS their way.
When you activate TARGETING %0:BUTTON12, the game slows down, allowing you to switch targets by MOVING the %0:BUTTON07.
japanese: あなたが ロックオン %0:BUTTON12, を起動するとゲーム速度は遅くなり %0:BUTTON07 で目標を切り替えることができます。

english: When you HOLD %0:BUTTON12 to TARGET the game slows down, allowing you to SWITCH TARGETS with the %0:BUTTON07.
japanese: あなたが %0:BUTTON12を押して目標をロックしている間、ゲームはスローダウンします。 そして目標を%0:BUTTON07で変更することができます。

english: TARGETING %0:BUTTON12 defaults to the most THREATENING targets in your line of sight.
japanese: ロックオン %0:BUTTON12 は、デフォルトであなたの視線中にある最も強い敵を最初に選択します。

english: Mix ATTACK and DEFENSE powers to create different combinations.
japanese: 攻撃能力と防御能力の組み合わせで、異なるコンビネーションが作り出される。

english: New POWERS, MOVES and ABILITIES are often added to the UPGRADES menu for purchase. It may be difficult to complete a particular MISSION until you've acquired a vital UPGRADE.
japanese: 新しいパワー、移動、能力はしばしばアップグレードメニューに追加され、会得できるようになる。 重要なアップグレードを会得するまでは、特定のミッションを完了させるのは難しいかもしれない。

english: Nearly ANY ACTION ADDS to your EP total. The more DANGEROUS the TASK, the more EP you earn.
japanese: ほとんどいかなる行動も、あなたのEPの合計に追加される。 仕事が危険であれば危険であるほど、あなたが得るEPも増える。

english: Completing subsections of the WEB OF INTRIGUE offers substantial EP rewards. Consume your way to the truth.
japanese: 陰謀の網の部分を全てそろえることで、多くのEPが報酬として与えられる。 真実の道を吸収せよ。

english: REGENERATION only gets you so far. GRAB %0:BUTTON02 and CONSUME %0:BUTTON04 enemies to RAPIDLY RECOVER HEALTH and reach CRITICAL MASS. This unlocks DEVASTATOR attacks.
ALCOVES, ALLEYWAYS and OUTCROPS are really useful when you need to SWITCH DISGUISE.
Once an enemy begins to call a STRIKE TEAM, kill him to stop the STRIKE TEAM from appearing.
japanese: 敵がストライク・チームを呼び始めたら、ストライクチームの出現を阻止するためにそいつを殺せ。

english: STRIKE TEAMS are fast-moving aerial units and your most dangerous opponents. Once a STRIKE TEAM is requested, decide if it is time for FIGHT or FLIGHT.
japanese: ストライク・チームは、高速で移動する空中のユニットで、あなたにとって最も危険な敵だ。 一度ストライク・チームが呼び出されたら、戦うときか、逃げ出すときかを決断せよ。

english: MISSILE LAUNCHERS are invaluable against AIRCRAFT. Target with %0:BUTTON12 and let fly.
japanese: ミサイルランチャーは航空機に絶大なる効果がある。 %0:BUTTON12 でターゲットし、発射せよ。

english: Almost all living enemies can be CONSUMED. LARGE FOES need to be STUNNED before you can CONSUME THEM.
japanese: ほとんど全ての敵を吸収することができる。 大きな敵を吸収するためには、麻痺させる必要がある。

english: Need a WEAPON or VEHICLE? Attract a STRIKE TEAM and steal their EQUIPMENT.
japanese: 武器や乗物が必要？ ストライクチームの注意を引き、その装備を奪いとれ。

english: Observe ATTACK EFFECTS as each blow IMPACTS. Some are EFFECTIVE, others are INEFFECTIVE. Adapt to use the best attack at the right time.
The GLIDE ability increases jump hang-time. Combine AIRDASH with GLIDE for maximum aerial control.
There are 92 COLLECTIBLES in Times Square and Central Park.
japanese: タイムズスクエアとセントラルパークに、92の収集物がある。

english: GRENADE LAUNCHERS are great crowd control weapons. Fire MULTIPLE TIMES to clear CROWDS or OBSTACLES.
japanese: グレネードランチャーは、群衆を処理するための素晴らしい武器だ。 群衆や障害物を排除するために、何度も発射しろ。

english: CORE UPGRADES are the most important items on the UPGRADES menu. Buy CORE UPGRADES as early as possible.
japanese: コアアップグレードはアップグレードメニューの中でも最も重要なアイテムだ。 できるだけ早く、コアアップグレードを手に入れろ。

english: The ADRENALINE SURGE upgrade is a LIFE-SAVER. Buy it as a SAFETY NET of HEALTH that gives you one last chance before death.
japanese: アドレナリン・サージのアップグレードは救いの神だ。 体力の安全さくとしてそれを会得すれば、死の間際の最後のチャンスをあなたに与えてくれる。

english: While in ADRENALINE SURGE you have access to ONE free DEVASTATOR attack. Use it wisely.
japanese: アドレナリン・サージの間、あなたは1回だけ大破壊攻撃を繰り出すことができる。 賢く使え。

english: Use AIRDASH to reach difficult locations, or avoid enemy attacks. The AIRDASH is an invaluable addition to your movement abilities.
Once you have the AIRDASH, try dashing at different times during your jump to get maximum height.
DISGUISE is only effective against the MILITARY. INFECTED ENEMIES can DETECT you in any DISGUISE.
japanese: 変身は軍隊にのみ効果的だ。 感染した敵は、どんな偽装をしようとあなたを見つけられる。

english: CONSUME and BECOME the base COMMANDER to gain access to any BASE. Inside, find VALUABLE PERSONNEL to UPGRADE your ABILITIES.
CONSUME COMMANDERS to gain access to the ARTILLERY STRIKE ability. ARTILLERY STRIKE is available under the %0:BUTTON11 Menu.
PURSUED BY THE MILITARY? Take them to an INFECTED ZONE to shake them off.
When engaging a MILITARY BASE or INFECTED HIVE, VEHICLES are your best friend. Grab one, and pour on the firepower until the building is rubble.
ROOFTOP AIR CONDITIONERS are a good source of AMMUNITION against AIRCRAFT or INFECTED HIVES.
japanese: 屋上のエアコンは、飛行機や感染のハイヴに対していい攻撃手段になる。

english: Combine TARGETING %0:BUTTON12 and THROWING %0:BUTTON02 to take out INFECTED WATER TOWERS at range.
japanese: 感染した給水塔を遠距離から排除するには、%0:BUTTON12 でのターゲッティングと、%0:BUTTON02 での投げつけを組み合わせよ。

english: Combine TARGETING %0:BUTTON12 and THROWING %0:BUTTON03 to take out INFECTED WATER TOWERS at range.
INFECTED crowds are susceptible to AREA EFFECT techniques. The HAMMERFIST power is especially potent. SLAM the ground and BLAST them away.
japanese: 感染者の群衆は範囲効果技に弱い。 ハンマーフィスト・パワーは特に有効だ。 地面をスラムし、ブラストで吹きとばせ。

english: CHARGE throw distance and damage by pressing and holding %0:BUTTON02.
japanese: %0:BUTTON02 を押して、投げ飛ばしの距離とダメージを貯めろ。

english: CHARGE throw distance and damage by pressing and holding %0:BUTTON03.
BLADE is your most POWERFUL ANTI-ARMOR power. Combine it with the AIR SLICE for devastating anti-tank capabilities.
japanese: ブレードは最も強力な対装甲能力だ。 対戦車能力を最大限に引き出すために、エアスライスをおりまぜろ。

english: DEVASTATORS are among your most destructive abilities. EXPERIMENT with EACH TYPE to discover why each is useful.
japanese: 大破壊攻撃は、あなたの持つ中で最も破壊的な能力だ。 それぞれの種類を試し、なぜ役立つのかを確かめてみよ。

english: Trying to DESTROY an INFECTED HIVE? LURE HELICOPTERS or ARMOR in to join the FIGHT.
japanese: 感染のハイヴを破壊したい？ ヘリコプターか装甲車両を戦闘に参加させるために誘導しろ。

english: With the SKYJACK upgrade, hijack enemy aircraft and make them your own. Turn bad news of a STRIKE TEAM into good news: your own personal GUNSHIP.
Once you've unlocked the SABOTAGE VIRAL DETECTORS ability, you can use it anytime.
japanese: 潜在ウイルス発見能力を一度アンロックすれば、いつでもそれを使うことができる。

english: COLLECTIBLES in hard to reach places are EASIER to reach once you can fly a HELICOPTER.
japanese: 行きづらい場所にある収集物には、ヘリコプターで飛べるようになれば簡単にたどり着ける。

english: APCs and TANKS tend to attract MILITARY ATTENTION when PLOWING through PEDESTRIANS and TRAFFIC. Use caution.
japanese: APCと戦車は、歩行者や車両を押しつぶして進むと、軍の注意を引きつけてしまう。 注意せよ。

english: Helicopters AUTOMATICALLY sustain TARGET LOCK. HOLD %0:BUTTON12 to initiate targeting, FLICK the %0:BUTTON07 until you're locked onto the desired target and RELEASE %0:BUTTON12. PRESS %0:BUTTON12 again to reset the targeting.
Use the WHIPFIST to hijack HELICOPTERS with the LONGSHOT upgrade.
HOLD %0:BUTTON03 to LOSE ALTITUDE in a HELICOPTER.
japanese: %0:BUTTON03 を押し続けると、ヘリコプターの高度を下げることができる。 .

english: SCROLL the MOUSE WHEEL to DECREASE ALTITUDE in a HELICOPTER.
japanese: ヘリコプターの高度を下げるために、マウスホイールをスクロールしてください。

english: The GUNSHIP'S most powerful weapon is its TRACKING MISSILE. Lock-on with %0:BUTTON12 and deploy.
japanese: ガンシップの最強の武器は、誘導ミサイルだ。 %0:BUTTON12 でロックオンして、発射せよ。

english: Most HELICOPTERS are equipped with ROCKETS. These are POWERFUL against SLOW MOVING enemies or GROUPS of WEAKER foes.
japanese: 多くのヘリコプターがロケットを装備している。 それはゆっくり動く敵や、歩く敵のグループに対して強力な武器だ。

english: Attracting too much attention? HOLD %0:BUTTON11 to bring up the abilities menu. Target an enemy and PRESS %0:BUTTON03 to PATSY them.
japanese: あまりにたくさんの注意をひいていますか？能力メニューで持って来る%0:BUTTON11。 敵を狙ってください、そしてお人よしにそれらを押してください。

english: Using HAMMERFIST repeatedly in combos keeps close range enemies like HUNTERS at a disadvantage.
Equipping the SHIELD not only lessens damage taken, but is also great way to plow through crowds of INFECTED at high speeds.
japanese: シールド形態は受けた損害を少なくするだけではなく、高速で感染者の群衆をなぎ倒しながら進むよい方法です。

english: When smoke and debris block enemies from view, use THERMAL VISION to see through the chaos.
japanese: けむりと残がいが敵を見えにくくしているときはサーマルビジョンを使用して、カオスを見てください。

english: The GROUNDSPIKE is useful for hitting specific targets from a distance.  Lock on to your target, then spike them with impunity.
japanese: グランドスパイクは遠方から特定の目標を達成するのに役立ちます。 目標にロックしてください、そして攻撃をかわしながらスパイクしてください。

english: It only takes one hit from a rocket launcher to break your SHIELD.
japanese: ロケットランチャーの攻撃がシールドに命中しても、シールドが壊れるだけですみます。

english: WHIPFIST attacks can interrupt HUNTERS. Keep them at a safe distance to maintain your health.
japanese: ウィップフィスト攻撃はハンターを中断できます。 ヘルスを保つために安全な距離をとってください。

english: CLAWS are fast, but don't do a lot of damage. Use GROUNDSPIKES to lay waste to your enemies.
japanese: クローは速いのですが、多くのダメージを与えません。 グランドスパイクを使用して、敵をスクラップにしてください。

english: HAMMERTOSS does a lot of damage from long range, and can be used to hit TANKS or APCs before they can hit you.
japanese: ハンマートスは広い範囲に多くのダメージを与えられます、戦車かAPCが攻撃してくる前に先制攻撃するのに使えます。

english: When crowded by infected opponents, select WHIPFIST and use the STREETSWEEPER to clear a path.
japanese: 感染者であふれ返っているとき、ウィップフィストを選択します、そしてストリートスイーパーを使用して、経路をクリアしてください。

english: The SHIELD is great for fighting bosses that have projectile damage capabilities.
japanese: シールド形態は発射武器を持つボスとの戦いに有効です。

english: During battle, effective attacks flash RED, normal attacks flash WHITE, and ineffective attacks flash BLUE. Switch POWERS if your attacks are ineffective against the current foe.
japanese: 戦闘中、効果的な攻撃はREDフラッシュ、通常の攻撃は白くフラッシュします、そして無効な攻撃は青くフラッシュします。 あなたの攻撃が敵に効果がないならば、POWERSを変えてください。
ランドール中佐

ブラックウォッチ APC

english: Does the name Karen Parker ring any bells?  Well it should.  She was close to you; an ex-girlfriend.
japanese: カレン・パーカーって名前に心当たりない？ あると思うんだけど。 彼女はあんたの身近な人、元カノだったんだから。

english: I have her address from the laptop. Get to her before the military makes her disappear. Look, if I can find this lead, you can bet they will too.
japanese: ノートPCから彼女の住所がわかった。 軍が抹殺する前に、彼女を確保して。 いい？アタシにわかったんなら、軍だってもう知ってるってことだよ。
アレックス、気をつけて。
カレン・パーカーだな。
あなたは死んでしまったものと思ってた。
そのはずなんだがな。

english: Right now, we need to get out of the military cordon.
japanese: 今すぐ、軍の非常線を突破するぞ。

english: You need to get us a vehicle -- a military one if possible. It's the only way we'll be able to get out of the district.
japanese: 車が要るわ。 できれば、軍用車両を。 この地区から逃げ出すにはそれしかないわ。

english: We know a few things about the outbreak: there are two genetic strains at work.
japanese: この感染拡大には、2種類の遺伝子的な変種が関係しているみたいね。

english: I need samples from both types to be able to treat it. First, you're going to have to locate samples from Infected Water Towers. And then, collect samples from a full-blown Hive.
japanese: これらが何なのか解明するためにも両方のサンプルがほしいの。 まず感染している給水塔のものと、そして感染者のハイヴのもの。

english: The Water Towers are prevalent in these areas. Get there, destroy them, and collect the material. Then head uptown and get the material from the Hive.
japanese: 給水塔は感染地域に点在しているわ。 それらを見つけて破壊すれば、サンプルが手に入るはずよ。 そして住宅街に向かってハイヴからもサンプルを手に入れてきて。

english: Whatever’s happening here, this is only the beginning.
japanese: 何が起こったとしても、ただの始まりに過ぎないんだろうな。

english: I think I might be able to get you close to McMullen.
japanese: もしかしたら、マクマレンに近づけるかもよ。

english: The news has been showing an endless loop of BLACKWATCH Scientific Teams turning up at Hives.
japanese: ここ最近、ニュースはブラックウォッチ化学班がハイヴに現れたことばっか延々垂れ流してる。

english: Those teams have to be working for McMullen, right?
japanese: こいつら化学班はマクマレンのために働いているはず、でしょ？

english: If they are, then one of them has got to know how to get to him.
japanese: もしそうなら、そのうち誰かはヤツへの連絡手段を知ってるはず。

english: Get into one of those areas and draw McMullen in.
japanese: どれかの調査区域に潜り込んで、マクマレンをおびき出すのよ。

english: McMullen is the key to all of this.
japanese: マクマレンがこの全ての鍵だ。

english: The samples you've recovered; I still don't have enough.
japanese: 回収してきてくれたサンプルなんだけど、まだ足りないの。

english: I need you to go inside a Hive. The substance at the center, the material the virus is producing, I think it's the key.
japanese: あなたにはハイヴの中に行ってもらう。 そこの中央部にあるモノ、ウイルスが生成してる物質、私の考えではその物質こそカギだと思うの。

english: With it, I think I can reverse the effect of the virus.
japanese: それがあれば、ウイルスの影響を抑えることができると思う。

english: And Alex, for what it's worth, I'm sorry it had to play out like this.
japanese: ねぇアレックス。 こんな言葉、慰めにもならないだろうけど、こんなことさせてごめんなさい。
謝る必要なんてない。
こいつを治してくれればいい。

english: We need a host the Parasite can infest. This host will produce antibodies.
japanese: 寄食者が生き残れる宿主が必要だ。 そいつが抗体を作るだろうからな。

english: These antibodies are vital for your restoration, Alex.
japanese: その抗体が君を治すのに重要な役割を果たす、アレックス。

english: Take this syringe, locate the correct Hunter by genetic type, and inject it.
japanese: この注射器を持って行け。 遺伝子的に適合するハンターに射して中身を注入しろ。

english: If you inject it, and consume it, it should cure you.
japanese: 注入した後にそいつを吸収すれば治るだろう。
ああ、それ前にも聞いたぞ。

english: I need to find the Hunter that took Dana.
japanese: ディナをさらったハンターを探しだす。

english: This Hunter you're looking for seems to be a variant of the species.
japanese: そいつはどうも変種のようだな。

english: It fulfills a Leader role. The other Hunters take cues from it.
japanese: リーダーの役目を果たしてるな。 他のハンターはそいつから指示をうけている。

english: If you can find and consume a Leader; it may give you indications where the focus of the virus is.
japanese: リーダーを見つけて捕食したらウイルスの病そうがどこかわかるかもな。

english: My only concern right now is Dana.
japanese: 今はディナが最優先だ。

english: The Leader Hunter I've examined is only resistant to your assimilation abilities.
japanese: リーダーは調べてみたところ唯一君の吸収能力に反抗出来てる種みたいだな。

english: You need to weaken it first. It has two brains and two spinal columns. Break both backs and it enters a recovery state.  During this time, it's vulnerable to consumption.
japanese: まず弱らせてみろ。 奴には2つずつ脳とせきちゅうがある。 両方を破壊すれば回復しようとするだろう。 その時になら吸収できるだろうさ。

english: Strange, this almost seems like an...adaptation to your methods.
japanese: ただおかしなことに……君のやり方に順応してきてるようだ。

english: Use the Leader we've captured; subdue and consume it.  Then, find and consume the one who took Dana. It should reveal her location.
japanese: 捕まえたリーダーを使え。 攻撃してから吸収しろ。 それからディナをさらった奴を探せばいいさ。 彼女の場所もわかるはずだからな。

english: Mercer, right now BLACKWATCH's only motivation is fielding the Bloodtox weapon as far and wide as possible.
japanese: マーサー、今ブラックウォッチはブラッドトックスを出来る限り広く配置するためにほん走している。

english: They're already moving to blanket the island with it, and once they have you boxed in, they'll move in for the kill.
japanese: 既に島をおおい尽くそうと動き出しているぞ。 お前が囲まれたりしたら奴らは殺しにかかってくるだろうな。

english: You need to break their grip on Southern Manhattan before they can expand their coverage radius.
japanese: ブラッドトックスの散布範囲が広がる前にマンハッタン南部をしゅう撃したほうがいいだろう。
あんた何者なんだ？

english: McMullen has gone to ground. You’ve come too close too many times.
japanese: マクマレンは地下に潜ったぞ。 奴に何度も近づきすぎたな。

english: But you have an advantage BLACKWATCH doesn’t know about: your growing immunity to Bloodtox.
japanese: しかし有利な点がある、ブラックウォッチはお前がブラッドトックスに耐性を持ち始めている事を知らない。

english: I think the key to McMullen is this: attack the Bloodtox facility head-on, and let them think they have you. When they think they’re in control, they’ll bring you to McMullen.
japanese: マクマレンに辿り着くには、ブラッドトックスの施設に乗り込んで捕まったふりをするのがいいだろう。 お前を捕獲できたと思わせればマクマレンの所に連れてってくれるさ。

english: How do you know all this?
japanese: どうやってその事を知ったんだ？

english: This disease is smart. When they hit it with Bloodtox, it went underground.
japanese: この病原菌は賢いな。 ブラッドトックスが散布されたから地下に潜ったようだ。

english: It’s been massing there, preparing to subsume the city.
japanese: 地下で集まって街を囲む準備をしてるようだな。

english: You need to make sure the Bloodtox pumper vehicle gets to Times Square. Then, when the supplies of Bloodtox arrive, pump the stuff underground, drive it out into the light.
japanese: ブラッドトックス散布車をタイムズスクエアまでエスコートしろ。 到着したら地下に散布して奴らをひの下に引きずり出してやれ。

english: Without your help...  that machine won't get within a mile of Times Square.
japanese: お前の力なしじゃ…… 散布車はタイムズスクエアまで近づけもしないだろうな。

english: Taggart’s air power is crippled. He’s going to make a run for it on the ground.
japanese: タガートの航空部隊は潰せた。 これで奴は陸路から逃げようとするはずだ。

english: The rogue BLACKWATCH units are massing at one of his bases and setting up roadblocks to allow him to get to the Brooklyn Bridge. He’ll try and push through there.
japanese: ブラックウォッチの残とうが奴の基地の1つに集まって、ブルックリン橋を突破するためのバリケードを準備している。 無理やり押し切るつもりのようだ。

english: We need to hit him at the base NOW, before the defenses are complete. Force him out of his hole. When he makes a run for it, consume him.
japanese: 防備が完全になる前に今すぐ奴の基地を叩く必要がある。 奴をす穴から叩きだしてやれ。 逃げ出させれば吸収する機会も生まれるだろう。

english: Keep the pressure on and he'll keep running. But don't let him escape. If he makes it out of Manhattan, our ticket onto the Reagan is gone.
japanese: プレッシャーを与え続ければ逃げるはずだ。 逃すなよ。 タガートがマンハッタンから脱出するということはレーガンに行く手段が無くなるということだからな。
奴を逃がしはしないさ。

english: Sites clear sir. What is your E.T.A?
japanese: 排除完了しました、博士。 そちらの到着予定時刻は？

english: OK, people - we're clean across the board. McMullen inbound.
japanese: いいぞ諸君。 全面的に問題なしだ。 降りるぞ。

english: Taking us out, hold on, we're moving.
japanese: 我々は離脱する。 つかまって下さい。 移動します。

english: Mercer...you're a hard man to find.
japanese: マーサー……おまえを見つけるのには苦労したよ。

english: I've been looking forward to this.
japanese: どれだけこの瞬間を待ち焦がれたことか。
これで元通りだ。

english: Substance A-113A which we call Bloodtox due to its odd coloration is a poison which only affects the BLACKLIGHT virus.
japanese: A-113、その色からブラッドトックスと我々が言っているものはブラックライト・ウイルスにだけ反応する毒だ。

english: We will cover the city in it to stop the spread of the virus and kill all infected with it.
japanese: こいつで街をおおうことでウイルス感染の抑止と感染者のせんめつが可能だ。

english: To humans, it is completely harmless.
japanese: 人に対しては完全に無害だ。

english: So harmless in fact, that you've been breathing it since you entered this room.
japanese: 実際にまったく無害であることは、この部屋に入ってから諸君が息を吸えていることからわかるだろう。
捕まえろ！ 待て、待つんだ！

english: Hey I knew this guy. He was Blacklight.
japanese: おいこいつ知ってるぞ。 ブラックライトのやつだ。
ああ、今じゃ元ブラックライトだがな。

english: His name is... Mercer, Alex J. Next of kin, Mercer, Dana A.
japanese: 名前は…… アレックス・J・マーサー、近親者はディナ・A・マーサー。
奥さんかな？
さあ。

english: Do you think this has anything to do with the test subject on 51?
japanese: これテスト51の内容に関係あると思うか？

english: I have no idea, and even more, I don't want to know.
japanese: 分からんし、大体知りたくもないよ。
8インチのメスをくれ。

english: We'll start by going in through the torso.
japanese: 開腹から始めるぞ。
逃げろ！

english: Get the Killteam in here NOW!
japanese: 早くキルチームを呼べ！！
ハアッ、ハァッ……。
行け行け行け！
地面に伏せろ！ 早く！ やれ！

english: I'm authorized to shoot and burn your fucking corpse.
japanese: こっちはお前らを射殺してクソ死体を焼き尽くす許可があるぞ！
ああ、クソ！

english: All points, priority target, priority target!
japanese: 全隊員、 最優先ターゲット、最優先ターゲットだ！
ま、ま、待て！ 待て！
始末しろ！
グアァァァ！
あああああ！ どうなってんだ俺！？
捕まえろ！
ゼェッ……ハァッ、ハァッ……。
簡単……。 だったな。
ゼェッ……ハァッ、ハァッ……。
行け、行け、行け！
地面に伏せろ！ 早く！ やれ！

english: I'm authorized to shoot and burn your fucking corpse.
japanese: こっちはお前らを射殺してクソ死体を焼き尽くす許可があるぞ！
今じゃ元ブラックライト……。
名前はマーサー……。
敵補足。 間も無く接触します。

english: On site, Ghost Team reporting visual.
japanese: ゴーストチームが視界内に標的を捕らえた。

english: What's the situation on that, over?
japanese: 状況を報告せよ。
テロリスト射殺。 排除完了しました。
そこで待機せよ。
グアッ……。
グゥゥァァァ……。
ディナ……。

english: My sister. He knew where she is. I know where she is.
japanese: 俺の妹。 奴らは妹の居所を掴んでいた。 場所は分かった。
妹を見つけないと。

english: Taggart’s massing a large force of Helicopters at these locations.
japanese: タガートはここに大規模なヘリ部隊を組織している。

english: If we don't move now, he'll muscle his way out of Manhattan in a fleet of Helicopters. And Randall might not be able to stop him.
japanese: 俺たちが今動かなければ、あいつはヘリを使って無理やりにでもマンハッタンから出ようとするだろう。 そうなったらRandallでは止められないかもしれない。

english: Mercer, take out the Helicopters. I’ll try and pin down Taggart’s location. And don’t let any of them get out of the city. Taggart could be on any one of them.
japanese: マーサー、ヘリを落とせ。 俺はタガートの居所を探る。 ヘリは全部落とせよ、タガートがどれに乗るかはわからんのだからな。

english: Why does it seem like I’m getting the short end of this deal?
japanese: おいおい、俺が損な役回りの気がするぞ。

english: I thought it was time we talked.
japanese: そろそろ話すべきだと思ってな。

english: You don't want to do that.
japanese: おい、そんなことするなよ。

english: I've done your job for you. I've broken the back of the infection.
japanese: お前のために動いてたってのか。 感染源を破壊して。

english: In a few hours, this whole place will be glass.
japanese: あと数時間で、この島は一掃される。

english: Even Randall's not crazy enough to nuke Manhattan.
japanese: まさか。 いくらランドールでもマンハッタンを核攻撃したりはしないだろ。

english: You're wrong. He was at Hope in '69. He'll do anything to stop the infection. If you help me stop him, you get your secret.
japanese: いや、するね。 彼は69年にホープにいたんだ。 感染を止めるためなら何でもするさ。 お前が俺を手伝ってくれば知りたがってた秘密にも届くはずだ。

english: There's no way to get to that ship without being blown out of the sky.
